original: pārvaṇaṃ ceti vijñeyaṃ śrāddhaṃ pañcavidhaṃ budhaiḥ // NarP_1,14.79 //
analyzed: pārvaṇam ca iti vijñeyam śrāddham pañcavidham budhaiḥ
graha uparāge saṃkrāntau parva utsa vamala ālaye
nirvapeḥ trīn naraḥ piṇḍān ekam eva mṛte hani

original: anūḍha na pṛthakkanyā piṇḍe gotre ca sūtake /
analyzed: anūḍha na pṛthakkanyā piṇḍe gotre ca sūtake
pāṇigrahaṇa mantrābhyām sva gotrāt bhraśyate tatas

original: yena yena tu varṇena yā kānyā pariṇīyate /
analyzed: yena yena tu varṇena yā kā anyā pariṇīyate

original: tatsamaṃ sūtakaṃ yāti tathāpiṇḍodake 'pi ca // NarP_1,14.82 //
analyzed: tad samam sūtakam yāti ca
vivāhe ca eva saṃvṛtte caturthe hani rātriṣu

original: ekatvaṃ sā vrajedbhartuḥ piṇḍe gotre ca sūtake // NarP_1,14.83 //
analyzed: eka tvam sā vrajet bhartuḥ piṇḍe gotre ca sūtake

original: prathame 'ṅni dvitīye vā tṛtīye vā caturthake /
analyzed: prathame ṅni dvitīye vā tṛtīye vā caturthake
asthisaṃcayanam kāryam bandhubhiḥ hita buddhibhiḥ

original: caturthe pañcame caiva satpame navame tathā /
analyzed: caturthe pañcame ca eva sat pame navame tathā
asthisaṃcayanam proktam varṇānām anupūrvaśas
ekādaśa ahe pretasya yasya ca utsṛjyate vṛṣaḥ
mucyate preta lokāt sa svarga loke mahīyate

original: nābhimātre jale sthitvā hṛdayena tu cintayet /
analyzed: nābhi mātre jale sthitvā hṛdayena tu cintayet
āgacchantu me pitaraḥ gṛhṇantu etāāja añjalīn

original: hastau kṛtvā tu saṃyuktau pūracitvā jalena ca /
analyzed: hastau kṛtvā tu saṃyuktau pūra citvā jalena ca
go śṛṅga mātram uddhṛtya jala madhye viniḥ kṣipet
ākāśe ca kṣipet vāri vāri sthaḥ dakṣa ghiṇā mukhaḥ

original: pitṝṇāṃ sthānamākāśaṃ dakṣiṇādik tathaiva ca // NarP_1,14.89 //
analyzed: pitṝṇām sthānam ākāśam dakṣiṇā diś tathā eva ca
āpaḥ deva gaṇāḥ proktāḥ āpaḥ pitṛ gaṇāḥ tathā

original: tasmādasya jalaṃ deyaṃ pitṝṇāṃ hitamicchatā // NarP_1,14.90 //
analyzed: tasmāt asya jalam deyam pitṝṇām hitam icchatā
rātrau nakṣatra mārutaiḥ

original: madhyayorapyubhābhyāṃ ca pavitraṃ sarvadā jalam // NarP_1,14.91 //
analyzed: madhyayoḥ api ubhābhyām ca pavitram sarvadā jalam
svabhāva yuktam avyaktam amedhyena sadā śuciḥ

original: bhāṇḍasthaṃ dharaṇīsthaṃ vā pavitraṃ sarvadā jalam // NarP_1,14.92 //
analyzed: bhāṇḍa stham dharaṇī stham vā pavitram sarvadā jalam
devatānām pitṝṇām ca jalam dadyāt jala añjalīn
a saṃskṛta pramītānām sthale dadyāt vicakṣaṇaḥ
śraddhe havana kāle ca dadyāt ekena pāṇinā

original: ubhābhyāṃ tarpaṇe dadyādeṣa dharmo vyavasthitaḥ // NarP_1,14.94 //
analyzed: ubhābhyām tarpaṇe dadyāt eṣa dharmaḥ vyavasthitaḥ

original: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde dharmaśāntinirdeśo nāma caturdaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī bṛhat nāradīyapurāṇe pūrva bhāge prathama pāde dharmaśāntinirdeśaḥ nāma caturdaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
dharmarājaḥ uvāca
pāpa bhedān pravakṣyāmi yathā sthūlāḥ ca yātanāḥ

original: śṛṇuṣva dhairyamāsthāya raudrā ye narakā yataḥ // NarP_1,15.1 //
analyzed: śṛṇuṣva dhairyam āsthāya raudrāḥ ye narakāḥ yatas
pāpinaḥ ye durātmānaḥ naraka agniṣu santatam
pacyante yeṣu tān vakṣye bhayaṅkara phala pradān
tapanaḥ vālukā kumbhau mahāraurava rauravau
asipatravanam ghoram lālā bhakṣaḥ hima utkaṭaḥ
mūṣā avasthā vasā kūpaḥ tathā vaitaraṇī nadī

original: bhakṣyante mūtrapānaṃ ca purīṣahlada eva ca /
analyzed: bhakṣyante mūtra pānam ca purīṣa hladaḥ eva ca

original: tatpaśūlaṃ tatpaśilā śālmalīdruma eva ca // NarP_1,15.5 //
analyzed: tad paśūlam śālmalīdrumaḥ eva ca
tathā śoṇitakūpaḥ ca ghoraḥ śoṇita bhojanaḥ
sva māṃsa bhojanam ca eva vahni jvālā niveśanam
śilā vṛṣṭiḥ śastra vṛṣṭiḥ vahni vṛṣṭiḥ tathā eva ca
kṣārodakam ca uṣṇa toyam tat pāyaḥ
atha śiraḥ śoṣaṇam ca marut prapatanam tathā

original: tathā pāśāṇavarṇaṃ ca kṛmibhojanameva ca // NarP_1,15.8 //
analyzed: tathā pāśāṇa varṇam ca kṛmi bhojanam eva ca
kṣāraḥ dapānam bhramaṇam tathā krakaca dāraṇam

original: purīṣalepanaṃ caiva purīṣasya ca bhojanam // NarP_1,15.9 //
analyzed: purīṣa lepanam ca eva purīṣasya ca bhojanam
retaḥ pānam mahā ghoram sarva sandhiṣu dāhanam
dhūma pānam pāśa bandham nānā śūla anulepanam
aṅgāra śayanam ca eva tathā musala marddanam

original: bahūni kāṣṭhayantrāṇi kaṣaṇaṃ chedanaṃ tathā // NarP_1,15.11 //
analyzed: bahūni kāṣṭha yantrāṇi kaṣaṇam chedanam tathā
patana utpatanam ca eva gadā daṇḍa ādi pīhanam
gaja danta praharaṇam nānā sarpaiḥ ca daṃśanam

original: śītāmbusecanaṃ caiva nāsāyāṃ ca mukhe tathā /
analyzed: śīta ambu secanam ca eva nāsāyām ca mukhe tathā
ghora kṣāra ambu pānam ca tathā lavaṇa bhakṣaṇam
strāyu chedam snāyu bandham asthi chedam tathā eva ca
kṣāra ambu pūrṇa randhrāṇām praveśam māṃsa bhojanam
pitta pānam mahā ghoram tathā eva ḥśleṣma bhojanam
vṛkṣa agrāt pātanam ca eva jala antar majjanam tathā
pāṣāṇa dhāraṇam ca eva śayanam kaṇṭaka upari
pipīlikā daṃśanam ca vṛścikaiḥ ca api pīḍanam
vyāghra pīḍā śivā pīḍā tathā mahiṣa mīḍanam
karddame śayanam ca eva durgandha paripūraṇam
bahuśas ca ardha śayanam mahātikta niṣevaṇam
ati uṣṇa taila pānam ca mahā kaṭu niṣevaṇam
kaṣāya udaka pānam ca tat papāṣāṇa takṣaṇam
ati uṣṇa śīta snānam ca tathā daśana śīrṇanam
tat pāyaḥ śayanam ca eva hi ayaḥ bhārasya bandhanam
evamādyāḥ mahābhāga yātanāḥ koṭi koṭiśas
api varṣa sahasreṇa na aham nigaditum kṣamaḥ

original: eteṣu yasya yatprātpaṃ pāpinaḥ kṣitirakṣaka // NarP_1,15.21 //
analyzed: eteṣu yasya yat prātpam pāpinaḥ kṣitirakṣaka
tat sarvam saṃprapakṣyāmi tat me nigadataḥ śṛṇu

original: brahmahā ca surāpī ca steyī ca gurutalpagaḥ // NarP_1,15.22 //
analyzed: brahma hā ca surāpī ca steyī ca gurutalpa gaḥ
mahāpātakinaḥ tu ete tad saṃsargī ca pañcamaḥ
panti bhedī vṛthā pākī nityam
ādeśī veda vikretā pañca ete brahma dhātakāḥ
yaḥ samāhūya dāsyāmi iti dhana ādikam
yaḥ bruyāt tam āhuḥ brahma ghātinam

original: snānārthaṃ pūjanārthaṃ vā gacchato brāhmaṇasya yaḥ /
analyzed: snāna artham pūjana artham vā gacchataḥ brāhmaṇasya yaḥ
samāyāti antarāya tvam tam āhuḥ brahma dhātinam
pa snindāsu nirataḥ ca ātma utkarṣa rataḥ ca yaḥ
brahma hā parikīrtitaḥ
adharmasya anumantā ca brahma hā parikīrtitaḥ
anya udvega rataḥ ca eva anyeṣām
dambha ācāra rata śvā eva brahma hā iti abhidhīyate
nityam pratigraha rataḥ tathā prāṇi vadhe rataḥ
adharmasya anumamantā ca brahma hā parikīrtitaḥ

original: brahmahatyā samaṃ pāpameva bahuvidhaṃ nṛpa // NarP_1,15.29 //
analyzed: brahmahatyā samam pāpam eva bahuvidham nṛpa
surā pāna samam pāpam pravakṣyāmi samāsatas
gaṇa anna bhojanam ca eva gaṇikānām niṣevaṇam
patita anna adanam ca eva surā pāna samam smṛtam
upāsamā parityāgaḥ devalānām ca bhojanam
surā payoṣit saṃyogaḥ surā pāna samaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: yaḥ śūdreṇa samāhato bhojanaṃ kurute dvijaḥ // NarP_1,15.32 //
analyzed: yaḥ śūdreṇa samāhataḥ bhojanam kurute dvijaḥ
surāpī sa hi vijñeyaḥ sarva dharma bahiṣkṛtaḥ

original: yaḥ śūdreṇābhyanujñātaḥ preṣyakarma kariti ca // NarP_1,15.33 //
analyzed: yaḥ śūdreṇa abhyanujñātaḥ preṣya karma ca

original: surāpāna samaṃ pāpaṃ labhate sa narādhamaḥ /
analyzed: surā pāna samam pāpam labhate sa nara adhamaḥ

original: evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ pāpaṃ surāpānasamaṃ smṛtam // NarP_1,15.34 //
analyzed: evam bahuvidham pāpam surā pāna samam smṛtam
hema steya samam pāpam pravakṣyāmi niśāmaya
kanda mūla phalānām ca kastūrī paṭa vāsasām

original: sadā steyaṃ ca ratnānāṃ svarṇasteyasamaṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: sadā steyam ca ratnānām svarṇa steya samam smṛtam
tāmra ayaḥ trapu kāṃsyānām ājyasya madhunaḥ tathā
steyam su gandha dravya aṇṇām svarṇa steya samam smṛtam
kramukasya apiharaṇam ambhasām candanasya ca
parṇa rasa apaharaṇam svarṇa steya samam smṛtam
pitṛ yajña parityāgaḥ dharma kārya vilopanam
yatīḥ nām ca eva svarṇa steya samam smṛtam

original: bhakṣyāṇāṃ cāpaharaṇaṃ dhānyānāṃ haraṇaṃ tathā // NarP_1,15.39 //
analyzed: bhakṣyāṇām ca apaharaṇam dhānyānām haraṇam tathā
rudrākṣa haraṇam ca eva svarṇa steya samam smṛtam
bhāgīnī gamanam ca eva putra strī gamanam tathā
rajasvalā ādi gamanam guru talpa samam smṛtam
hīna jātyā abhigamanam madyapa strī niṣevaṇam
para strī gamanam ca eva guru talpa samam smṛtam
bhrātṛ strī gamanam ca eva vayasya strī niṣevaṇam
viśvasta āgamanam ca eva guru talpa samam smṛtam

original: akāle karmakaraṇaṃ putrīgamana meva ca // NarP_1,15.43 //
analyzed: akāle karma karaṇam putrī gamanam eva ca
dharma lopaḥ śāstra nindā guru talpa samam smṛtam
iti evamādayaḥ rājan mahāpātaka saṃjñitāḥ
eteṣu ekatamena api saṅga kṛt tad samaḥ bhavet
yathā kathañcid pāpānām eteṣām parama ṛṣibhiḥ
śāntaiḥ tu niṣkṛtiḥ dṛṣṭā prāyaścitā ādi kalpanaiḥ
prāyaścitta vihīnāni pāpāni śṛṇu bhūpate
samasta pāpa tulyāni mahā naraka dāni ca
brahmahatyā ādi pāpānām kathañcid niṣkṛtiḥ bhavet
dveṣṭi yaḥ tasya niṣkṛtiḥ na asti kutracid
viśvasta ghātinam ca eva nareśvara
śūdra strī saṅginām ca eva niṣkṛtiḥ nā asti kutracid
śūdra anna puṣṭa dehānām veda nindā rata ātmanām
sat kathā nindakānām ca na iha amutra ca niṣkṛtiḥ
bauddha ālayam viśet yaḥ tu mahāpadi api vaidvijaḥ
na tasya niṣkṛtiḥ dṛṣṭā prāyaścita śataiḥ api
bauddhāḥ pāṣaṃṇḍinaḥ proktāḥ yatas veda vinindakāḥ
tasmāt vijaḥ tān na īkṣeta yatas dharma bahiṣkṛtāḥ
jñānataḥ jñānataḥ vā api dvijaḥ boddhā ālayam viśet
jñātvā ced niṣkṛtiḥ na asti śāstrāṇām iti niśvayaḥ
eteṣām pāpa bāhulyāt narakam koṭi kalpakam
prāyaścitta vihīnāni proktāni anyāni ca prabho

original: pāpāni teṣāṃ narakāngadato me niśāmaya // NarP_1,15.55 //
analyzed: pāpāni teṣām narakān gadataḥ me niśāmaya
mahāpātakinaḥ teṣu pratyekam yuga vāsinaḥ
tad ante pṛthivīm etya satpa janmasu gardabhāḥ
tatas śvānaḥ viddha dehāḥ bhaveyuḥ daśa janmasu
ā śata abdam viṣ kṛmayaḥ sarpāḥ dvādaśa janmasu
tatas sahasra janmāni mṛga ādyāḥ paśavaḥ nṛpa
śata abdam sthāvarāḥ ca eva tatas godhā śarīriṇaḥ
tatas tu caṇḍālāḥ pāpa kāriṇaḥ

original: tataḥ ṣoḍaśa janmāni śūdrādyā hīnajātayaḥ // NarP_1,15.59 //
analyzed: tatas ṣoḍaśa janmāni śūdra ādyāḥ hīna jātayaḥ
tatas tu janma dvitaye daridrā vyādhi pīḍitāḥ

original: pratigrahaparā nityaṃ tato nirayagāḥ punaḥ // NarP_1,15.60 //
analyzed: pratigraha parāḥ nityam tatas niraya gāḥ punar
asūyā āviṣṭa manasaḥ raurave narake smṛtam

original: tatra kalpadvayaṃ sthitvā cāṇḍālāḥ śatajanmasu // NarP_1,15.61 //
analyzed: tatra kalpa dvayam sthitvā cāṇḍālāḥ śata janmasu
mā dadasva iti yaḥ brūyāt gavān gi brāhmaṇeṣu ca
śunām yoni śatam gatvā cāṇḍāleṣu upajāyate
tatas viṣṭhā ākṛtimiḥ ca eva tatas vyāghraḥ tri janmasu
tad ante narakam yāti yugānām ekaviṃśatim

original: paranindāparā ye ca ye ca niṣṭhurabhāṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: para nindā parāḥ ye ca ye ca niṣṭhura bhāṣiṇaḥ
dānānām vingha karttāraḥ teṣām pāpa phalam śṛṇu

original: muśalolū khalābhyāṃ tu cūrṇyante taskarā bhṛśam /
analyzed: muśala ulū khalābhyām tu cūrṇyante taskarāḥ bhṛśam
tad ante tad pa pāṣāṇa grahaṇam
tatas ca kālasūtreṇa bhidyante satpa vatsarān
śocantaḥ su ṛni karmāṇi para dravya apahārakāḥ

original: karmaṇā tatra pacyante narakāngiṣu santatam // NarP_1,15.67 //
analyzed: karmaṇā tatra pacyante naraka angiṣu santatam
para sva sūcakānām ca narakam śṛṇu dāruṇam
yāvat yuga sahasram tu tat pāyaḥ piṇḍa bhakṣaṇam
saṃpīḍyate ca rasanā saṃdaṃśaiḥ bhṛśa dāruṇaiḥ

original: nirucchvāsaṃ mahāghore kalpārddhaṃ nivasanti te // NarP_1,15.69 //
analyzed: nirucchvāsam mahā ghore kalpa arddham nivasanti te
para strī lolupānām ca narakam kathayāmi te
tad patāmra striyaḥ tena surupa ābharaṇaiḥ yutāḥ
yādṛśīḥ tādṛśīḥ tāḥ ca ramante prasabham bahu

original: vidvavantaṃ bhayenāsāṃ gṛhṇanti prasabhaṃ ca tam // NarP_1,15.71 //
analyzed: vidvavantam bhayena āsām gṛhṇanti prasabham ca tam
kathayantaḥ ca tat karma nayante narakān kramāt

original: anyaṃ bhajante bhūpāla patiṃ tyaktvā ca yāḥ striyaḥ // NarP_1,15.72 //
analyzed: anyam bhajante bhūpāla patim tyaktvā ca yāḥ striyaḥ
tad pāyaḥ puru śāstā astu tad pāyaḥ śayane balāt

original: pātayitvā ramante ca bahukālaṃ balānvitāḥ // NarP_1,15.73 //
analyzed: pātayitvā ramante ca bahukālam bala anvitāḥ
tatas taiḥ yoṣitaḥ muktāḥ hutāśana sama ujjvalam

original: a yaḥ stambhaṃ samāśsiṣya tiṣṭhantyabdasahasrakam // NarP_1,15.74 //
analyzed: yaḥ stambham tiṣṭhanti abda sahasrakam
tatas kṣāra udaka snānam kṣāra udaka niṣevaṇam

original: tadante narakān sarvān bhuñjate 'bdaśataṃ śatam // NarP_1,15.75 //
analyzed: tad ante narakān sarvān bhuñjate bda śatam śatam

original: yo hanti brāhmaṇaṃ gāṃ ca kṣatriyaṃ ca nṛpottamam /
analyzed: yaḥ hanti brāhmaṇam gām ca kṣatriyam ca nṛpa uttamam

original: sa cāpi yātanāḥ sarvā bhuṅkte kalpeṣu pañcasu // NarP_1,15.76 //
analyzed: sa ca api yātanāḥ sarvāḥ bhuṅkte kalpeṣu pañcasu

original: yaḥ śṛṇoti mahannindāṃ sādaraṃ tatphalaṃ śṛṇu /
analyzed: yaḥ śṛṇoti mahā nindām sa ādaram tad phalam śṛṇu

original: teṣāṃ karṇeṣu dāpyante tatpāyaḥ kīlasaṃcayāḥ // NarP_1,15.77 //
analyzed: teṣām karṇeṣu dāpyante tat pāyaḥ kīla saṃcayāḥ
tatas ca teṣu chidreṣu tailam ati uṣṇam ulbaṇam

original: pūryate ca tataścāpiṃ kumbhīpākaṃ prapadyate // NarP_1,15.78 //
analyzed: pūryate ca tatas ca āpim kumbhīpākam prapadyate
nāstikānām pravakṣyāmi vimukhānām hare harau

original: abdānāṃ koṭiparyantaṃ lavaṇaṃ bhuñjate hi te // NarP_1,15.79 //
analyzed: abdānām koṭi paryantam lavaṇam bhuñjate hi te
tatas ca kalpa paryantam raurave
bhajyante pāpa karmaṇaḥ narādhipa
nirīkṣante kopa dṛṣṭyā nara adhamāḥ
tat pasūcī sahasreṇa cakṣuḥ teṣām prasūryate
tatas kṣāra ambu dhārābhiḥ secyante nṛpa sattama
tatas ca krakarceḥ ghoraiḥ bhidyante pāpa karṃmaṇaḥ
viśvāsa ghātinām ca eva maryādā bhedinām tathā

original: parānnalollupānāṃ ca narakaṃ śṛṇu dāruṇam // NarP_1,15.83 //
analyzed: para anna lollupānām ca narakam śṛṇu dāruṇam
sva māṃsa bhojinaḥ nityam bhakṣamāṇāḥ śvabhiḥ tu te
narakeṣu samasteṣu pratyekam hi abda vāsinaḥ

original: pratigraharatā ye ca ye vai nakṣatrapāṭhakāḥ /
analyzed: pratigraha ratāḥ ye ca ye vai nakṣatra pāṭhakāḥ

original: ye ca devalakānnānāṃ bhojinastāñśṛṇuṣva me // NarP_1,15.85 //
analyzed: ye ca devalaka annānām bhojinaḥ tān śṛṇuṣva me
rājan na akalpa paryantam yātanāsu āsu duḥkhitāḥ

original: pacyante satataṃ pāpāviṣṭā bhogaratāḥ sadā // NarP_1,15.86 //
analyzed: pacyante satatam pāpa āviṣṭāḥ bhoga ratāḥ sadā
tatas tailena pūryante kālasūtra prapīḍitāḥ
tatas kṣāra udaka snānam mūtra viṣṭā niṣevaṇam
tad ante bhuvam āsādya bhavanti mleccha jātayaḥ

original: anyodvegaratā ye tu yānti vaitaraṇīṃ nadīm // NarP_1,15.88 //
analyzed: anya udvega ratāḥ ye tu yānti vaitaraṇīm nadīm
tyakta pañcamahāyajñāḥ lālā bhakṣam vrajanti hi
upāsanā parityāgī rauravam narakam vrajet

sarva lokeṣu vikhyātā mahā pātaka nāśinī
yaḥ idam puṇyam ākhyānam mahāpātaka nāśanam
paṭhet ca śṛṇuyāt vā api gaṅgā snāna phalam labhet
yaḥ tve tat puṇyam ākhyānam kathayet rvāhyaṇa agratas
sa yāti viṣṇu bhavanam punarāvṛtti varjitam

original: iti śrūbṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde gaṅgāmāhātmye bhagīrathagaṅgānayanaṃ nāma ṣoḍaṣo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śru bṛhat nāradīyapurāṇe pūrva bhāge prathama pāde gaṅgāmāhātmye bhagīrathagaṅgānayanam nāma ṣoḍaṣaḥ dhyāyaḥ
ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ
sādhu sūta mahābhāga tvayā ati karuṇa ātmanā
śrāvitam gaṅgāmāhātmyam uttamam
śrutvā tu gaṅgāmāhātmyam nāradaḥ devadarśanaḥ

original: kiṃ papraccha punaḥ sūta sanakaṃ munisattamam // NarP_1,17.2 //
analyzed: kim papraccha punar sūta sanakam muni sattamam
sūtaḥ uvāca
śṛṇudhvam ṛṣayaḥ sarve nāradena sura ṛṣiṇā

original: pṛṣṭaṃ punaryathā prāha pravakṣyāmi tathaiva tat // NarP_1,17.3 //
analyzed: pṛṣṭam punar yathā prāha pravakṣyāmi tathā eva tat
nānā ākhyāna itihāsa āḍyam gaṅgāmāhātmyam uttamam
śrutvā brahma sutaḥ bhūyas pṛṣṭavān idam ādarāt
nāradaḥ uvāca
aho ti dhanyam sukṛta eka sāram śrutam mayā puṇyam asaṃvṛta artham
gāṅgeya māhātmyam agha praṇāśi tvattaḥ mune kāruṇikāt abhīṣṭam

original: ye sādhavaḥ sādhu bhajanti viṣṇuṃ svārthaṃ parārthaṃ ca yatanta eva /
analyzed: ye sādhavaḥ sādhu bhajanti viṣṇum sva artham para artham ca yatantaḥ eva

original: nānopadeśaiḥ suvimugdhacittaṃ prabodhayanti prasabhaṃ prasannam // NarP_1,17.6 //
analyzed: nānā upadeśaiḥ su vimugdha cittam prabodhayanti prasabham prasannam

original: tataḥ samākhyāhi harervratāni kṛtaiśca yaiḥ prītimupaiti viṣṇuḥ /
analyzed: tatas samākhyāhi hareḥ vratāni kṛtaiḥ ca yaiḥ prītim upaiti viṣṇuḥ

original: dadāti bhaktiṃ bhajatāṃ dayālurmuktistu tasyā viditā hi dāsī // NarP_1,17.7 //
analyzed: dadāti bhaktim bhajatām dayāluḥ muktiḥ tu tasyāḥ viditā hi dāsī

original: bhaktānusevāsu mahāprayāsaṃ vimṛśya kasyāpi na bhaktiyogam // NarP_1,17.8 //
analyzed: bhakta anusevāsu mahā prayāsam vimṛśya kasya api na bhakti yogam

original: pravṛttaṃ ca nivṛttaṃ ca yatkarma harito ṣaṇam /

original: tadā khyāhi muniśreṣṭha viṣṇubhakto 'si mānada // NarP_1,17.9 //
analyzed: tadā khyāhi muni śreṣṭha viṣṇu bhaktaḥ si mānada
sanakaḥ uvāca
sādhu sādhu muni śreṣṭha bhaktaḥ tvam

original: bhūyo bhūyo yataḥ puccheścaritraṃ śārṅgadhanvanaḥ // NarP_1,17.10 //
analyzed: bhūyas bhūyas yatas puccheḥ caritram śārṅgadhanvanaḥ
vratāni te pravakṣyāmi loka upakṛtimanti ca
prasīdati hariḥ yaiḥ tu prayacchati abhayam tathā

original: ihāmutra sukhaṃ tasya tapovṛddhiśca jāyate // NarP_1,17.12 //
analyzed: iha amutra sukham tasya tapaḥ vṛddhiḥ ca jāyate

original: mārga śīrṣe site pakṣe dvādaśyāṃ jalaśāyinam /
analyzed: mārga śīrṣe site pakṣe dvādaśyām jalaśāyinam
upoṣitaḥ samyak naraḥ śraddhā samanvitaḥ
snātvā śukla ambara dharaḥ danta dhāvana pūrvakam

original: keśavāya namastubhyamiti viṣṇuṃ ca pūjayet // NarP_1,17.16 //
analyzed: keśavāya namaḥ tubhyam iti viṣṇum ca pūjayet

gītaiḥ vādyaiḥ ca naivedyaiḥ bhakṣyaiḥ bhojyaiḥ ca keśavam

original: punaḥ kalye samutthāya kṛtvā karma yathocitam // NarP_1,17.19 //
analyzed: punar kalye samutthāya kṛtvā karma yathocitam
pūrvavat pūjayet vevam vāgyataḥ niyataḥ śuciḥ

mantreṇa anena viprāya dadyāt bhaktyā sa dakṣiṇam

brahmaṇān bhojayet paścāt śaktitas bandhubhiḥ saha

original: nārāyaṇa paro bhūtvā svayaṃ bhuñjīta vāgyataḥ /
analyzed: nārāyaṇa paraḥ bhūtvā svayam bhuñjīta vāgyataḥ

original: iti yaḥ kurute bhaktyā keśavārcanamuttamam // NarP_1,17.23 //

original: pauṣamāse site pakṣe dvādaśyāṃ samupoṣitaḥ // NarP_1,17.24 //
analyzed: pauṣa māse site pakṣe dvādaśyām samupoṣitaḥ

original: payasā snāpya naivedyaṃ pāyasaṃ ca samarpayet // NarP_1,17.25 //
analyzed: payasā snāpya naivedyam pāyasam ca samarpayet
rātrau jāgaraṇam kuryāt tri kāla arcana tatparaḥ
dhūpaiḥ dīpaiḥ ca naivedyaiḥ gandhaiḥ puṣpaiḥ manoramaiḥ
tṛṇaiḥ ca gīta vādya ādyaiḥ stotraiḥ ca api aryayet harim
kṛsara annam ca viprāya dadyāt sa ghṛta dakṣiṇam
nārāyaṇaḥ prasannaḥ syāt kṛśara anna pradānataḥ
mantreṇa anena viprāya dattvā vai dānam uttamam
dvijān ca bhoja iyat śaktyā svayam adyāt sa bāndhavaḥ
evam saṃpūjayet bhaktyā devam nārāyaṇam prabhum
agniṣṭoma aṣṭaka phalam sa saṃpūrṇam avāpnuyāt

original: namaste mādhavāyeti hutvāṣṭau ca ghṛtāhutīḥ // NarP_1,17.31 //
analyzed: namaḥ te mādhavāya iti hutvā aṣṭau ca ghṛta āhutīḥ
pūrva mānena payasā snāpayet mādhavam tadā
puṣpa gandha akṣataiḥ arcet sa avadhānena cetasā

original: kalyakarma ca nirvartya mādhavaṃ punararcayet // NarP_1,17.33 //
analyzed: kalya karma ca nirvartya mādhavam punar arcayet

original: evaṃ yaḥ kurute bhaktyā tiladāne vrataṃ mune /

phaālgunasya site pakṣe dvādaśyām samupoṣitaḥ

original: prātaḥ kṛtyaṃ samāpyātha govindaṃ pūjayetpunaḥ // NarP_1,17.40 //

original: anena dhānya dānena prīto bhava jagadguro /

original: caitramāse site pakṣe dvādaśyāṃ samupoṣitaḥ // NarP_1,17.43 //
analyzed: caitra māse site pakṣe dvādaśyām samupoṣitaḥ

aṣṭottaraśatam hutvā madha ava ājya tila miśritam

original: evaṃ kṛtvā naro bhaktyā sarvapāpavivarjitaḥ // NarP_1,17.48 //

original: jāmaraṃ niśi nirvartya punaḥ pūjāṃ samācaret /

original: evaṃ yaḥ kurute bhaktyā padmanābhavrataṃ sudhīḥ /

brahma medha sahasrasya niścitam

aṣṭottaraśatam hutvā maghu ājya akta tila āhutīḥ
jāgaram niyataḥ kuryāt tri kāla arcana tatparaḥ
prātar saṃpūjayet devam padma puṣpaiḥ manoramaiḥ

original: anena dattvā dānaṃ ca śrotriyāya kuṭumbine /

original: henmā vā rājatenāpi tathā tāmreṇa vā dvijā // NarP_1,17.94 //

pañcāmṛtena prathamam snāpayet bhakti saṃyutaḥ

original: tataḥ prātaḥ samutthāya prātaḥ kṛtyaṃ samāpya ca /

original: ādhāya jānunī bhūmau vinayāvananato vratī // NarP_1,17.104 //

original: namo namaste surarājarāja namo 'stute devaṃ jagannivāsa /

original: gīyamānaṃ ca vedāntaistasmānnāsti paraṃ dvija // NarP_1,33.62 //

analyzed: karttṛ tvam vā api bhoktṛ tvam nirguṇasya parātmanaḥ

yaḥ tu yoga rataḥ vipra viṣayeṣu spṛhā anvitaḥ

original: yeyaṃ kṣetrajñaśaktiḥ sā ceṣṭitā nṛpa karmajā /
analyzed: yā iyam kṣetrajña śaktiḥ sā ceṣṭitā nṛpa karma jā

original: asārabhūte saṃsāre proktā tatra mahāmate // NarP_1,47.38 //
analyzed: asāra bhūte saṃsāre proktā tatra mahāmate

original: tayā tirohitatvāttu śaktiḥ kṣetrajña saṃjñitā // NarP_1,47.39 //
analyzed: tayā tirohita tvāt tu śaktiḥ kṣetrajña saṃjñitā
sarva bhūteṣu bhūpāla tāratamyena lakṣyate
a prāṇavatsu khalu alpā sthāvareṣu tatas dhikā
sarīsṛpeṣu tebhyaḥ nyāpī atiśaktyā
patatrribhyaḥ mṛgāḥ tebhyaḥ sva śaktyā paśavaḥ dhikāḥ
paśubhyaḥ manujāḥ ca ati śaktyā puṃsaḥ prabhāvitāḥ
tebhyaḥ pi nāga gandharva yakṣa ādyāḥ devatāḥ nṛpa
śakraḥ samasta devebhyaḥ tatas ca ati prajāpatiḥ
hiraṇyagarbhaḥ pi tatas puṃsaḥ śakti upalakṣitaḥ
etāni aśeṣa rūpāṇi tasya rūpāṇi pārthiva
yatas tad śakti yogena yuktāni nabhasā yathā
dvitīyam viṣṇu saṃjñasya yogi dhyeyam mahāmate

original: amṛrtaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ yatsadityucyate budhaiḥ // NarP_1,47.45 //
analyzed: amṛrtam brahmaṇaḥ rūpam yat sat iti ucyate budhaiḥ
samastāḥ śaktayaḥ ca etāḥ nṛpa yatra pratiṣṭitāḥ
nahi sva rūpa rūpam vai rūpam anyat hareḥ mahat
samasta śakti rūpāṇi tat karoti janeśvara
deva tiryak manuṣya ādi ceṣṭāvanti sva līlayā
jagatām upakārāya tasya karma nimitta jā
ceṣṭā tasya aprameyasya vyāpinī avihita ātmikā

original: tadrūpaṃ viśvarūpāya cintyaṃ yoga yujā nṛpa /
analyzed: tat rūpam viśvarūpāya cintyam yoga yujā nṛpa
tasya hi ātma viśuddhi artham sarva kilbiṣa nāśanam
yathā agniḥ ūddhata śikhaḥ kakṣam dahati sa anilaḥ
tathā citta sthitaḥ viṣṇuḥ yoginām sarva kilbiṣam
tasmāt samasta śaktīnām āndya ante tatra cetasaḥ

original: kurvīta saṃsthitaṃ sādhu vijñeyā śuddhalakṣaṇā // NarP_1,47.51 //
analyzed: kurvīta saṃsthitam sādhu vijñeyā śuddha lakṣaṇā
śubha aṃśrayaḥ sa cittasya sarvagasya tathā ātmanaḥ
tri bhāva bhāvanā atītaḥ muktaye yoginām nṛpa

original: anye tu puruṣavyāghra cetaso ye vyāpā8yāḥ /
analyzed: anye tu puruṣa vyāghra cetasaḥ ye
aśuddhāḥ te samastāḥ tu deva ādyāḥ karma yonayaḥ
mūrttam bhagavataḥ rūpam sarva apāśraya nispṛhaḥ

original: eṣā vai dhāraṇā jñeyā yañcitaṃ tatra dhāryate // NarP_1,47.54 //
analyzed: eṣā vai dhāraṇā jñeyā yat citam tatra dhāryate

original: tatra mūrttaṃ hare rūpaṃ yādṛk cintyaṃ narādhipa /
analyzed: tatra mūrttam hareḥ rūpam yādṛś cintyam narādhipa
tat śrūyatā manā ādhāre dhāraṇā na upapadyate
prasanna cāru vadanam padma patra āyata īkṣaṇam
su kapolam su vistīrṇam lalāṭa phalaka ujjvam
sama karṇa aṃsa vinya sta cāru karṇa upabhūṣaṇam
kambu grīvam su vistīrṇa śrīvatsa aṃkita vakṣasam
bali triṃbhāginā bhugna nābhinā ca udareṇa vai
pralaṃba aṣṭa bhujam viṣṇum atha vā api caturbhujam
samasthita ūru jaghanam su sthira aṅghri kara ambujam
cintayet būhya bhūtam tam pīta nirmala vāsasam
kirīṭa cāru keyūra kaṭaka ādi vibhūṣitam
śārṅga śaṅkha gadā khaḍga prakāśa valaya āñcitam
cintayet tad mayaḥ yogī samādhāya ātma mānasam

original: tāvadyāvad dṛḍhībhūtā tatraiva nṛpa dhāraṇā // NarP_1,47.61 //
analyzed: tāvat yāvat dṛḍhībhūtā tatra eva nṛpa dhāraṇā
vadataḥ tiṣṭataḥ yat vā sva icchayā karma kurvataḥ

original: nāpayāti yadā cittātsiddhāṃ manyeta tāṃ tadā // NarP_1,47.62 //
analyzed: na apayāti yadā cittāt siddhām manyeta tām tadā
tatas śaṅkha gadā cakra śārṅga ādi rahitam budhaḥ
cintaye t bhagavat rūpam praśāntam sa akṣasūtrakam
sā yadā dhāraṇā tadvat avasthānavatī tatas
kirīṭa keyūra mukhaiḥ bhūṣaṇaiḥ rahitam smaret
tad eka avayavam ca evam cetasā hi punar budhaḥ
kuryāt tatas vayavini prāṇi dhāna paraḥ bhavet
tad rūpa pratyaye ca eka saṃnatiḥ ca anya niḥspṛhā
tat dhyānam prathamaiḥ aṅgaiḥ ṣaṅbhiḥ niṣpādyate nṛpa
tasya evam kalpanā hīnam sva rūpa grahaṇam hi yat
manasā dhyāna niṣpādyam samādhiḥ saḥ abhidhīyate

original: vijñānaṃ prāpakaṃ prāpye paraṃ brahmaṇi pārthiva /
analyzed: vijñānam prāpakam prāpye param brahmaṇi pārthiva
prāpaṇīyaḥ tathā eva ātmā prakṣīṇa aśeṣa bhāvanaḥ
kṣetrajña karaṇī jñānam karaṇam tena tasya tat

original: niṣpādya muktikāryaṃ vai kṛtakṛtyo nivartate // NarP_1,47.69 //
analyzed: niṣpādya mukti kāryam vai kṛtakṛtyaḥ nivartate
tad bhāva bhāvanā āpannaḥ sau paramātmanaḥ
bhavati abhedī bhedaḥ ca tasya ajñāna kṛtaḥ bhavet

original: ātmano brahmaṇābhedaṃ saṃmataṃ kaḥ kariṣyati // NarP_1,47.71 //
analyzed: ātmanaḥ brahmaṇā abhedam saṃmatam kaḥ kariṣyati
iti uktaḥ te mayā yogaḥ khāṇḍikya paripṛcchataḥ
saṃkṣepa vistarābhyām tu kim anyat kriyatām tava
khāṇḍikyaḥ uvāca
kathitaḥ yoga sadbhāvaḥ sarvam eva kṛtam mama
tava upadeśāt sakalaḥ naṣṭaḥ citta malaḥ mama
mama iti yat mayā proktam asat etat na ca anyathā
naredram gaditum śakyam api vijñeya vedabhiḥ
aham mama iti avidyā iyam vyavahāraḥ tathā anayoḥ

original: paramārthastva saṃlāpyo vacasāṃ gocaro na yaḥ // NarP_1,47.75 //
analyzed: parama arthaḥ tva saṃlāpyaḥ vacasām gocaraḥ na yaḥ
tat guccha śreyase sarvam mama etat bhavatā kṛtam
yad vimukti paraḥ yogaḥ proktaḥ keśidvaja avyayaḥ
sanandanaḥ uvāca
yathārha pūjayā tena khāṇḍikyena sa pūjitaḥ

original: ājagāma puraṃ brahmaṃstataḥ keśidhvajo nṛpaḥ // NarP_1,47.77 //
analyzed: ājagāma puram brahman tatas keśidhvajaḥ nṛpaḥ
khāṇḍikyaḥ pi sutam kṛtvā rājānam yoga siddhaye
viśālām agamat kṛṣṇe samāveśita mānasaḥ
sa tatra aikāntikaḥ bhūtvā yama ādi guṇa saṃyutaḥ
viṣṇu ākhye nirmale brahmaṇi avāpa nṛpatiḥ layam
keśidhvajaḥ pi muktayartham sva karma kṣapaṇa unmukhaḥ
bubhuje viṣayān karma cakre ca anabhisaṃdhitam
sa kalyāṇa upabhogaiḥ ca kṣīṇa pāpaḥ malaḥ tatas
avāpa siddhim atyanta tri tāpa kṣapaṇīm mune

original: etatte kathitaṃ sarvaṃ yanmāṃ tvaṃ paripṛṣṭavān /
analyzed: etat te kathitam sarvam yat mām tvam paripṛṣṭavān
tāpa traya cikitsā artham kim anyat kathayāmi te
iti śru bṛhat nāradīyapurāṇe pūrva bhāge dvitīya pāde saptacatvāriṃśattamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
nāradaḥ uvāca
śrutam mayā mahāmāga tāpa traya cikitsitam

original: tathāpi me mano bhrāntaṃ na sthitiṃ labhateṃ'jasā // NarP_1,48.1 //
analyzed: tathā api me manaḥ bhrāntam na sthitim labhate iṃjasā
ātma vyatikramam brahman durjana ācaritam katham
soḍhum śakyeta manujaiḥ tat mama ākhyāhi mānada
sūtaḥ uvāca
tat śrṛtvā nāradena uktam brahma putraḥ sanandanaḥ
uvāca harṣa saṃyuktaḥ smaran bhagha rata ceṣṭitam
sanandanaḥ uvāca
atra te kathayiṣyāmi itihāsam purātanam

original: yaṃ śrutvā tvanmano bhrāntamāsthānaṃ labhate bhūśam // NarP_1,48.4 //
analyzed: yam śrutvā tvad manaḥ bhrāntam āsthānam labhate bhūśam

original: ārṣabho yasya nāmnedaṃ bhārataṃ khaṇḍamucyate // NarP_1,48.5 //
analyzed: ārṣabhaḥ yasya nāmnā idam bhāratam khaṇḍam ucyate

pālayāmāsa dharmeṇa pitṛ bat rañjayan prajāḥ
ca vividhaiḥ yajñaiḥ bhagavantam adhokṣajam
sarva deva ātmakam dhyāyan nānā karmasu tad matiḥ
tatas samutpādya sutān viraktaḥ viṣayeṣu saḥ
muktvā rājyam yayau vidvān pulastyapuha āśramam

original: tatrāsau tāpaso tāpaso bhūtvā viṣṇorārādhanaṃ mune // NarP_1,48.9 //

original: nityaṃ prātaḥ samāplutya nirmale 'bhali nārada // NarP_1,48.10 //

phalaiḥ puṣpaiḥ tathā patraiḥ tulasyāḥ svaccha vāribhiḥ

original: sacaikadā mahābhāgaḥ snātvā prātaḥ samāhitaḥ // NarP_1,48.13 //

siṃhasya nādaḥ su mahān sarva prāṇi bhayaṅkaraḥ

ati uñca ārohaṇena asyāḥ nadyām garbhaḥ papāta ha

original: tatra cotsṛṣṭadeho 'sau jajñe jātismaro dvijaḥ // NarP_1,48.31 //
analyzed: tatra ca utsṛṣṭa dehaḥ sau jajñe jātismaraḥ dvijaḥ

original: saṃmānena parāṃ hāniṃ yogarddheḥ kurute yataḥ // NarP_1,48.37 //

original: sa rājā śibikārūḍho gantuṃ kṛtamatirdvija // NarP_1,48.44 //

maṇi hāraḥ tuvarṇa ābhāḥ dīptimantaḥ rka sūnavaḥ
ketavaḥ coditāḥ pūrva aparayoḥ nṛpa hāni dāḥ
vaṃsuka biṃba kṣitija chukatuṇḍa ādi sannibhāḥ
hutāśana uditāḥ te pi ketavaḥ phala dāḥ smṛtāḥ
bhūsutāḥ jala taila ābhāḥ vartulāḥ kṣudh bhaya pradāḥ
subhikṣa kṣema dāḥ śveta ketavaḥ soma sūnavaḥ
pitāmaha ātmajaḥ ketuḥ tri varṇaḥ tridaśa anvitaḥ
brahmadaṇḍāt dhūmaketuḥ prajānām anta kṛt mataḥ
aiśānyām bhārgava sutāḥ śveta rūpāḥ tu aniṣṭa dāḥ

original: vikacākhyā gurusutā veṣṭā yāmye sthitā api /
analyzed: vikaca ākhyāḥ gurusutāḥ veṣṭāḥ yāmye sthitāḥ api
sūkṣmāḥ śuklāḥ budha sutāḥ caura roga bhaya pradāḥ
kuja ātmajāḥ kuṅkuma ākhyāḥ raktāḥ śūlāḥ tu aniṣṭa dāḥ
agni jāḥ viśvarūpa ākhyāḥ agni varṇāḥ sukha pradāḥ
aruṇāḥ śyāmala ākārāḥ arka putrāḥ ca pāpa dāḥ

original: śukrajā ṛkṣasadṛśāḥ ke tavaḥ śubhadāyakāḥ // NarP_1,56.106 //
analyzed: śukra jāḥ ṛkṣa sadṛśāḥ ke tavaḥ śubha dāyakāḥ
kṛttikāsu bhavaḥ dhūmaketuḥ nūnam prajā kṣayaḥ
prāsāda vṛkṣa śaileṣu jātaḥ rājñām vināśa kṛt
subhikṣa kṛt kaumuda ākhyaḥ ketuḥ kumuda sannibhaḥ
āvarta ketu saṃdhyāyām śaśiraḥ na iṣṭa dāyakaḥ
pitryam sauram ca sāvanam

original: cāndramārkṣaṃ gurormānamiti mānāni vai navaḥ // NarP_1,56.109 //
analyzed: cāndramārkṣam guroḥ mānam iti mānāni vai navaḥ
eteṣām nava mānānām pañcabhiḥ
teṣām pṛthak pṛthak kāryam vakṣyate vyavahārataḥ
grahāṇām nikhilaḥ cāraḥ gṛhyate saura mānataḥ
vṛṣṭeḥ vidhānam strī garbhaḥ sāvanena eva gṛhyate
pravarṣaṇām same garbhaum nākṣatreṇa pragṛhyate
parva vāstu upavāsa ādi kṛtsnam cāndreṇa gṛhyate
gṛhyate guru mānena prabhava ādi abda lakṣaṇam
tad tad māsaiḥ dvādaśabhiḥ tad tad aṣṭau bhavet tatas
guru madhyama cāreṇa ṣaṣṭi abdāḥ prabhāva ādayaḥ
prabhavaḥ vibhavaḥ śuklaḥ pramodaḥ tha prajāpatiḥ

original: aṅgirāḥ śrīmukho bhāvo yuvā dhātā tathaiva ca // NarP_1,56.115 //
analyzed: aṅgirāḥ śrīmukhaḥ bhāvaḥ yuvā dhātā tathā eva ca
īśvaraḥ bahudhānyaḥ ca pramāthī vikramaḥ vṛṣaḥ
citrabhānuḥ subhānuḥ ca tāraṇaḥ pārthivaḥ vyayaḥ
sarva jit sarva dhārī ca virodhī vikṛtaḥ kharaḥ
nandanaḥ vijayaḥ ca eva jayaḥ manmatha durmukhau
hemalaṃbaḥ vilaṃbaḥ ca vikārī śārvarī lavaḥ
śubha kṛt śobhanaḥ krodhī viśvāvasu parābhavau
plavaṅgaḥ kīlakaḥ saumyaḥ sāmāptaḥ ca virodhakṛt

original: paribhāvī pramādī ca ānando rākṣaso 'nalaḥ // NarP_1,56.119 //
analyzed: paribhāvī pramādī ca ānandaḥ rākṣasaḥ nalaḥ
piṅgalaḥ kāla yuktaḥ ca siddhārthaḥ raudra durmatīḥ
nāma tulya phalāḥ sarve vijñeyāḥ ṣaṣṭi vatsarāḥ
yugam syāt pañcabhiḥ varṣaiḥ yugāni evam tu dvādaśa
teṣām īśāḥ kramāt jñeyāḥ viṣṇuḥ devapurohitaḥ
purandaraḥ lohitaḥ ca tvaṣṭā ahirbudhnya saṃjñakaḥ
pitaraḥ ca tatas viśve śaśi indrāt agni yaśinaḥ bhagaḥ
tathā yugasya varṣe śāstu agninā indu vidhi īśvarāḥ
atha a dveśa camū nātha sasyapānām balābalam

original: tatkālaṃ grahacāraṃ ca samyak jñātvā phalaṃ padet // NarP_1,56.124 //
analyzed: tad kālam graha cāram ca samyak jñātvā phalam

original: ahaḥ surāṇāṃ tadrātriḥ karkādyaṃ dakṣiṇāyanam // NarP_1,56.125 //
analyzed: ahar surāṇām tat rātriḥ karka ādyam dakṣiṇāyanam
gṛha praveśa vaivāha pratiṣṭā maiñjibandhanam

original: madhādau maṅgalaṃ karma vidheyaṃ cottarāyaṇe // NarP_1,56.126 //
analyzed: madhā ādau maṅgalam karma vidheyam ca uttarāyaṇe
yāmya ayane garhitam ca karma yatnāt praśasyate

original: mādhādi māsau dvau dvau ca ṛtavaḥ śiśirādayaḥ // NarP_1,56.127 //
analyzed: mādha ādi māsau dvau dvau ca ṛtavaḥ śiśira ādayaḥ
mṛgāt śiśiḥ avasaṃtaḥ ca grīṣmāḥ syuḥ ca uttarāyaṇe

original: varṣā śaraśca hemantaḥ karkādvai dakṣiṇāyane // NarP_1,56.128 //
analyzed: varṣā śaraḥ ca hemantaḥ karkāt vai dakṣiṇāyane

original: cāndro darśīvadhiḥ sauraḥ saṃkrātyā sāvano dineḥ /
analyzed: cāndraḥ darśīvadhiḥ sauraḥ saṃkrātyā sāvanaḥ dineḥ
triṃśadbhiḥ candra bhagaṇaḥ māsaḥ nākṣatra saṃjñakaḥ
madhuḥ ca mādhavaḥ śukraḥ śuciḥ ca atha nabhaḥ tatas

original: nabhasya iṣa ūrjaśca sahāścaiva sahasyakaḥ // NarP_1,56.130 //
analyzed: nabhasyaḥ iṣaḥ ūrjaḥ ca sahāḥ ca eva sahasyakaḥ
tapāḥ tapasya kramaśas caitra ādīnām samāhvayā

original: yasminmāse paurṇamāsī yena dhiṣṇena saṃyutā // NarP_1,56.131 //
analyzed: yasmin māse paurṇamāsī yena dhiṣṇena saṃyutā
tad nakṣatra āhvayaḥ māsaḥ paurṇamāsī tad āhvayā

original: tatpakṣau daiva pitrākhyau śuklakṛṣṇau tathāpare // NarP_1,56.132 //
analyzed: tad pakṣau śukla kṛṣṇau tathā apare

original: śubhāśubhe karmaṇi ca praśastau bhavataḥ sadā /
analyzed: śubha aśubhe karmaṇi ca praśastau bhavataḥ sadā
kramāt tithīnām brahma agnī viriñci viṣṇu śailajāḥ
vināyaka yamau nāga candrau skanda ūrka vāsavau
candra viśvedarśa saṃjña tithi īśāḥ pitaraḥ smṛtāḥ
pūrṇāḥ syuḥ tithayaḥ punar
tris āvṛttyā kramāt jñeyāḥ na iṣṭa madhya iṣṭa dāḥ site
kṛṣṇa pakṣe tu iṣṭa madhyā aniṣṭa dāḥ kramaśas tadā

original: aṣṭamī dvādaśī ṣaṣṭī caturthī ca caturdaśī // NarP_1,56.137 //
analyzed: aṣṭamī dvādaśī ṣaṣṭī caturthī ca caturdaśī
tithayaḥ pakṣa randhra ākhyāḥ hi ati rūkṣā prakīrtitāḥ
samudra manu randhra aṅka tattva saṃkhyāḥ tu nāḍikāḥ

original: tyājyāḥ syustāsu tithiṣu kramātpañca ca sarvadā /
analyzed: tyājyāḥ syuḥ tāsu tithiṣu kramāt pañca ca sarvadā

original: amāvāsyā ca navamī hitvā viṣamasaṃjñikā // NarP_1,56.139 //
analyzed: amāvāsyā ca navamī hitvā viṣama saṃjñikā
tithayaḥ tu praśastāḥ asyuḥ madhyamā pratipad sitā

original: ṣaṣaaṭyāṃ tailaṃ tathāṣṭamyāṃ māsaṃ kṣauraṃ kalestithau // NarP_1,56.140 //
analyzed: ṣaṣaaṭyām tailam tathā aṣṭamyām māsam kṣauram kaleḥ tithau
pūrṇimā ādarśayoḥ nārī sevanam parivarjayet

original: derśe ṣaṣṭyāṃ pratipadi dvādaśyāṃ pratiparvasu // NarP_1,56.141 //
analyzed: derśe ṣaṣṭyām pratipadi dvādaśyām pratiparvasu
navamyām ca na kurvīta kadācid dantadhāvanam

original: vyatīpāte ca saṃkrāntāvekādaśyāṃ ca parvasu // NarP_1,56.142 //
analyzed: vyatīpāte ca saṃkrāntau ekādaśyām ca parvasu
arka bhauma dine ṣaṣṭyām na abhyaṅgaḥ vaidhṛtau tathā

original: yaḥ karoti daśamyāṃ ca snānamāmalakairnaraḥ // NarP_1,56.143 //
analyzed: yaḥ karoti daśamyām ca snānam āmalakaiḥ naraḥ
putra hāniḥ bhavet tasya traṃyodaśyām dhana kṣayaḥ
artha putra kṣayaḥ tasya dvitīyāyām na saṃśayaḥ

original: amāyāṃ ca navamyāṃ ca saptamyāṃ ca kulakṣayaḥ /
analyzed: amāyām ca navamyām ca saptamyām ca kula kṣayaḥ

original: yā paurṇimā divā candramatī sānumatī smṛtā // NarP_1,56.145 //
analyzed: yā paurṇimā divā candramatī sā anumatī smṛtā
rātrau candravatī rākā api amāvāsyā tathā dvidhā
sinīvālī ca indumatī kuhūḥ nā indumatī matā
kārtike śukla navamī tu ādiḥ kṛta yugasya ca
tretā ādiḥ mādhave śukle tṛtīyā puṇya saṃjñitā
kṛṣṇā pañcadaśī māghe dvāpara ādim udīritā
kalpādiḥ syāt kṛṣṇa pakṣe nabhaḥ tasya trayodaśī
dvādaśī ūrje śuklapakṣe navamī acchā īśvayuji api

original: caitre bhādrapade caiva tṛtīyā śuklasaṃjñitā // NarP_1,56.149 //
analyzed: caitre bhādrapade ca eva tṛtīyā śukla saṃjñitā
ekādaśī sitā pauṣe hi āṣāḍheḥ deśamī sitā

original: māghe ca saptamī śuklā nabhasye tvasitāṣṭamī // NarP_1,56.150 //
analyzed: māghe ca saptamī śuklā nabhasye tu asitā aṣṭamī
śrāvaṇe māsi amāvāsyā phaālgune māsi paurṇimā

original: āṣāḍhe kārtike māsi jyaṣṭe caitre ca paurṇimā // NarP_1,56.151 //
analyzed: āṣāḍhe kārtike māsi jyaṣṭe caitre ca paurṇimā
manu ādayaḥ mānavānām śrāddheṣu atyanta puṇya dā

original: bhādre kṛṣṇatrayodaśyāṃ maghāminduḥ kare raviḥ // NarP_1,56.152 //
analyzed: bhādre kṛṣṇa trayodaśyām maghām induḥ kare raviḥ
gajacchāyā tadā jñeyā śrāddhe hi atyanta puṇya dā
ekasmin vāsare tisraḥ tithayaḥ syāt tithi kṣayaḥ

original: tithirvāratraye tvekā hyadhikā dve ca nindite /
analyzed: tithiḥ vāra traye tu ekā hi adhikā dve ca nindite

original: sūryāstamanaparyantaṃ yasminvāre tu yā tithiḥ // NarP_1,56.154 //
analyzed: sūrya astamana paryantam yasmin vāre tu yā tithiḥ
vidyate sā tu akhaṇḍā syāt nyūnā ced khañja saṃjñitā
titheḥ pañcadaśaḥ bhāgaḥ kramāt pratipad ādayaḥ
kṣaṇa saṃjñāḥ tad arddhāni tāsām arddha pramāṇataḥ

original: raviḥ sthiraścaraścandraḥ krūro vakrokhilo budhaḥ // NarP_1,56.156 //
analyzed: raviḥ sthiraḥ caraḥ candraḥ krūraḥ vakra ukhilaḥ budhaḥ
laghuḥ ījyaḥ mṛduḥ śukraḥ trīkṣṇaḥ dinakara ātmajaḥ

original: abhyakto bhānuvāre yaḥ sa naraḥ kleśavānbhavet // NarP_1,56.157 //
analyzed: abhyaktaḥ bhānuvāre yaḥ sa naraḥ kleśavān bhavet
ṛkṣa īśe kānti bhāj bhaume vyādhi saubhāgyam indu je

original: jīve naivaṃ site hānirmande sarvasamṛddhayaḥ // NarP_1,56.158 //
analyzed: jīve nā evam site hāniḥ mande sarva samṛddhayaḥ
laṅkā udayāt syāt vāra ādiḥ tasmāt ūrdhvam adhas
deśa antara sva cara arddha nāḍībhiḥ apare bhavet
bala pradasya kheṭasya karma siddhi ati yat kṛtam

original: tatkarma balahīnasya duḥkhenāpi na siddhyāti // NarP_1,56.160 //
analyzed: tat karma bala hīnasya duḥkhena api na siddhyā ati
indu jña jīva śukrāṇām vāsarāḥ sarva karmasu
phala dāḥ tu itare krūre karmasu abhimata pradāḥ
rakta varṇau raviḥ candrau gauraḥ bhaumaḥ tu lohitaḥ

original: dūrvāvarṇo vudho jīvaḥ pītaśvetastu bhārgavaḥ // NarP_1,56.162 //
analyzed: dūrvā varṇaḥ vudhaḥ jīvaḥ pīta śvetaḥ tu bhārgavaḥ
kṛṣṇaḥ sauriḥ sva vāreṣu sva sva varṇa kriyāḥ hitāḥ
adri vāṇāḥ ca yaḥ tarka pātāla vasudhā dharāḥ
bāṇa agni locana ānihya vedabāhu śilīmukhāḥ
tri eka ahayaḥ netra gotra rāma aśvadra rasa ṛtavaḥ
kulikāḥ ca upakulikāḥ vāravelāḥ stathā
prahara arddha pramāṇāḥ te vijñeyāḥ sūrya vāsarāt
yasmin vāre kṣaṇaḥ vāra dṛṣṭaḥ tad vāsara adhipaḥ
ādyaḥ ṣaṣṭaḥ dvitīyaḥ smat tad ṣaṣṭhaḥ tu tṛtīyakaḥ
ṣaṣṭaḥ ṣaṣṭaḥ ca itareṣām kāla horā adhipāḥ smṛtāḥ
sārddha nāḍī dvayena eva divā rātrau yathākramāt
vāra prokte karma kārye tad grahasya kṣaṇe san
nakṣatra īśāḥ kramāt dasra yama vahni pitāmahāḥ
aryama arka tvaṣṭṛ marut śakra agni mitra vāsavaḥ
nairṛtya udaka viśveja govinda vasu toyapāḥ
ajā ekapād ahirbudhnyā pūṣā ca iti prakīrtitāḥ
pūrvā trayam

original: adhomukhaṃ tu navakaṃ bhānau tatra vidhīyate // NarP_1,56.171 //
analyzed: adhomukham tu navakam bhānau tatra vidhīyate
bila praveśa gaṇita bhūta sādhana lekhanam
śilpa karma kalā kūpa nikṣepa uddharaṇa ādi yat
mitra indu tvāṣṭra hasta indra aditi bhānti āśvi vāyubham

original: tiryaṅmukhākhyaṃ navakaṃ bhānau tatra vidhīyate // NarP_1,56.173 //
analyzed: tiryaṅmukha ākhyam navakam bhānau tatra vidhīyate
hala pravāha gamanam gantrī patra gaja uṣṭrakam
khara go ratha nau yāna lulāya haya karma ca
brahma viṣṇu maheśa ārya śata tārā vasu uttarāḥ

original: ūrddhāsyaṃ navakaṃ bhānāṃ proktamatra vidhīyate // NarP_1,56.175 //
analyzed: ūrddhāsyam navakam bhānām proktam atra vidhīyate
nṛpa abhiṣeka māṅgalya vāraṇa dhvaja karma ca
prāsāda toraṇa ārāma prākāra ādyam ca siddhi ati
sthiram rohiṇī uttara ākhyam kṣipram sūrayā aśvi puṣya bham

original: sādhāraṇaṃ dvidaivatyaṃ vahnibhaṃ ca prakīrtitam // NarP_1,56.177//
analyzed: sādhāraṇam dvidaivatyam vahnibham ca prakīrtitam
vasu aditi aṃvu puṣyāṇi viṣṇubham cara saṃjñitam
mṛdu indu mitra citra antyam ugram pūrvā maghā trikam
citra āditya aṃbu viṣṇu aṃba antya adhimitra vasu uḍuṣu
sa mṛga ijyeṣu bālānām karṇavedhaṅkriyā hitā
dasra indu aditi tiṣyeṣu kara ādi tritaye tathā
gajakarma akhilam yat tat vidheyam sthira bheṣu ca
vāji karma akhilam kāryam sūryavāre viśeṣataḥ
citrāvaruṇa vairiñca tri uttarāsu gama agamam

original: darśāṣṭabhyāṃ caturdaśyāṃ paśūnāṃ na kadācana // NarP_1,56.182 //
analyzed: darśa aṣṭabhyām caturdaśyām paśūnām na kadācana
mṛdu dhruva kṣipra cara viśākhā pitṛ bheṣu ca
hala pravāham prathamam vidadhyāt mūlabhe vṛṣaiḥ
ha l ādau vṛṣa anāśāya bha trayam sūrya mukta bhāt

original: agre vṛddhyai trayaṃ lakṣmye saumyapārśve ca pañcakam // NarP_1,56.184 //
analyzed: agre vṛddhyai trayam lakṣmye saumya pārśve ca pañcakam
śūla traye api navakam maraṇāya ca pañcakam

original: śriyai puṣṭyai trayaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ syāccakre lāṅgalāhvaye // NarP_1,56.185 //
analyzed: śriyai puṣṭyai trayam śreṣṭham syāt cakre lāṅgala āhvaye
mṛdu dhruva kṣi prabheṣu pitṛ vāyu vasu ūṅṣu
bīja uptiḥ atyuntkṛṣṭam phala pradā
bhavet bha tritayam mūrghni dhānya nāśāya

original: gale trayaṃ kajjalāya vṛddhyai ca dvādaśodare // NarP_1,56.187 //
analyzed: gale trayam kajjalāya vṛddhyai ca dvādaśa udare
nistaṃhula tvam lāṅgūle bha catuṣṭaya bhīti dam

original: nābhau vahniḥ pañcakaṃ yadvījoptāviti cintayet // NarP_1,56.188 //
analyzed: nābhau vahniḥ pañcakam yat vīja uptau iti cintayet
sthireṣu aditi sārpa antya pitṛ māruta bheṣu ca
na kuryāt roga muktasya snānam āhīm du śukrayoḥ
uttarā traya maitra indra vasu vāruṇa bheṣu ca
puṣya arka pauṣṇa dhiṣṇyeṣu nṛtya āraṃbhaḥ praśasyate
pūrva arddha yuñji ṣaṅ bhani pauṣṇabhāt udabhāt tatas
madhyayuñji dvādaśa ṛkṣāṇi indrabhāt nava bhāni ca
kramaśas saṃprītiḥ dampateḥ mathaḥ
jaghanyāḥ toya pārdra ahi pavana antaka nākapāḥ
krama aditi dvi daivatyāḥ bṛhat tārāḥ parāḥ samāḥ
tāsām pramāṇa ghaṭikāḥ triṃśat navati di aṣṭayaḥ
kramāt abhyudite candre nayati argha samāni ca
aśvagri indvījya nairṛtya tvāṣṭra jatti uttarābhavāḥ
pitṛ dvi daiva vasu ākhyāḥ tārāḥ syuḥ kula saṃjñikāḥ
dhātṛ jyeṣṭa aditi svātī pauṣṇa arka hari devatāḥ
aja ahi antyaka bhaujaṅga tārāḥ ca eva ākula āhvayāḥ
śeṣāḥ kulākulāḥ tārāḥ tāsām madhye kuloḍuṣu
prayāti yadi bhūpālaḥ tadā āpnoti parājayam
bheṣu upa kula saṃjñeṣu jayam āpnoti niścitam
saṃdhiḥ vā api tayoḥ sāmyam kula ākula gaṇa uḍuṣu
arka ārki bhauma vāre ced bhadrāyāḥ viṣama aṅghri bham
tri puṣkaram triguṇa dam dviguṇam yamala ahi bham
tat yāt tad doṣa nāśāya gotrayam mūlyam eva vā
dvi puṣkare dvayam dadyāt na doṣaḥ vā

original: krūraviddho yuto vāpipuṣyo yadi balānvitaḥ // NarP_1,56.200 //
analyzed: krūra viddhaḥ yutaḥ vā apipuṣyaḥ yadi bala anvitaḥ
vinā pāṇigraham sarva maṅgaleṣu iṣṭa daḥ sadā
rāma agni ṛtu bāṇa agni bhūveda agni śareṣu ca

akṣa sūtram gadā padmam śaṅkham go kṣīra sannibham

original: khaḍgaṃ śūlaṃ ca bāṇaṃ ca nṛhariṃ rudrarūpiṇam // NarP_1,71.55 //
analyzed: khaḍgam śūlam ca bāṇam ca nṛharim rudra rūpiṇam
indragopa ābha nīla ābham candra ābham svarṇa sannibham
pūrva ādi ca uttaram yāvat ūddhva ārsyam sarva varṇakam
evam dhyātvā japet mantrī sarva vyādhi vimuktaye
sarva mṛtyu haram divya smaraṇāt sarva siddhi dam
dhyāyet yadā mahāt karma tadā ṣoḍaśa hastavān
dvau vidāraṇa karma āptau dvau ca antra uddharaṇa anvitau

original: śaṅkhacacakradharau dvau tu dvau ca bāṇaghanurddharau // NarP_1,71.59 //
analyzed: śaṅkha ca cakra dharau dvau tu dvau ca bāṇa ghanuḥ dharau

original: pāśāṅkuśadharau dvau ca dvau ripormukuṭārpitau // NarP_1,71.60 //
analyzed: pāśa aṅkuśa dharau dvau ca dvau ripoḥ mukuṭa arpitau
iti ṣoḍaśa dos daṇḍa maṇḍitam nṛharim vibhum
dhyāyet nārada nīla ābham ugra karma maṇi an anya dhīḥ
dhyeyaḥ mahatame kārye dvātriṃśat hastavān budhaiḥ

original: halaṃ ca muśalaṃ caiva abhayaṃ cāṅkuśaṃ tathā // NarP_1,71.63 //
analyzed: halam ca muśalam ca eva abhayam ca aṅkuśam tathā

original: vāmabhāge karaiḥ śaṃṅkhaṃ kheṭaṃ pāśaṃ ca śūlakam // NarP_1,71.64 //

original: agniṃ ca varadaṃ śaktiṃ kuṇḍikāṃ ca tataḥ param /
analyzed: agnim ca vara dam śaktim kuṇḍikām ca tatas param

dvābhyām karābhyām ca ripoḥ jānu mastaka pīḍanam
ūrddhvīkṛtābhyām bāhubhyām āntra mālā dharam vibhum

original: priyaṅkaraṃ ca bhaktānāṃ daityānāṃ ca bhayaṅkaram // NarP_1,71.67 //
analyzed: priyaṅkaram ca bhaktānām daityānām ca bhayaṅkaram

evam dhyātvā japet mantrī sarva kārya artha siddhaye
athā ucyate dhyānam anyat mukha roga haram śubham

koṭi pūrṇa indu varṇam ca su mukham tri akṣi vīkṣaṇam
pīta vastra ūru bhūṣā āḍhyam nṛsiṃham śānta vigraham
cakra śaṅkha abhaya varān dadhatam kara pallavaiḥ

original: śatroḥ senānirodhena yatnaṃ kuryāñca sādhakam // NarP_1,71.71 //
analyzed: śatroḥ senā nirodhena yatnam kuryāt ca sādhakam

original: ripuṃ khādanniva japennirdahanniva taṃ kṣipet // NarP_1,71.73 //
analyzed: ripum khādan iva japet nirdahan iva tam kṣipet

original: smṛtvā japaṃ praklarvīta yāvadāyāti sā punaḥ // NarP_1,71.75 //
analyzed: smṛtvā japam yāvat āyāti sā punar
nirjatya nikhilān śatrūn saha vīra śriyā asukhāt

original: yadi mantrī na tuṣyeta tadānartho mahīpateḥ // NarP_1,71.77 //
analyzed: yadi mantrī na tuṣyeta tadā anarthaḥ mahīpateḥ

nāśayet mūṣikā lūtā vṛścika ādi utthitam viṣam

original: liptāṅgaḥ sarvarogaiśca mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,71.79 //

original: kruddhasya sannidhau rājño japedaṣṭottaraṃ śatam // NarP_1,71.81 //
analyzed: kruddhasya sannidhau rājñaḥ japet aṣṭa uttaram śatam
sadyas nairmalyam āpnoti prasādam ca adhigacchati
kunda prasūnaiḥ udayam mocābhiḥ vighna nāśanam
tulasī patra homena mahatīm kīrtim āpnuyāt
śāli uttha saktu homena vaśayet akhilam jagat
madhūka puṣpaiḥ iṣṭam syāt staṃbhanam dhātri khaṇḍakaiḥ

original: juhuyā dayutaṃ yo 'sau śataṃ jīvati rogajit /
analyzed: juhuyāḥ dayutam sau śatam jīvati roga jit

original: atha te saṃpravakṣyāmi yantraṃ trailokyamohanam // NarP_1,71.86 //

original: madhye siṃhe svabījaṃ ca likhetpūrvavadeva tu /
analyzed: madhye siṃhe sva bījam ca likhet pūrvavat eva tu
śrī bījena tu valaya traya saṃyutam

original: dhāraṇājjayamāpnoti satyaṃ satyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,71.90 //
analyzed: dhāraṇāt jayam āpnoti satyam satyam na saṃśayaḥ

original: atha yantrāntaraṃ vakṣye śṛṇu nārada siddhidam /
analyzed: atha yantra antaram vakṣye śṛṇu nārada siddhi dam

original: aṣṭāraṃ vilikhedyantraṃ ślakṣṇaṃ karṇikayā yutam // NarP_1,71.91 //
analyzed: aṣṭa āram vilikhet yantram ślakṣṇam karṇikayā yutam

original: ekākṣaraṃ nārasiṃhaṃ madhye caiva sasādhyakam // NarP_1,71.92 //
analyzed: ekākṣaram nārasiṃham madhye ca eva sa sādhyakam

original: kaṇṭhe bhuje śikhāyāṃ vā dhārayedyantramuttamam // NarP_1,71.94 //
analyzed: kaṇṭhe bhuje śikhāyām vā dhārayet yantram uttamam
nara nārī naredrāḥ ca sarve syuḥ vaśagāḥ bhuvi
duṣṭāḥ tam na eva bādhante piśāca uraga rākṣasāḥ

atha anyat saṃpravakṣyāmi yantram sarva vaśaṅkaram
dvādaśa aram mahā cakram pūrvavat vilikhet sudhīḥ

original: madhye mantraṃ śaktiyuktaṃ śrībījena tu veṣṭayeta /

original: yasya dhāraṇamātreṇa sarvatra vijayī bhavet // NarP_1,71.99 //

atha sarva iṣṭa dam jvālāmāli saṃjñam vadāmi aham

original: trāya sarvādirakṣoghnāya ca naḥ sarvabhūpadam // NarP_1,71.101 //

rakṣa yugmam ca varma astra ṭha dūya antaḥ dhruva ādikaḥ

paṅktibhiḥ rudra asaṃkhyākaiḥ aṣṭādaśabhiḥ akṣaraiḥ
bhānubhiḥ karaṇaiḥ mantrī varaiḥ aṅgāni kalpayet
pūrva ukta rūpiṇam nṛharim smaret
lakṣam japaḥ daśa aṃśam ca juhuyāt kapilā ghṛtaiḥ
raudra apasmāra bhūta ādi nāśakaḥ yam manu uttamaḥ

muniḥ brahmā tathā chandaḥ paṅktiḥ devaḥ nṛkesarī
ṣaṣ dīrgha bhājā bījena ṣaṣ aṅgāni samācaret
pūrva uktena eva vidhinā dhyānam pūjām samācaret

ramā bīja ādikaḥ nuṣṭubh trayastriṃśa arṇavāt manuḥ

original: vinyasyaivaṃ tu pañcāṅgaṃ svātmarakṣāṃ samācaret // NarP_1,71.111 //

original: praṇavo hṛcchivāryanti mahate śarabhāya ca // NarP_1,71.112 //

original: keśavaḥ pātu pādau me jaṅghe nārāyaṇo 'vatu // NarP_1,71.114 //
analyzed: keśavaḥ pātu pādau me jaṅghe nārāyaṇaḥ vatu

original: givindo dakṣiṇe pārśve dhanvī candraprabho mahān // NarP_1,71.120 //

original: vidyutprabho hṛṣīkeśa urddhū pātu samudgaraḥ // NarP_1,71.123 //
analyzed: vidyutprabhaḥ hṛṣīkeśaḥ pātu sa mudgaraḥ

original: sa bāhyābhyantare dehamavyāddāmo daro hariḥ // NarP_1,71.125 //

original: itthaṃ saṃprārthya japtvā ca paṭitvā visṛjedvibhum // NarP_1,71.129 //
analyzed: ittham saṃprārthya japtvā ca paṭitvā visṛjet vibhum

original: evaṃ siddhe manau mantrī jāyate sampadāṃ padam /
analyzed: evam siddhe manau mantrī jāyate sampadām padam
jaya dvayam śrī nṛsiṃha iti aṣṭa arṇaḥ yam manu uttamaḥ
muniḥ brahmā atha gāyatrī chandaḥ proktā u sya devatā
sa iṃdu gorvida pūrveṇa viyatā sa indunā punar

original: ṣaḍvīrghāḍhye na kurvīta ṣaḍaṅgāni viśāladhīḥ // NarP_1,71.132 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ vīrgha āḍhye na kurvīta ṣaḍ aṅgāni viśāla dhīḥ

original: tato dhyāyeddhṛdi vibhuṃ nṛsiṃhaṃ candraśekharam // NarP_1,71.133 //
analyzed: tatas dhyāyet hṛdi vibhum nṛsiṃham candraśekharam

original: vahnīndutīvrakaranetra pinākapāṇe śītāṃśuśekhara rameśvara pāhi viṣṇo // NarP_1,71.134 //
analyzed: vahni indu tīvra kara netra pinākapāṇe śītāṃśu śekhara rameśvara pāhi viṣṇo

mahā viṣṇu tatas brūyāt jvalantam sarvatomukham

original: vadeddhorataraṃ te tu tanurūpaṃ ca ṭhadvayam // NarP_1,71.137 //
analyzed: vadet horataram te tu tanu rūpam ca ṭha dvayam

original: chandasī ca tathā ghoranṛsiṃho devatā mataḥ // NarP_1,71.140 //
analyzed: chandasī ca tathā ghora nṛsiṃhaḥ devatā mataḥ
dhyāna arcana ādikam ca asya kuryāt ānuṣṭubham sudhīḥ
viśeṣāt mantra varyaḥ yam sarva rakṣā karaḥ mataḥ
bījam jaya yugam paścāt nṛsiṃha iti aṣṭa varṇavān
ṛṣiḥ prajāpatiḥ ca asya anuṣṭubh chandaḥ udāhṛtam

original: jaṃ bījaṃ haṃ tathā śaktirviniyogo 'khilāptaye // NarP_1,71.143 //
analyzed: jaṃ bījam haṃ tathā śaktiḥ viniyogaḥ khila āptaye
dīrgha āḍhyena nṛsiṃhena ṣaḍaṅganyāsam ācaret

original: raudraṃ dhyāyennṛsiṃhaṃ tu śatruvakṣo vidāraṇam // NarP_1,71.144 //
analyzed: raudram dhyāyet nṛsiṃham tu śatru vakṣaḥ vidāraṇam

muniḥ brahmā samākhyātaḥ nuṣṭubh chandaḥ samīritaḥ
devatā asya divya pūrvaḥ nṛ kesarī
pādaiḥ caturbhiḥ sarveṇa pañcāṅgāni samācaret
dhyāna pūjā ādikam sarvam prāgvat proktam muni īśvara

original: pūrvoktāni ca sarvāṇi kāryāṇyāyānti siddhatām // NarP_1,71.148 //
analyzed: pūrva uktāni ca sarvāṇi kāryāṇi āyānti siddha tām

original: tāro namo bhagavate narasiṃhāya hṛñca te /

original: tamo grasadvayaṃ paścātsvāhānte cābhayaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,71.150 //
analyzed: tamaḥ grasa dvayam paścāt svāhā ante ca abhayam tatas

original: ātmanyante ca bhūyiṣṭā dhruvo bījāntimo manuḥ /

original: tāro nṛsiṃhabījaṃ ca namo bhagavate tataḥ /
analyzed: tāraḥ nṛsiṃha bījam ca namaḥ bhagavate tatas

original: narasiṃhāya tāraśca bījamasya yadā tataḥ // NarP_1,71.152 //
analyzed: narasiṃhāya tāraḥ ca bījam asya yadā tatas

analyzed: evam dhyātvā japet varṇam lakṣam matrī daśa aṃśataḥ
ghṛta aktaiḥ pāyasaiḥ hutvā yajanam pūrvavat caret
praṇavaḥ hṛdayam sītā pataye tad anantaram
rāmāya hana yugma ante varma astra agni priya antimaḥ
ekonaviṃśat varṇaḥ yam mantraḥ sarva artha sādhakaḥ
viśvāmitraḥ muniḥ ca asya anuṣṭubh chandaḥ udāhṛtam

original: devatā rāmabhadro jaṃ bījaṃ śaktirnama iti /
analyzed: devatā rāmabhadraḥ jam bījam śaktiḥ namaḥ iti
mantra utthitaiḥ kramāt varṇaiḥ tatas dhyāyet ca pūrvavat
pūjanam kāmya karma ādi sarvam asya ṣaṣ arṇa vat

original: tāraḥ svabījaṃ kamalā rāmabhadreti saṃpaṭhet // NarP_1,73.90 //
analyzed: tāraḥ sva bījam kamalā rāmabhadrā iti saṃpaṭhet
mahā iṣvāsa pada ante tu raghu vīra nṛpa uttama

original: daśāsyāntakaśabdānte māṃ rakṣa dehi saṃpaṭhet // NarP_1,73.91 //
analyzed: daśa asya antaka śabda ante mām rakṣa dehi saṃpaṭhet
parama ante me śriyam syāt mantraḥ bāṇa guṇa akṣaraḥ
bījaiḥ viyuktaḥ dvātriṃśat arṇaḥ yam phala dāyakaḥ
viśvāmitraḥ muniḥ ca asya anuṣṭubh chandaḥ udāhṛtam

original: devatā rāmabhadro 'tra bījaṃ svaṃ śaktirindirā // NarP_1,73.93 //
analyzed: devatāḥ bījam svam śaktiḥ indirā
bīja traya ādyaiḥ kurvīta padaiḥ sarveṇa mantra vid
pañcāṅgāni ca vinyasya mantra varṇān kramāt nyaset

original: mūrdhni bhāle dṛśoḥ śrotre gaṇḍayugme sanāsike /
analyzed: mūrdhni bhāle dṛśoḥ śrotre gaṇḍa yugme sa nāsike
āsye dos saṃdhi yugale stana hṛd nābhiṣu kramāt
kaṭau meḍhre pāyu pāda saṃdhiṣu arṇān nyaset manoḥ
dhyāna arcana ādikam ca asya pūrvavat samupācaret
lakṣa trayam puraścaryām pāyasaiḥ havanam matam

original: dhyātvā rāmaṃ pītavarṇaṃ japellakṣaṃ samāhitaḥ // NarP_1,73.97 //
analyzed: dhyātvā rāmam pīta varṇam japet lakṣam samāhitaḥ
daśa aṃśam kamalaiḥ hutvā dhanaiḥ dhanapatiḥ bhavet

original: tāro māyā ramādvandvaṃ dāśarathāya hṛñca vai // NarP_1,73.98 //
analyzed: tāraḥ māyā ramā dvandvam dāśarathāya vai
ekādaśa akṣaraḥ mantraḥ muni ādi arcā asya pūrvavat

original: trailokyānte tu nāthāya hṛdanto vasuvarṇavān // NarP_1,73.99 //
analyzed: trailokya ante tu nāthāya hṛd antaḥ vasu varṇavān
asya api pūrvavat sarvam nyāsa dhyāna arcana ādikam
āñjaneya pada ante tu gurave hṛdaya antimaḥ
mantraḥ nava akṣaraḥ yajanam pūrvavat matam
ṅetam rāma pada paścāt hṛdayam
muni dhyāna arcanam ca asya proktam sarvam ṣaṣ arṇa vat

original: rāmānte candrabhadrau ca ṅeṃtau pāvakavallabhā // NarP_1,73.102 //
analyzed: rāma ante candra bhadrau ca ṅeṃtau pāvaka vallabhā

original: mantro dvau ca samākhyātau munyādyarcādi pūrvavat /
analyzed: mantraḥ dvau ca samākhyātau muni ādi arcā ādi pūrvavat
vahniḥ śeṣa anvitaḥ ca eva candra bhūṣita mastakaḥ
eka akṣaraḥ raghu pateḥ mantraḥ paraḥ

original: brahmā muniḥ syādgāyatrī chando rāmo 'sya devatā // NarP_1,73.104 //
analyzed: brahmā muniḥ syāt gāyatrī chandaḥ rāmaḥ u sya devatā
ṣaṣ dīrgha āḍhyena mantreṇa ṣaṣ aṅgāni samācaret
sarayū tīra mandāra vedikā paṅkaja āsane
śyāmam vīrāsana āsīnam jñāna mudrā upaśobhitam
vāma ūru nyastam tad hastam sītā lakṣmaṇa saṃyutam
ātmānam manmatha amita tejasam
śuddha sphaṭika saṃkāśam kevalam mokṣa kāṅkṣayā
cintayet paramātmānam ṛtu lakṣam japet manum
sarvvam ṣaṣ arṇavam ca asya homa nitya arcana ādikam

original: vahniḥ śeṣāsano bhāntaḥ kevalo dvyakṣaro manuḥ /
analyzed: vahniḥ śeṣāsanaḥ bhāntaḥ kevalaḥ dvi akṣaraḥ manuḥ
ekākṣara ukta vat sarvam muni dhyāna arcana ādikam
tāra mānāra mānaṅga ca astra bījaiḥ dvi varṇakaḥ
tri akṣaraḥ mantrarājaḥ syāt ṣaḍvidhaḥ sakala iṣṭa daḥ
vdi akṣaraḥ candra bhadra antaḥ dvividhaḥ catur akṣaraḥ
ekārṇa ukta vat eteṣām muni dhyāna arcana ādikam
tāraḥ rāmaḥ caturthī antaḥ varma astram vahnivallabhā
aṣṭa arṇaḥ yam mahā mantraḥ muni ādi arcā ṣaṣ arṇa vat
tāraḥ mayā hṛd ante syāt rāmāya praṇava antimaḥ
śiva umā ārāma mantraḥ yam aṣṭa arṇaḥ sarva siddhi daḥ

original: ṛṣiḥ sadāśivaḥ prokto gāyatrī chanda īritam /
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ sadāśivaḥ proktaḥ gāyatrī chandaḥ īritam
śiva umā ārāmacandraḥ devatā parikīrtitaḥ
ṣaṣ vīryayā amāya yātu dhruva pañca arṇa yuktayā
ṣaḍaṅgāni vidhāya atha dhyāyet hṛdi sura arcitam
rāmam trinetram soma arddha dhāriṇam śūlinam varam
bhasma uddhūlita sarva aṅgam kaparddinam upāsmahe
rāma abhirāmam saindarya sīmām soma avataṃsinīm
pāśa aṅkuśa dhanuḥ bāṇa dharām dhyāyet tri locanām
evam dhyātvā japet varṇa lakṣam trimadhura anvitaiḥ
bilpa patraiḥ phalaiḥ puṣpaiḥ tilaiḥ vā paṅkajaiḥ hunet
svayam āyānti nidhayaḥ siddhayaḥ ca sura īpsitāḥ
tāraḥ māyā ca bharata agraja rāma manobhavaḥ
vahnijāyā dvādaśa arṇaḥ mantraḥ paraḥ

original: aṅgirāśca muniśchando gāyatrī devatā punaḥ // NarP_1,73.120 //
analyzed: aṅgirāḥ ca muniḥ chandaḥ gāyatrī devatā punar
candra eka muni bhūnetraiḥ mantra arṇaiḥ aṅga kalpanam
dhyāna pūjā ādikam ca āḥ ca sarvam kuryāt ṣaṣ arṇa vat

original: praṇavo hṛdayaṃ sītāpate rāmaśca ṅeṃtimaḥ // NarP_1,73.122 //
analyzed: praṇavaḥ hṛdayam sītā pate rāmaḥ ca ṅeṃtimaḥ
hana dvaya ante varma astram mantraḥ ṣoḍaśa varṇavān

original: agastyo 'sya muniśchando bṛhatī devatā punaḥ // NarP_1,73.123 //
analyzed: agastyaḥ sya muniḥ chandaḥ bṛhatī devatā punar

original: śrīrāmo 'haṃ tathā bījaṃ rāṃ śaktiḥ samudīritā /
analyzed: śrī rāmaḥ haṃ tathā bījam rām śaktiḥ samudīritā
dhyāna pūjā ādikam sarvam asya kuryāt ṣaṣ arṇa vat
tāraḥ brahmaṇya sevyāya padam īrayet
rāmāyākuṇṭha śabda antam tejase ca samīrayet
uttamaśloka dhuryāya svam bhṛguḥ kāmika anvitaḥ
daṇḍa arpitām priye mantraḥ rāma rāma akṣaraḥ mataḥ
ṛṣiḥ śukraḥ tathā anuṣṭubh chandaḥ devatā
pādaiḥ sarveṇa pañcāṅgam kuryāt śeṣam ṣaṣ arṇa vat

original: lakṣaṃ japo daśāṃśena juhuyātpāyasaiḥ sudhīḥ // NarP_1,73.128 //
analyzed: lakṣam japaḥ daśa aṃśena juhuyāt pāyasaiḥ sudhīḥ
siddha mantrasya bhuktiḥ syāt muktiḥ pātaka nāśanam
ādau dāśarathāya ante vidmahe padam uccaret

original: tanno rāmaḥ proco varṇo dayāditi ca saṃvadet // NarP_1,73.130 //
analyzed: tat naḥ rāmaḥ procaḥ varṇaḥ dayāt iti ca saṃvadet
eṣā ukta arā ma gāyatrī sarva abhīṣṭa phala pradā
padmāsītā padam ṅetam ṭha dvaya antaḥ ṣaṣ akṣaraḥ
vālmīkiḥ ca muniḥ chandaḥ gāyatrī devatā punar

original: sītā bhagavatī proktā śrīṃ bījaṃ vahnisundarī // NarP_1,73.132 //
analyzed: sītā bhagavatī proktā śrīṃ bījam vahnisundarī
śaktiḥ ṣaṣ dīrgha yuktena bījena aṅgāni kalpayet
tatas dhyāyan mahādevīm sītām trailokya pūjitām
tapta hāṭaka varṇa ābhām padma yugmam kara dvaye
sat ratna bhūṣaṇa sphūrjat divya dehām śubha ātmikām
nānā vastrām śaśi mukhīm padma akṣīm mudita antarām

original: paśyantīṃ rāghavaṃ puṇyaṃ śayyārdhyāṃ ṣaḍguṇeśvarīm // NarP_1,73.135 //
analyzed: paśyantīm rāghavam puṇyam śayyā ardhyām ṣaḍguṇa īśvarīm

original: juhuyātkamalaiḥ phullaiḥ pīṭhe pūrvodite yajet // NarP_1,73.136 //
analyzed: juhuyāt kamalaiḥ phullaiḥ pīṭhe pūrva udite yajet
mūrtim saṃkalpya mūlena tasyām āvāhya jānakīm

pṛṣaṭe lakṣmaṇam abhyarcya ṣaṭkoṇeṣu aṅga pūjanam
patreṣu mantri mukhyan ca bāhye loka īśvarān punar
vajra ādyān api saṃpūjya sarva siddhi īśvaraḥ bhavet
jātī puṣpaiḥ candana aktaiḥ rāja vaśyāya homayet
kamalaiḥ dhana dhānya āptiḥ nīla abjaiḥ vaśayan jagat
bilva patraiḥ śriyaḥ prāptyai dūrvā bhīroḥ ā śāntaye
kim saubhāgyam putrān pautrān param sukham

original: dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ ca mokṣaṃ ca sītārādhanato labhet // NarP_1,73.141 //

original: agastyo 'sya muniśchando gāyatrī devatā punaḥ // NarP_1,73.142 //
analyzed: agastyaḥ sya muniḥ chandaḥ gāyatrī devatā punar
lakṣmaṇa ākhyaḥ mahā vīraḥ ca āḍhyam hṛd vīja śaktike
ṣaṣ dīrgha āḍhyena bījena ṣaṣ aṅgāni samācaret
dvi bhujam svarṇa rucura tanum padma nibha īkṣaṇam
dhanuḥ bāṇa karam rāma sevā saṃsakta mānasam

madhu āktaiḥ pāyasaiḥ hutvā rāma pīṭhe prapūjayeta
rāma vat yajanam ca asya sarva siddhi pradaḥ hi ayam

tena yatnena karttavyam lakṣmaṇa arcanam ādarāt
śrī rāmacandra bhedāḥ tu bahavaḥ saṃti siddhi dāḥ

original: aṣṭottarasahasraṃ vā śataṃ vā susamāhitaiḥ // NarP_1,73.148 //
analyzed: aṣṭottarasahasram vā śatam vā su samāhitaiḥ

original: ajaptvā lakṣmaṇamanuṃ rāmamantrān japanti ye // NarP_1,73.149 //

original: na teṣāṃ jāyate siddhirhānireva pade pade /
analyzed: na teṣām jāyate siddhiḥ hāniḥ eva pade pade
yaḥ japet lakṣmaṇa manum nityam ekāntam āsthitaḥ

jaya pradhānaḥ mantraḥ yam rājya prāptyā eka sādhanam

original: so 'cirānnaṣṭarājyaṃ svaṃ prāpnotyeva na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,73.152 //
analyzed: saḥ cirāt naṣṭa rājyam svam prāpnoti eva na saṃśayaḥ
dhyāyan rāmam ayodhyāyām abhiṣikta mananya dhīḥ
pañca ayutam manum japtvā naṣṭa rājyam avāpnuyāt

ayutam prajapet mantram nigaḍāt mucyate dhruvam
vātātmajena ānītābhiḥ oṣadhībhiḥ gata vyatham
dhyātvā lakṣam japan mantram alpa mṛtyum jayet dhuvam

original: durjayaṃ vāpi vegena jayedripukulaṃ mahat // NarP_1,73.156 //
analyzed: durjayam vā api vegena jayet ripu kulam mahat
dhyātvā śūrpaṇakhā nāsā chedana udyukta mānasam

rāma pāda abja sevā artham kṛta udyogam atho smaran
prajapat laṅkṣam ekānte mahā rogāt pramucyate
tri māsam vijita āhāraḥ nityam sapta sahasrakam
aṣṭottaraśataiḥ puṣpaiḥ niśchedraiḥ śātapatrakaiḥ
pūjayitvā vidhānena pāyasam ca sa śarkaram
nivedya prajapet mantram kuṣṭa rogāt pranucyate

original: kṣayarogātpramucyeta satyaṃ satyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,73.161 //
analyzed: kṣaya rogāt pramucyeta satyam satyam na saṃśayaḥ

original: trisaṃdhyaṃ vā pibennityaṃ mucyate sarvarogataḥ // NarP_1,73.162 //
analyzed: tri saṃdhyam vā pibet nityam mucyate sarva rogataḥ
dāridrayam ca parābhūtam jāyate dhanada upamaḥ
viṣa ādi doṣa saṃsparśaḥ na bhavet tu kadācana
manunā mantritaiḥ toyaiḥ pratyeham kṣālayet mukham
mukha netra ādi saṃbhūtān jayet dvrogān ca dāruṇān
pītvā abhimantritam tu aṃbhaḥ kukṣi rogān jayet dhruvam
lakṣmaṇa pratimām kṛtvā dadyāt bhaktyā vidhānataḥ

original: sa sarvebhyo 'tha rogebhyo mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: sa sarvebhyaḥ rogebhyaḥ mucyate na atra saṃśayaḥ
kanyā arthī vimalā pāṇigrahaṇa āsakta mānasaḥ

original: īpsitāṃ labhate kanyāṃ śīgrameva na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,73.167 //
analyzed: īpsitām labhate kanyām śīgram eva na saṃśayaḥ

original: dhyātvā ca vidhivannityaṃ japenmāsatrayaṃ manum // NarP_1,73.168 //
analyzed: dhyātvā ca vidhivat nityam japet māsa trayam manum

original: sarvāsāmapi vidyānāṃ tattvajño jāyate naraḥ // NarP_1,73.169 //
analyzed: sarvāsām api vidyānām tattva jñaḥ jāyate naraḥ

original: dhyāyaṃllakṣaṃ japenmantraṃ mucyate mahato bhayāt // NarP_1,73.170 //
analyzed: dhyāyan lakṣam japet mantram mucyate mahataḥ bhayāt
kṛta nityakriyaḥ śuddhaḥ tri kālam prajapet manum

original: sarvapāpavinirmukto yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam // NarP_1,73.171 //
analyzed: sarva pāpa vinirmuktaḥ yāti viṣṇoḥ param padam
dīkṣitaḥ vidhivat mantrī guṇaiḥ vigata kalmaṣaḥ
su ācāra niyataḥ dāntaḥ gṛhasthaḥ vijita indriyaḥ
aihikān an apekṣya eva niṣkāmaḥ yaḥ urcayet vibhum
sa sarvān puṇya pāpa odhān dagdhvā nirmala mānasaḥ
punarāvṛtti rahitaḥ śāśvatam padam aśvatam padam aśnute

original: sakāmo vāñchitān labdhvā bhuktvā bhogān manogatān // NarP_1,73.174 //
analyzed: sa kāmaḥ vāñchitān labdhvā bhuktvā bhogān manaḥ gatān

original: jātiramaraściraṃ bhūtvā yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam /
analyzed: jātiḥ amaraḥ ciram bhūtvā yāti viṣṇoḥ param padam
nidrā candra anvitā paścāt bharatāya hṛd antimaḥ
sapta akṣaraḥ manuḥ ca asya muni ādi arcā ādi pūrvavat

original: bakaḥ seṃduśca śatrudhnaparaṃ ṅetaṃ hṛdantimaḥ // NarP_1,73.176 //
analyzed: bakaḥ sa iṃduḥ ca śatru dhna param ṅetam hṛd antimaḥ
sapta akṣaraḥ yam śatrudhna mantraḥ sarva iṣṭa siddhi daḥ

original: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge buhadupākhyāne sanatkumāravibhāge tṛtīyapāde rāmādyupāsanāvarṇanaṃ nāma trisaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī bṛhat nāradīyapurāṇe pūrva bhāge buhat upākhyāne sanatkumāra vibhāge tṛtīya pāde rāmādyupāsanāvarṇanam nāma trisaptatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
sanatkumāraḥ uvāca
atha ucyante hanumataḥ mantrāḥ sarva iṣṭa dāyakāḥ
yān samārādhya vipra indra tad tulya ācaraṇāḥ narāḥ
manuḥ gaganam ca bhaga anvitāḥ
sva pha agnayaḥ bhaga indu āḍhyāḥ tṛtīyam bījam īritam
viyat bhṛgu agni manu indu yuktam syāt ca caturthakam
pañcamam bhaga candra āḍhyā viyat bhṛgu svaka agnayaḥ

original: manvindvāḍhyau hasau ṣaṣṭaṃ ṅeṃtaḥ syāddhanumāṃstataḥ // NarP_1,74.4 //
analyzed: manu indu āḍhyau hasau ṣaṣṭam syāt hanumān tatas
hṛdaya antaḥ mahā mantrarājaḥ yam dvādaśa akṣaraḥ
rāmacandraḥ muniḥ ca asya jagatīchandaḥ īritam
devatā hanumān bījam ṣaṣṭam śaktiḥ dvatīyakam
ṣaṣ bījaiḥ ca ṣaṣ aṅgāni śiraḥ bhāle dṛśoḥ mukhe

original: galabāhudvaye caiva hṛdi kukṣau ca nābhitaḥ /
analyzed: gala bāhu dvaye ca eva hṛdi kukṣau ca nābhitaḥ
dhvaje jānu dvaye pāda dvaye varṇān kramāt nyaset

original: ṣaḍbījāni padadvandvaṃ mūrdhni bhāle mukhe hṛdi /
analyzed: ṣaḍbījāni pada dvandvam mūrdhni bhāle mukhe hṛdi
nābhau ūrvoḥ jaṅghayoḥ ca pādayoḥ vinyaset kramāt
añjanī garbha saṃbhūtam tatas dhyāyet kapi īśvaram
udyat koṭi arka saṃkāśam jagat prakṣobha kārakam
vitrāsayantam nādena rākṣasān mārutim bhajet

tila taṇḍula siddhārtha jālaiḥ vaśyaḥ nṛpaḥ bhavet
strī vaśyā kṛt priyaṅgūṇām murāṇām bhūta śānti daḥ
aśvattha uduṃbara plakṣa vaṭa bilva samudbhavāḥ

original: samidho labhate hutvā putrānāyurddhanaṃ sukham // NarP_1,76.35 //
analyzed: samidhaḥ labhate hutvā putrān āyuḥ ddhanam sukham
nirmoka hema siddhārtha lavaṇaiḥ caura nāśanam
rocanā gomayaiḥ taṃbhaḥ bhū prāptiḥ śālibhiḥ hutaiḥ
homa saṃkhyā tu sarvatra sahasrāt ayuta avadhi
prakalpanīyāḥ mantra jñaiḥ kāryya gaurava lāghavāt
kārtavīryyasya mantrāṇām ucyate lakṣaṇam budhāḥ
kārtavīrya arjunam ṅeṃtam sarva mantreṣu yojayet
sva bīja ādyaḥ daśārṇaḥ sau anye nava śiva akṣarāḥ
ādya bīja dvayena asau dvitīyaḥ mantraḥ īritaḥ
sva kāmābhyām tṛtīyaḥ sau sva bhrūbhyām tu caturthakaḥ

original: svapāśābhyāṃ pañcamo 'sau ṣaṣṭaḥ svena ca māyayā // NarP_1,76.40 //
analyzed: sva pāśābhyām sau ṣaṣṭaḥ svena ca māyayā
sva aṅkuśābhyām saptamaḥ syāt svaram ābhyām atha aṣṭamaḥ
sva vāc bhavābhyām navamaḥ varma astrābhyām atha antimaḥ
dvitīya ādi nava anteṣu bījayoḥ syāt vyatikramaḥ

original: mantre tu daśame varṇā navavarmāstramadhyagāḥ // NarP_1,76.42 //
analyzed: mantre tu daśame varṇāḥ nava varma astra madhya gāḥ
eteṣu mantra varyeṣu sva anukūlam manum bhajet
eṣām ādye virāṭchadaḥ nyeṣu triṣṭubh udāhṛtam

original: daśa mantrā ime proktā yadā syuḥ praṇavādikāḥ /
analyzed: daśa mantrāḥ ime proktāḥ yadā syuḥ praṇava ādikāḥ

original: tadādimaḥ śivārṇaḥ syādanye tu dvādaśākṣarāḥ // NarP_1,76.44 //
analyzed: tad ādimaḥ śiva arṇaḥ syāt anye tu dvādaśa akṣarāḥ
triṣṭupūchandaḥ tathā ādye syāt anyeṣu jagatī matā
evam viṃśati mantrāṇām yajanam pūrvavat matam
dīrgha āḍhya mūla bījena kuryāt eṣām ṣaḍaṅgakam
tāraḥ hṛd kārtavīrya arjunāya varma astra ṭha dvayam
caturdaśa arṇaḥ mantraḥ yamasya ijyā pūrvavat matā
bhū netra sama netra akṣi varṇeḥ asya aṅga pañcakam
tāraḥ hṛd bhagavān ṅeṃtaḥ kārtavīrya arjunaḥ tathā
varma astra agni priyā mantraḥ proktaḥ hi aṣṭādaśa arṇakaḥ
tri veda sapta yugma akṣi varṇaiḥ pañca aṅgakam manoḥ

original: namo bhagavate śrīti kārtavīryārjunāya ca // NarP_1,76.49 //
analyzed: namaḥ bhagavate śrī iti kārtavīrya arjunāya ca
sarva duṣṭa antakāya iti tapaḥ bala parākramaḥ
paripālita sapta ante dvīpāya sarva rāpadam
janyacūḍāḥ maṇa ante ye mahā śaktimate tatas
sahasradahana prānte varma astra antaḥ mahā manuḥ
triṣaṣṭi varṇavān proktaḥ smaramāt sarva vighna hṛt
rājan yakravartī ca vīraḥ śūraḥ tṛtīyakaḥ
māhiṣmatī patiḥ paścāt caturthaḥ samudīritaḥ
revā aṃbu paritṛptaḥ ca kāṇaḥ hasta prabādhitaḥ
daśa āsya iti ca ṣaḍbhiḥ syāt padaiḥ ṅe taiḥ ṣaṣ aṅgakam
siṃcyamānam yuvatibhiḥ krīḍantam narmadā jale
hastaiḥ jalaudham rundhantam dhyāyet mattam nṛpa uttamam

original: evaṃ dhyātvāyutaṃ mantraṃ pajedanyattu pūrvavat // NarP_1,76.55 //
analyzed: evam dhyātvā ayutam mantram pajet anyat tu pūrvavat
pūrvam tu prajapet lakṣam pūjā yogaḥ ca pūrvavat
kārtavīrya arjunaḥ nāma rājā bāhu sahasravān

original: tasya saṃsmaraṇādeva hṛtaṃ naṣṭaṃ ca saṃvadet /
analyzed: tasya saṃsmaraṇāt eva hṛtam naṣṭam ca saṃvadet
labhyate mantra varyaḥ yam dvātriṃśat varṇa saṃyutaḥ
pādaiḥ sarveṇa pañcāṅgam dhyāna pūjā ādi pūrvavat
kārtavīryāya śabda ante vidmahe padam uñcaret
mahā vīryāya varṇa ante dhīmahi iti padam vadet
tat naḥ ūrjunaḥ pravarṇa ante codayāt padam īrayet
gāyatrī eṣā arjuna prayoga ādau japet tu tām

original: anuṣṭubhaṃ manuṃ rātrau japatāṃ caurasaṃcayāḥ // NarP_1,76.60 //
analyzed: anuṣṭubham manum rātrau japatām caura saṃcayāḥ
palāyante gṛhāt dūram tarpaṇāt hravanāt api
atho dīpa vidhim vakṣye kārtavīrya priyaṅkaram
vaiśākhe śrāvaṇe mārge kārtika āśvina pauṣataḥ
māgha phālgunayoḥ māsoḥ dīpa āraṃbham samācaret
tithau riktā vihīnāyām vāre śani kujau vinā
hasta uttara aśvi raudreya puṣya vaiṣṇava vāyubhe
dvi daivate ca rohiṇyām dīpa āraṃbhaḥ hita āvahaḥ

original: carame ca vyatīpāte dhṛtau vṛddhau sukarmaṇi // NarP_1,76.64 //
analyzed: carame ca vyatīpāte dhṛtau vṛddhau su karmaṇi
prītau harṣam ca saubhāgye śobhana āyuṣmatoḥ api
karaṇe viṣṭi rahite grahaṇe ṛddhodaya ādiṣu

original: yogeṣu rātrau pūrvāhne dīpāraṃbhaghaḥ kṛtaḥ śubhaḥ /
analyzed: yogeṣu rātrau pūrvāhne kṛtaḥ śubhaḥ
kārtike śukla saptamyām niśīthe tīva śobhanaḥ

original: yadi tatra ravervāraḥ śravaṇaṃ bhaṃ ca durlabham /
analyzed: yadi tatra raveḥ vāraḥ śravaṇam bham ca durlabham
ati āvaśyaka kāryeṣu māsa ādīnām na śodhanam
ādye hi upoṣya niyataḥ brahmacārī sa pītakaiḥ

original: prātaḥ snātvā śuddhabhūmau liptāyāṃ gomayodakaiḥ // NarP_1,76.68 //
analyzed: prātar snātvā śuddha bhūmau liptāyām gomaya udakaiḥ
prāṇān āyamya saṃkalpya nyāsān pūrva uditān caret
ṣaṭkoṇam racayet bhūmau raktacandana taṇḍulaiḥ
atas smaram samālikhya ṣaṣ koṇeṣu samālikhet
nava arṇaiḥ veṣṭayet tat ca trikoṇam tad bahis punar
evam vilikhite yantre nidadhyāt dīpa bhājanam

original: svarṇajaṃ rajatotthaṃ vā tāmrajaṃ tadabhāvataḥ // NarP_1,76.71 //
analyzed: svarṇa jam rajata uttham vā tāmra jam tad abhāvataḥ

original: kāṃsyapātraṃ mṛṇmayaṃ ca kaniṣṭhaṃ lohajaṃ mṛtau /
analyzed: kāṃsya pātram mṛṇmayam ca kaniṣṭham loha jam mṛtau
śāntaye mudga cūrṇa uttham saṃdhau godhūma cūrṇa jam

original: ājye palasahasre tu pātraṃ śatapalaṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: ājye pala sahasre tu pātram śata palam smṛtam
ājye yuta pale pātram pala pañcaśatā smṛtam
pañcasaptati saṃkhye tu pātram ṣaṣṭi palam smṛtam
dvi sāhakhtryām dvi śata mitam ca bhājanam iṣyate
śate kṣicara saṃśyātam evam anyatra kalpayet

original: evaṃ pātraṃ pratiṣṭhāpya vartīḥ sūtrotthitāḥ kṣipet // NarP_1,76.76 //
analyzed: evam pātram pratiṣṭhāpya vartīḥ sūtra utthitāḥ kṣipet
ekā tisraḥ pañca sapta ādyāḥ viṣamāḥ api
tantu saṃkhyā vinirmitā
go ghṛtam prakṣipet tatra śuddha vastra viśodhitam
sahasra pala saṃkhyā ādi daśa aṃśam kārya gauravāt
suvarṇa ādi kṛtām ramyām śalākām ṣoḍaśa aṅgulām

original: tadarddhāṃ vā tadarddhāṃ vā sūkṣmāgrāṃ sthūlamūlikām // NarP_1,76.79 //
analyzed: tad arddhām vā tad arddhām vā sūkṣma agrām sthūla mūlikām
vimuñcet dakṣiṇe pātra madhye ca agre kṛta agrikām
pātra dakṣiṇa diś deśe gula catuṣṭayam
adhas ugrām dakṣiṇa ādhārām nikhanet churikām śubhām
dīpam prajvālayet tatra gaṇeśa smṛti pūrvakam
dīpāt pūrvatra digbhāge sarvatobhadra maṇḍale
taṇḍula aṣṭadale vā api vidhivat sthāpayet hūṭam
tatra āvāhya nṛpa adhīśam pūjayet pūrvavat sudhīḥ
jala akṣatān samādāya dīpam saṃkalpayet tatas
dīpa saṃkalpa mantraḥ yam kathyate dvi iṣu bhūmitaḥ

original: praṇavaḥ pāśamāye ca śikhā kārtākṣarāṇi ca // NarP_1,76.84 //
analyzed: praṇavaḥ pāśa māye ca śikhā kārtākṣarāṇi ca
vīryārjunāya māhiṣmatī nāthāya sahasra ca
bāhave iti varṇa ante sahasra padam uccaret
kratu dīkṣita hastāya dattātreya priyāya ca
ātreyāya anusūyā ante garbharatnāya tat param
namaḥ grīvā āma karṇa indu sthitau pāśaḥ imam tatas

original: dīpaṃ gṛhāṇa amukaṃ rakṣa rakṣa padaṃ punaḥ // NarP_1,76.87 //
analyzed: dīpam gṛhāṇa amukam rakṣa rakṣa padam punar
duṣṭa anna āśaya yugmam syāt tathā pātaya ghātaya

original: śatrūn jahidvayaṃ māyā tāraḥ svaṃ bījamātmabhūḥ // NarP_1,76.88 //
analyzed: śatrūn māyā tāraḥ svam bījam ātmabhūḥ
vahnīpriyā anena atha dīpa varyeṇa paścimā
bhimukhena amukam rakṣa amuka ante vara prada
veda ādi kāma cāmuṇḍāḥ svāhā tu pūsa bindukau
dattātreyaḥ muniḥ mālāmantrasya parikīrtitaḥ
chandaḥ mitam kārtavīryu rjunaḥ khila āpti kṛt
cāmuṇḍayā ṣaḍ aṅgāni caret ṣaṣ dīrgha yuktayā

original: dhyātvā devaṃ tato mantraṃ paṭhitvānte kṣipejjajalam /
analyzed: dhyātvā devam tatas mantram paṭhitvā ante

original: tato navākṣaraṃ mantraṃ sahasraṃ tatpuro japet /
analyzed: tatas nava akṣaram mantram sahasram tat puras japet
tāraḥ nantaḥ bindu yuktaḥ māyā svam vāmanetra yuj
ṛṣiḥ pūrva uditaḥ anuṣṭubh chandaḥ

original: sahasraṃ mantrarājaṃ ca japitvā kavacaṃ paṭhet /
analyzed: sahasram mantrarājam ca japitvā kavacam paṭhet
evam dīpa pradānasya kartā āpnoti akhile psitam
dīpa prabodha kāle tu varjayet aśubhām giram

original: viprasya darśanaṃ tatra śubhadaṃ parikīrtitam // NarP_1,76.97 //
analyzed: viprasya darśanam tatra śubha dam parikīrtitam
śūdrāṇām pradhyamam proktam mlecchasya vadha bandhanam
ākhvā otvoḥ darśanam duṣṭam gavāśvasya sukha āvaham

original: śabdā bhayadā karturujjvalā sukhadā matā // NarP_1,76.99 //
analyzed: śabdāḥ bhaya dā kartuḥ ujjvalā sukha dā matā
kṛṣṇā śatru bhaya utpattye vamantī paśu nāśinī

original: kṛte dīpe yadā pātraṃ bhagnaṃ dṛśyate daivataḥ // NarP_1,76.100 //
analyzed: kṛte dīpe yadā pātram bhagnam dṛśyate daivataḥ
pakṣāt arvāk tadā gacchet yajamānaḥ yama ālayam
vartyataram yadā kuryāt kāryam siddhyet vilaṃbataḥ
netra hīnaḥ bhavet kartā tasmin dīpa antare kṛte
aśuci sparśane vyādhiḥ dīpa nāśe tu caura bhīḥ
śva mārjāra ākhu saṃsparśe bhavet bhūpatitaḥ bhayam
pātra āraṃbhe vasu palaiḥ kṛtaḥ dīpaḥ khila iṣṭa daḥ
tasmāt dīpaḥ prayatnena rakṣaṇīya uṃtarāyataḥ

original: āsamāpteḥ prakurvīta brahmacaryaṃ ca bhūśayaḥ // NarP_1,76.104 //
analyzed: ā samāpteḥ prakurvīta brahmacaryam ca bhū śayaḥ
strī śūdra patita ādīnām saṃbhāṣām api varjayet
japet sahasram pratyekam mantrarājam nava akṣaram
stotra pāṭham pratidinam niśīthinyām viśeṣataḥ

original: ekapādena dīpāgre sthitvā yo mantranāyakam // NarP_1,76.106 //
analyzed: eka pādena dīpa agre sthitvā yaḥ mantranāyakam
sahasram prajapet vātrau saḥ bhīṣṭam kṣipram āpnuyāt
samāpya śobhana dine saṃbhojya dvijasattamān
kuṃbha udakena kartāram abhiṣiñcan manum japet

original: kartā tu dakṣiṇāṃ dadyātpuṣkalāṃ toṣahetave // NarP_1,76.108 //
analyzed: kartā tu dakṣiṇām dadyāt puṣkalām toṣa hetave
gurau tuṣṭe dadāti iṣṭam kṛtavīrya sutaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: gurvājñayā svayaṃ kuryādyadi vā kāraye dguruḥ // NarP_1,76.109 //
analyzed: guru ājñayā svayam kuryāt yadi vā kārayet guruḥ
dattvā dhana ādikam tasmai dīpa dānāya nārada
guru ājñām antarā kuryāt yaḥ dīpam sva iṣṭa siddhaye

original: siddhirna jāyate tasya hānireva pade pade /
analyzed: siddhiḥ na jāyate tasya hāniḥ eva pade pade

original: uttamaṃ goghṛtaṃ proktaṃ madhyamaṃ mahaṣībhavam // NarP_1,76.111 //
analyzed: uttamam goghṛtam proktam madhyamam mahaṣībhavam
tila tailam tu tādṛś syāt kanīyaḥ ja ādi jam ghṛtam
āsya roge sugandhena dadyāt tailena dīpakam
siddhvā artha saṃbhavena atha dviṣatām nāśanāya ca

original: sahasreṇa palairdīpe vihite ca na dṛśyate // NarP_1,76.113 //
analyzed: sahasreṇa palaiḥ dīpe vihite ca na dṛśyate
kārya siddhaḥ tadā kuryāt tri vāram dīpa jam vidhim

original: tadā sudurlabhamapi kāryyaṃ siddhvyenna saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,76.114 //
analyzed: tadā su durlabham api kāryyam siddhvī et na saṃśayaḥ
durga arcana priyāḥ nūnam abhiṣeka priyaḥ śivaḥ
tasmāt teṣām pratoṣāya vidadhyāt tad tad ādarāt

original: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde kārtavīryamāhātmyamantradīpakathanaṃ nāma ṣaṭsaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī bṛhat nāradīyapurāṇe pūrva bhāge bṛhat upākhyāne tṛtīya pāde kārtavīryamāhātmyamantradīpakathanam nāma ṣaṭsaptatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
nāradaḥ uvāca
sādhu sādhu mahā prājña sarva tantra viśārada

original: tvayā mahyaṃ samākhyātaṃ vidhānaṃ tantragopitam // NarP_1,77.1 //
analyzed: tvayā mahyam samākhyātam vidhānam tantra gopitam
adhunā tu mahābhāga kīrta vīrya hanūmatoḥ
kavace śrotum icchāmi tadvat asva kṛpā nidhe
sanatkumāraḥ uvāca
śṛṇu vipra indra vakṣyāmi kavacam parama adbhutam
kārtavīryasya yena asau prasannaḥ kārya siddhi kṛt
sahasra āditya saṃkāśe nānā ratna samujjvaṃle
bhāsvat dhvaja patākā āḍhye turaga ayuta bhūṣite
samuddhṛta mahā chattra vitānita viyat pathe
mahā ratha vare dīpta nānā āyudha virājite
susthitam vipula udāram sahasra bhuja maṇḍitam
vāmaiḥ uddaṇḍa kodaṇḍān dadhānam aparaiḥ śarān
kirīṭa hāra mukuṭa keyūra valaya aṅgadaiḥ
mudrikā udara bandha ādyaiḥ māaiñjī nūpuraka ādibhiḥ
bhūṣitam vividha ākalpaiḥ bhāsvaraiḥ su mahādhanaiḥ
ābaddha kavacam vīram su prasanna ānana aṃbujam
dhanuḥ jyā siṃhanādena kaṃpayantam jagattrayam
sarva śatru kṣaya karam sarva vyādhi vināśanam
sarva saṃpad pradātāram vijaya śrī niṣevitam
divya mālya anulepa āḍhyam sarva lakṣaṇa saṃyutam
ratha nāga aśva pādāta vṛnda madhya gam īśvaram
vara dam cakravartīnam sarva loka eka pālakam
samāna udita sāhasra divākara sama dyutim
śrīmat ṭatam hareḥ aṃśāt avatīrṇam mahī tale
samyak ātma ādi bhedena dhyātvā rakṣām udīrayet
asya aṅga mūrtayaḥ pañca pāntu mām sphaṭika ujjvalāḥ
agni īśa asura vāyavya koṇeṣu hṛdaya ādikāḥ
sarvatas usra jvalat rūpāḥ dara carma asi pāṇayaḥ
avyāhata bala aiśvarya śakti sāmarthya vigrahāḥ

original: prācīṃ diśaṃ rakṣatu me bāṇabāṇāsanāyudhaḥ // NarP_1,77.17 //
analyzed: prācīm diśam rakṣatu me bāṇa bāṇāsana āyudhaḥ

original: śaracāpadharaḥ śrīmān diśaṃ me pātu dakṣiṇām // NarP_1,77.18 //
analyzed: śara cāpa dharaḥ śrīmān diśam me pātu dakṣiṇām
mahā iṣu cāpa dhṛk pātu mama prācetasīm diśam
parirakṣatu me samyak vidiśam caitrabhānavīm
pātu me nairṛtīm cāpa pāṇiḥ vidiśam īśvaraḥ
dhanakaryā samāyuktaḥ mahā durita nāśanaḥ
iṣu āsanā iṣudhṛk pātu vidiśam mama vāyavīm
āyuḥ karyā yutaḥ śrīmān mahā bhaya vināśanaḥ

original: cāpeṣudhārī śaivīṃ me vidiśaṃ parirakṣatu // NarP_1,77.23 //
analyzed: cāpa iṣu dhārī śaivīm me vidiśam parirakṣatu
diśam ūrddhvām avatu me sarva duṣṭa bhayaṅkaraḥ
śaṅkhabhṛt su mahā śakti saṃyutaḥ pi adharām diśam
parirakṣatu me duḥkha dhvānta sambheda bhāskaraḥ

original: mahāyogīśvaraḥ pātu sarvato mama padmabhṛt // NarP_1,77.26 //
analyzed: mahā yogi īśvaraḥ pātu sarvatas mama padma bhṛt
etāḥ tu mūrtayaḥ raktāḥ rakta mālya aṃśuka āvṛtāḥ
pradhāna devatā rūpāḥ sthitāḥ
śaktayaḥ padma hastāḥ cata nīla indīvara sannnibhāḥ
śukla mālya anuvasanāḥ su lipta tilaka ujjvalāḥ
tad pārśada īśvarāḥ sva sva vāhana āyudha bhūṣaṇāḥ

original: svasvadikṣu sthitāḥ pāntu māmindrādyā mahābalāḥ // NarP_1,77.29 //
analyzed: sva sva dikṣu sthitāḥ pāntu mām indra ādyāḥ mahā balāḥ
samākhyātāḥ sarva āvaraṇa devatāḥ
