original: śiro gṛhītvāvanamayya śaṅkaraḥ pasparśa pṛṣṭhaṃ cibukena so 'dhvani // NarP_1,79.134 //
analyzed: śiraḥ gṛhītvā avanamayya śaṅkaraḥ pasparśa pṛṣṭham cibukena saḥ dhvani

original: hāraṃ ca muktāparikalpitaṃ śivo hanūmataḥ kaṇṭhagataṃ cakāra // NarP_1,79.135 //
analyzed: hāram ca muktā parikalpitam śivaḥ hanūmataḥ kaṇṭha gatam cakāra
atha viṣṇuḥ maheśānam iha vacanam uktavān
hanūmatā samaḥ nā asti kṛtsna brahmāṇḍa maṇḍale
śruti deva ādya gamyam hi padam tava kapi sthitam
sarva upaniṣad avyaktam tvad padam kapi sarva yuj
yama ādi sādhanaiḥ ṃyogaiḥ na kṣaṇam te padam sthiram
mahā yogi hṛd aṃbhoje param svastham hanūmati
varṣa koṭi sahasram tu sahasra abdaiḥ atha anvaham

original: bhaktyā saṃpūjito 'pīśa pādo no darśitastvayā // NarP_1,79.139 //
analyzed: bhaktyā saṃpūjitaḥ u pīśa pādaḥ naḥ darśitaḥ tvayā
loke vādaḥ hi su mahān śaṃbhuḥ nārāyaṇa priyaḥ
haripriyaḥ tathā śaṃbhuḥ na tādṛś bhāgyam asti me
tat śrutvā vacanam śaṃbhuḥ viṣṇoḥ prāha mudā anvitaḥ

original: na tvayā sadṛśo mahyaṃ priyo 'nyo 'sti hare kvacit // NarP_1,79.141 //
analyzed: na tvayā sadṛśaḥ mahyam priyaḥ hare kvacid

original: pārvatī vā tvayā tulyā vartate naiva bhidyate /
analyzed: pārvatī vā tvayā tulyā vartate nā eva bhidyate

original: atha devāya mahate gautamaḥ prāṇipatya ca // NarP_1,79.142 //
analyzed: atha devāya mahate gautamaḥ prāṇipatya ca
vyajijñapat ameya ātmaj devaiḥ hi karuṇā nidhe
madhyāhnaḥ yam vyatikrāntaḥ bhukti velā akhilasya ca
atha ācamya mahādevaḥ viṣṇunā sahitaḥ vibhuḥ
praviśya gautama gṛham bhojanāya upacakrame
ratna aṅgulīya iratha nūpurābhyām dukūla bandhena taḍit su kāñcyā
hāraiḥ anekaiḥ atha kaṇṭha niṣka yajñopavīta uttara vāsasī ca
vilaṃbi cañcat maṇi kuṇḍalena su puṣpa dhaṃmilla vareṇa ca eva
pañcāṅga gandhasya vilepanena bāhu aṅgadaiḥ kaṅkaṇaka aṅgulīyaiḥ
atho vibhūṣitaḥ śivaḥ niviṣṭaḥ uttama āsane
sva saṃmukham harim tathā nyaveśayat varāsane
deva śreṣṭhau hari īśau tau anyonya abhimukha sthitau

original: suvarṇabhājanasthānnaṃ dadau bhaktyā sa gautamaḥ // NarP_1,79.148 //
analyzed: suvarṇa bhājana stha annam dadau bhaktyā sa gautamaḥ
triṃśat prabhedān bhakṣyān tu pāyasam ca caturvidham

original: supakvaṃ pākajātaṃ ca kalpitaṃ yacchatadvayam // NarP_1,79.149 //
analyzed: su pakvam pāka jātam ca kalpitam yat śata dvayam
apakkam miśrakam tadvat triṃśatam parikalpitam

original: śataṃ śataṃ sukandānāṃ śākānāṃ ca prakalpitam // NarP_1,79.150 //
analyzed: śatam śatam su kandānām śākānām ca prakalpitam
pañcaviṃśatidhā sarpiḥ saṃskṛtam vyañjanam tathā
evamādīni ca anyāni dravyāṇi īśe samarpya ca
dattvā apośānakam vipraḥ bhuñjadhvam iti ca abravīt
bhuñjāna eṣu ca sarveṣu vyajanam sūkṣma vistṛtam
gautamaḥ svayam ādāya śiva viṣṇū avījayat
parihāsam atho kartum iyeṣa parameśvaraḥ

original: paśya viṣṇo hanūmantaṃ kathaṃ bhuṅkte sa vānaraḥ // NarP_1,79.155 //
analyzed: paśya viṣṇo hanūmantam katham bhuṅkte sa vānaraḥ
vānaram paśyati harau maṇḍakam viṣṇu bhājane
cakṣepa paśyatsu api maheśvaraḥ
hanūmate dattavān ca sva ucchiṣṭam pāyasa ādikam
tvad ucchiṣṭa bhojyam tu tava eva vacanāt vibho

original: anarhaṃ mama naivedyaṃ patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalādikam /
analyzed: anarham mama naivedyam patram puṣpam phala ādikam

original: mahyaṃ nivedya sakalaṃ kūpa eva viniḥkṣipet // NarP_1,79.158 //
analyzed: mahyam nivedya sakalam kūpe eva viniḥkṣipet

original: abhukte tvardvañco nūnaṃ bhukte cāpi kṛpā tava /
analyzed: a bhukte nūnam bhukte ca api kṛpā tava

original: bāṇaliṅge svayaṃbhūte candrakānte hṛdi sthite // NarP_1,79.159 //
analyzed: bāṇa liṅge svayaṃbhūte candrakānte hṛdi sthite
cāndrāyaṇa samam jñeyam śambhoḥ naivedya bhakṣaṇam
bhukti velā iyam adhunā tad vairasyam kathā antarāt

original: bhuktvā tu kakathayiṣyāmi nirviśaṅkaṃ vibhuṅkṣva tat /
analyzed: bhuktvā tu nirviśaṅkam vibhuṅkṣva tat

original: athāsau jalasaṃskāraṃ kṛtavān gautamo muniḥ // NarP_1,79.161 //
analyzed: atha asau jala saṃskāram kṛtavān gautamaḥ muniḥ
ārakta su snigdha su sūkṣma gātrān anekadhā dhauta su śobhita aṅgān
taḍāga toyaiḥ kata bīja gharṣitaiḥ viśaudhitaiḥ taiḥ karakān apūrayat
nadyāḥ saikata vedikām navatarām saṃchādya sūkṣma aṃbaraiḥ
śvetataraiḥ atha upari ghaṭān toyena pūrṇān kṣipet

original: liptvā nālakajātimāstapuṭakaṃ tatkaulakaṃ kārikācūrṇaṃ candanacandraraśmiviśadāṃ mālāṃ puṭāntaṃ kṣipet /
analyzed: liptvā nālaka jātim āstapuṭakam tat kaulakam kārikā cūrṇam candana candra raśmi viśadām mālām puṭa antam kṣipet

original: yāmasyāpi punaśca vārivasanenāśodhya kumbhena tañcandpranthimatho nidhāya bakulaṃ kṣiptvā tathā pāṭalam // NarP_1,79.163 //
analyzed: yāmasya api punar ca vāri vasanena āśodhya kumbhena tañcand pranthim atho nidhāya bakulam kṣiptvā tathā pāṭalam
śepha ālī stabakam atho jalam ca tatra
vinyasya prathamatas eva toya śuddhim

original: kṛtvātho mṛdutaraṃ sūkṣmavastrakhaṇḍenāveṣṭetsṛṇikamukhaṃ ca sūkṣmacandram // NarP_1,79.164 //
analyzed: kṛtvā atho mṛdutaram sūkṣma vastra khaṇḍena āveṣṭet sṛṇika mukham ca sūkṣma candram
anātapa pradeśe tu nidhāya karakān atha
manda vāta samopete sūkṣma vyajana vījete
siṃcet śītaiḥ jalaiḥ ca api vāsitaiḥ sṛṇikām api

original: saṃskṛtāḥ svāyatāstatra narā nāryo 'thavā nṛpāḥ // NarP_1,79.166 //
analyzed: saṃskṛtāḥ su āyatāḥ tatra narāḥ nāryaḥ nṛpāḥ
tad kanyāḥ vā kṣālita aṅgāḥ dhauta pādāḥ su vāsasaḥ
madhur pigama niryāsam asāṃdram aguru udbhavam

original: bāhumūle ca kaṇṭhe ca vilipyāsāṃdrameva ca /
analyzed: bāhumūle ca kaṇṭhe ca vilipya asāṃdram eva ca
mastake jāpakam nyasya pañcagandha vilepanam
puṣpa naddhva su keśāḥ tu tāḥ śubhāḥ syuḥ su nirmalāḥ
evam eva arcitāḥ nāryaḥ āpta kuṅkuma vigrahāḥ
yuvatyaḥ cāru sarva aṅgyaḥ nitarām bhūṣaṇaiḥ api
etādṛś vanitābhiḥ vā naraiḥ vā dāpayet jalam
te pi prādāna samaye sūkṣma vastra alpa veṣṭanam

original: athavāmakare nyasya karakaṃ prekṣya tatra hi // NarP_1,79.171 //
analyzed: athavā vāma kare nyasya karakam prekṣya tatra hi
dorikā nyastam unmucya tatas toyam pradāpayet

original: evaṃ sa kārayāmāsa gautamo bhagavānmuniḥ // NarP_1,79.172 //
analyzed: evam sa kārayāmāsa gautamaḥ bhagavān muniḥ
maheśa ādiṣu sarveṣu bhuktavatsu mahātmasu
prakṣālita aṅghri hasteṣu gandha udvartita pāṇiṣu
uñcāsana samāsīne devadeve maheśvare
atha nīca samāsīnāḥ devāḥ sa ṛṣi gaṇāḥ tathā
maṇi pātreṣu saṃveṣṭtha pūga khaṇḍān su dhūpitān
a koṇān vartulān sthūlān a sūkṣmān a kṛśān api
śveta patrāṇi saṃśodhya kṣiptvā karpūra khaṇḍakam

original: cūrṇaṃ ca śaṅkarāyātha nivedayati gautame // NarP_1,79.176 //
analyzed: cūrṇam ca śaṅkarāya atha nivedayati gautame
gṛhāṇa deva tāṃbūlam iti ukta vacane munau

original: kape gṛhāṇa tāṃbūlaṃ prayaccha mama khaṇḍakān // NarP_1,79.177 //
analyzed: kape gṛhāṇa tāṃbūlam prayaccha mama khaṇḍakān
uvāca vānaraḥ na asti mama śuddhiḥ maheśvara
aneka phala bhoktṛā tvāt vānaraḥ tu katham śuciḥ
tat śrutvā tu virūpākṣāḥ prāha vānara sattamam
mad vākyāt akhilam śuddhyā id mad vākyāt amṛtam viṣam
mad vākyāt akhilāḥ vedāḥ mad vākyāt devatā ādayaḥ
mad vāṅkyāt dhvarma vijñānam mad vākyāt mokṣaḥ ucyate
purāṇāni āgamāḥ ca eva smṛtayaḥ mama vākyataḥ

original: ato gṛhāṇa tāṃbūlaṃ mama dehi sukhaṇḍakān // NarP_1,79.181 //
analyzed: atas gṛhāṇa tāṃbūlam mama dehi su khaṇḍakān
hariḥ vāma kareṇa adhāt tāṃbūlam pūga khaṇḍakam

original: tatataḥ patrāṇi saṃgṛhya tasmai khaṇḍānsamarpayat // NarP_1,79.182 //
analyzed: tatatas patrāṇi saṃgṛhya tasmai khaṇḍān samarpayat

original: deve tu kṛtatāṃbūle pārvatī mandarācalāt // NarP_1,79.183 //
analyzed: deve tu kṛta tāṃbūle pārvatī mandara acalāt
jayāvijayayoḥ hastam gṛhītvā ayāt muneḥ gṛham
deva pādau tatas natvā vinamra vadanā abhavat
unnamayya mukhi tasyāḥ idam āha trilocanaḥ

original: tvadarthaṃ devadeveśi aparādhaḥ kṛto mayā // NarP_1,79.185 //
analyzed: tvad artham devadeveśi aparādhaḥ kṛtaḥ mayā

original: yattvāṃ vihāya bhuktaṃ hi tathānyacchṛṇu suṃdari /
analyzed: yat tvām vihāya bhuktam hi tathā anyat śṛṇu suṃdari

original: yattvāṃ svamandire tyaktvā mahadeno mayā kṛtam // NarP_1,79.186 //
analyzed: yat tvām sva mandire tyaktvā mahat enaḥ mayā kṛtam
kṣantum arhasi deveśi tyakta kopā vilokaya
na babhāṣe pi evam uktā sā arundhatyāḥ viniryayau
nirgacchantīm muniḥ jñātvā daṇḍa vat praṇanāma ha

original: athovāca śivā taṃ cagautama tvaṃ kimicchasi // NarP_1,79.188 //
analyzed: athā uvāca śivā tam ca gautama tvam kim icchasi

original: athāha gautamo devīṃ pārvatīṃ prekṣya sasmitām /
analyzed: atha āha gautamaḥ devīm pārvatīm prekṣya sa smitām

original: kṛtakṛtyo bhaveyaṃ vai bhuktāyāṃ madgṛhe tvayi // NarP_1,79.189 //
analyzed: kṛtakṛtyaḥ bhaveyam vai bhuktāyām mad gṛhe tvayi

original: tataḥ prāha śivā vipraṃ gautamaṃ racitāñjalim /
analyzed: tatas prāha śivā vipram gautamam racita añjalim

original: bhokṣyāmi tvadgṛhe vipra śaṅkarānumatena vai // NarP_1,79.190 //
analyzed: bhokṣyāmi tvad gṛhe vipra śaṅkara anumatena vai
atha gatvā śivam viṃśe labdha anujñaḥ tvarā gataḥ

original: bhojayāmāsa girijāṃ devīṃ cārundhatīṃ tathā // NarP_1,79.191 //
analyzed: bhojayāmāsa girijām devīm ca arundhatīm tathā
bhuktvā atha pārvatī sarva gandha puṣpa ādi alaṅkṛtā
saha anu cara kanyābhiḥ sahasrābhiḥ haram yayau
atha ahar śakaraḥ devī gaccha gautama mandiram
saṃdhyā upāstim aham kṛtvā hi āgamiṣye tava antikam
iti uktvā prayayau devī gautamasya eva madiram
saṃdhyā vadana kāmāḥ tu sarve eva vinirgatāḥ
kṛta saṃdhyāḥ taḍāge tu maheśa ādyāḥ ca kṛtsnaśas

original: athottaramukhaḥ śaṃbhurnyāsa kṛtvā jajāpa ha // NarP_1,79.195 //
analyzed: atha uttara mukhaḥ śaṃbhuḥ nyāsa kṛtvā jajāpa ha
atha viṣṇuḥ mahā tejāḥ maheśam idam abravīt
sarvaiḥ namasyate yaḥ tu sarvaiḥ eva samarcyate
hūyatam sarva yajñeṣu sa bhavān kim japiṣyati
racita añjalayaḥ sarve tvām eva ekam upāsite
sa bhavān devadeveśaḥ kasmai viracita añjaliḥ
namaskāra ādi puṇyānām phala daḥ tvam

original: tava kaḥ phalado vandyaḥ ko vā tvatto 'dhiko vada /
analyzed: tava kaḥ phala daḥ vandyaḥ kaḥ vā tvattaḥ dhikaḥ vada

original: tacchrutvā śaṅkaraḥ prāha devadevaṃ janārdanam // NarP_1,79.199 //
analyzed: tat śrutvā śaṅkaraḥ prāha devadevam janārdanam

original: dhyāye na kiñcidgovindanamasye ha na kiñcana /
analyzed: dhyāye na kiñcid govinda namasye ha na kiñcana
kintu nāstika jantūnām pravṛtti artham idam mayā
darśanīyam hare ca etat anyathā pāpa kāriṇaḥ
tasmāt loka upakāra artham idam sarvam kṛtam mayā
om iti uktvā hariḥ atha tam natvā samatiṣṭata

original: atha te gautamagṛhaṃ prāptā devarṣayastadā // NarP_1,79.202 //
analyzed: atha te gautama gṛham prāptāḥ devarṣayaḥ tadā
sarve pūjām atho cakruḥ devadevāya śūline

original: devo hanūmatā sārddhvaṃ gāyannāste munīśvara // NarP_1,79.203 //
analyzed: devaḥ hanūmatā sārddhvam gāyan āste muni īśvara
pañcākṣarīm mahāvidyām sarve eva tadā ajapan
hanumat karam ālaṃbya devābhyām saṃgataḥ haraḥ
eka śayyā samāṃsīnau tau ubhau deva daṃpatī
gāyan āste ca hanumān tuṃburu pramukhāḥ tathā
nānāvidha vilāsān ca cakāra parameśvaraḥ

original: āhūya pārvatīmīśa idaṃ vākyamuvāca ha // NarP_1,79.206 //
analyzed: āhūya pārvatīm īśaḥ idam vākyam uvāca ha
racayiṣyāmi dhaṃmillam ehi mad puratas śubhe

original: devyāha na ca yuktaṃ tadbharttrā śuśrūṣaṇaṃ striyaḥ // NarP_1,79.207 //
analyzed: devī āha na ca yuktam tad bharttrā śuśrūṣaṇam striyaḥ
keśa prasādhana kṛtau anartha antaram āpatet

original: keśaprasādhane deva tattvaṃ sarvaṃ na cepsitam // NarP_1,79.208 //
analyzed: keśa prasādhane deva tattvam sarvam na ca īpsitam
atha bandhe kṛte paścāt aṃsa prānta pramārjanam
tatas carama saṃlagna keśa puṣpa ādi mārjanam
etasmin vartamāne tu mahātmānaḥ yadā agaman

original: tadā kimuttaraṃ vācyaṃ tava devādivandita // NarP_1,79.210 //
analyzed: tadā kim uttaram vācyam tava deva ādi vandita
na āyānti ced atha vibho bhītiḥ nāśam upaiṣyati

original: evaṃ hi bhāṣamāṇāṃ tāṃ kareṇākṛṣya śaṅkaraḥ // NarP_1,79.211 //
analyzed: evam hi bhāṣamāṇām tām kareṇa ākṛṣya śaṅkaraḥ
sva ūrvoḥ saṃsthāpayitvā eva visrasya kaca bandhanam

original: vibhajya ca karābhyāṃ sa prasasāra nakhairapi // NarP_1,79.212 //
analyzed: vibhajya ca karābhyām sa prasasāra nakhaiḥ api
viṣṇu dattām pārijāta srajam kaca gatām api
kṛtvā dhaṃmillam akarot atha mālām kara āgatām
mallikā srajam ādāya babandha kaca bandhane
kalpaprasūna mālām ca brahmadattām maheśvaraḥ
pārvatī vasane gūḍha gandha āḍhye ca samādadāt
atha aṃsa pṛṣṭha saṃlagna mārjanam kṛtavān vibhuḥ
ślathat nīveḥ adhas devyāḥ vastra veṣṭāt adhas gataḥ

original: kimidaṃ devi cetyuktvā nīvībandhaṃ cakāra ha // NarP_1,79.216 //
analyzed: kim idam devi ca iti uktvā nīvī bandham cakāra ha
nāsā bhūṣaṇam etat te satyam eva vadāmi te

original: tataḥ prāha śivā śaṃbhuṃ smitvā parvatanandinī // NarP_1,79.217 //
analyzed: tatas prāha śivā śaṃbhum smitvā parvatanandinī
aho tvad mandire śaṃbho sarva vastu samṛddhimat
pūrvam eva mayā sarvam jñāta prāyam abhūt kila
sarva draviṇa saṃpattiḥ bhūṣaṇā ekha gamyate

original: śiro vibhūṣitaṃ deva brahmaśīrṣasya mālayā // NarP_1,79.219 //
analyzed: śiraḥ vibhūṣitam deva brahma śīrṣasya mālayā

original: śeṣaśca vāsukiścaiva saviṣau tava kaṅkaṇau // NarP_1,79.220 //
analyzed: śeṣaḥ ca vāsukiḥ ca eva sa viṣau tava kaṅkaṇau
diśā uṃbaram jaṭāḥ keśāḥ ca aṅgarāgakam

original: mahokṣo vāhanaṃ gotraṃ kulaṃ cājñātameva ca // NarP_1,79.221 //
analyzed: mahā ukṣaḥ vāhanam gotram kulam ca ajñātam eva ca

original: jñāyete pitarau naiva virūpākṣaṃ tathā vapuḥ /
analyzed: jñāyete pitarau nā eva virūpākṣam tathā vapuḥ

original: evaṃ vadantīṃ girijāṃ viṣṇuḥ prāhātikopanaḥ // NarP_1,79.222 //
analyzed: evam vadantīm girijām viṣṇuḥ prāha ati kopanaḥ

original: duṣprāṇā na priyā bhadre tava nūnamasaṃyamāt // NarP_1,79.223 //
analyzed: duṣprāṇā na priyā bhadre tava nūnam asaṃyamāt

original: ityuktvātha nakhābhyāṃ hi hariśchettuṃ śiro gataḥ // NarP_1,79.224 //
analyzed: iti uktvā atha nakhābhyām hi hariḥ chettum śiraḥ gataḥ

original: maheśastatkaraṃ gṛhya prāha mā sāhasaṃ kṛthāḥ /
analyzed: maheśaḥ tad karam gṛhya prāha mā sāhasam kṛthāḥ

original: pārvatīvacanaṃ sarvaṃ priyaṃ mama na cāpriyam // NarP_1,79.225 //
analyzed: pārvatī vacanam sarvam priyam mama na ca apriyam
mama apriyam hṛṣīkeśa kartum yat kiñcid iṣyate
om iti uktvā atha bhagavān tūṣṇīṃbhūtaḥ bhavat hvariḥ

original: arthayāmi viniṣkāmaṃ mama pūjāvrataṃ tathā // NarP_1,79.227 //

original: dhyāyankṛṣṇaṃ japenmantraṃ vrajecchatraṃ vinā sudhīḥ // NarP_1,80.254 //
analyzed: dhyāyan kṛṣṇam japet mantram vrajet chatram vinā sudhīḥ
varṣa vāta aśanibhyaḥ pi bhayam tasya na jāyate
mogha medhā ogha vrātāt ga gata indram tam smaran hunet
loṇaiḥ ayuta saṃkhyaiḥ syāt anāvṛṣṭiḥ na saṃśayaḥ
krīḍantam arkajā tīre majjana snāpana ādibhiḥ
tat śīkara jala āsāraiḥ sicyamānam priyā janaiḥ
dhyātvā ayutam payaḥ siktaiḥ hunet vā nīra tarpaṇaiḥ
vṛṣṭiḥ bhavati akāle mahatī na atra saṃśayaḥ
sa dāha mohaiḥ ārtasya visphoṭaka jvara ādibhiḥ
amum eva smaran mūrdhni japet śāntiḥ bhavet kṣaṇāt
athavā garuḍa ārūḍham pradyumna bala saṃyutam
nija jvara niṣpiṣṭa jvara abhiṣṭutam acyutam

original: dhyātvā mūrdhni japenmantraṃ jvaramukto bhavejjvarī // NarP_1,80.260 //
analyzed: dhyātvā mūrdhni japet mantram jvara muktaḥ bhavet jvarī
dhyātvā evam agnau abhyarcya yathā uktaiḥ catur aṅgulaiḥ
juhuyāt amṛtā khaṇḍaiḥ ayutam jvara śāntaye
śilīmukha vinirbhinna bhīṣma tāpa haram harim
dhyātvā japet spṛśan ārtam pāṇibhyām jvara śāntaye
sāṃdīpanāya dadatam putram dhyātvā ayutam hunet
yathā uktaiḥ amṛta akhaṇḍaiḥ apamṛtyu nivṛttaye
sa pārtham mṛta putrāya arpayantam ca dvijanmane
sutam dhyātvā japet lakṣam putra pautra ādi vṛddhaye
putrajīva phalaiḥ hutvā ayutam madhura saṃplutaiḥ
tad kāṣṭhaiḥ edhite vahnau sutān dīrgha āyuṣaḥ labhet
kṣīra druh tvā atha saṃpūrṇam abhyarcya kalaśam niśi
prātar japtvā ayutam nārīm abhiṣiñcet di ṣaṣ dinam
evam kṛte tu vandhyā api labhet putrān cira āyuṣaḥ
prātar vācaṃyama aśvattha dala saṃpuṭakam jalam
aṣṭottaraśatam japtam māsam putra arthinī pibet
sarva lakṣaṇa saṃpannam vandhyā api labhate sutam
jitvā kṛtyām kāśi rāja preṣitām ca nija ariṇaḥ

original: tejasā tasya nagaraṃ dahṝntaṃ bhāvayanharim // NarP_1,80.269 //
analyzed: tejasā tasya nagaram bhāvayan harim
hunet sapta dinam mantrī su sneha aktaiḥ ca sarṣapaiḥ
kṛtyā kartāram eva asmai kupitā nāśayet dhruvam
badarī druma saṃkīrṇe sthitam divya āśrame śubhe
spṛśantam kara padmābhyām ghaṇṭā karṇa kalevaram
dhyātvā evam juhuyāt lakṣam tilaiḥ trimadhura āplutaiḥ
mahā pāpa yutaḥ pi evam pūtaḥ bhavati tad kṣaṇāt
dyūta āsaktau rukmi balau dveṣayantam harim smaran
juhuyāt iṣṭayoḥ dviṣṭyai gulikāḥ gomaya udbhavāḥ
nityam sahasram sapta ahāt mithas vidveṣayet arīn
varṣantam garuḍa ārūḍham jvalat agni mukhaiḥ śaraiḥ
dhāvantam ripu saṃghātam anudhāvatam acyutam
dhyātvā sapta sahasram tu japet mantram ananya dhīḥ
uccāṭanam bhavati eva śatrūṇām saptabhiḥ dinaiḥ
dhyāyan utkṣipta vatsam tu kapittha phala hāriṇam
prajapet ayutam śatrum uñcāṭayati tad kṣaṇāt
ātmānam kaṃsa mathanam dhyāyan mañcāt nipātitam
kaṃsa ātmānam vyakarṣantam gatāsum tam japet manum
ripu janma ṛkṣa vṛkṣa uttha samidbhiḥ ayutam niśi
juhuyāt evam ugraḥ sapatnaḥ nidhanam vrajet
athavā niṃba taila aktaiḥ hunedhobhiḥ akṣa jaiḥ
ayutam niyataḥ rātrau mārayet acirāt arīn
niśā ādiṣṭa dala vyoṣa kārpāsa asthi karaiḥ niśi
hunet eraṇḍa taila aktaiḥ śmaśāne ripu śāntaye

original: na śastaṃ māraṇaṃ karma kuryyāñcedayutaṃ hunet // NarP_1,80.281 //
analyzed: na śastam māraṇam karma kuryyāt ced ayutam hunet
pāyasaiḥ vā hunet tāvat śāntaye śānta mānasaḥ

original: pārijātaharaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ dhyāyan lakṣaṃ japenmanum // NarP_1,80.282 //
analyzed: pārijāta haram kṛṣṇam dhyāyan lakṣam japet manum
sarvatra eva jayaḥ tasya na kadāpi parājayaḥ
vyākhyā mudrā karam kṛṣṇam ratha stham bhāvayan japet
pārthe diśantam gīta artham dharma vṛddhyai su mānavaḥ
pāvāśa puṣpaiḥ madhu aktaiḥ lakṣam vidyā āptaye hunet
rāṣṭra pūḥ grāma vastūnām śarīrasya api rakṣaṇe
viśva rūpa dhara prodyat bhānu koṭi sama prabham
agrīṣoma ātmakam kṛṣṇam druta cāmīkara prabham
arka agni dyotita āsya aṅghrim praṅkaja divya bhūṣaṇam
nānā āyudha dharam prāptam viśva ākāśa avakāśakam

original: dhyātvā lakṣa japenmantraṃ rakṣaṇāya samāhitaḥ // NarP_1,80.287 //
analyzed: dhyātvā lakṣa japet mantram rakṣaṇāya samāhitaḥ
raktaiḥ vanya prasūnaiḥ yaḥ dina ādau pūjayet harim
dina madhya ukta vidhinā japet aṣṭa uttaram śatam
sahasra maṇḍalān mantrī vaśayet mukharān dvijān
jāti puṣpaiḥ kṣatriyān ca gopa veṣa dharam smaran
dhyāyan krīḍā ratam kṛṣṇam raktaiḥ aśvāri puṣpakaiḥ
vaśayet vaiśya jātīyān śūdrān nīlotpalaiḥ smaran
gīta nṛtya ratam śveta puṣpaiḥ sa ājyaiḥ ca tandulaiḥ

original: hutvānvahaṃ saptadinaṃ bhasma bhāle ca mūrddhani // NarP_1,80.291 //
analyzed: hutvā anvaham sapta dinam bhasma bhāle ca mūrddhani
dhārayan vaśayet kāntām sā api tadvat patim dhruvam

original: tāṃbūlaṃ kusumaṃ vāsoṃ'janaṃ candanameva ca // NarP_1,80.292 //
analyzed: tāṃbūlam kusumam vāsaḥ ūṃjanam candanam eva ca

original: sahasraṃ manunā japtaṃ dadyādyasmai narāya ca /
analyzed: sahasram manunā japtam dadyāt yasmai narāya ca
saḥ cirāt eṣa vaśagaḥ sa putra paśu bāndhavaḥ
vṛndāraṇya sthitam dhyāyan ballavī saṃyutam harim
apāmārga samidbhiḥ tu hutvā tu vaśayet jagat

original: saṃprāpya sadguror dīkṣāṃ kṛṣṇaṃ yo vidhināmunā /
analyzed: saṃprāpya sat guroḥ dīkṣām kṛṣṇam yaḥ vidhinā amunā
arcayet vaiṣṇava śreṣṭhaḥ bhavet
tasya darśana mātreṇa vādinaḥ niṣprabhāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: vasetsarasvatī vakre gṛhe cāpi sabhāsadaḥ // NarP_1,80.296 //
analyzed: vaset sarasvatī vakre gṛhe ca api sabhāsadaḥ
bhuktvā nānāvidhān bhogān ante viṣṇu padam vrajet

original: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge tṛtīyapāde kṛṣṇamantranirūpaṇaṃ nāmāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī bṛhat nāradīyapurāṇe pūrva bhāge tṛtīya pāde kṛṣṇamantranirūpaṇam nāma aśītitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī sanatkumāraḥ uvāca

original: atha kṛṣṇasya mantrāṇāṃ vakṣye bhedān munīśvara /
analyzed: atha kṛṣṇasya mantrāṇām vakṣye bhedān muni īśvara
yān samārādhya manujāḥ sādhayanti iṣṭam ātmanaḥ
śakti śrī māra pūrvaḥ ca śrī śakti smara pūrvakaḥ
māra śaktiḥ amā pūrvaḥ daśa arṇāḥ manavaḥ trayaḥ

original: muniḥ syānnā radacchando gāyatrī devatā punaḥ /
analyzed: muniḥ syāt nā rada chandaḥ gāyatrī devatā punar
kṛṣṇaḥ govinda nāmā atra sarva kāma pradaḥ nṛṇām
cakraiḥ pūrvavat aṅgāni trayāṇām api kalpayet
tatas kirīṭa manunā avyāpakam hi samācaret
sudarśanasya manunā kuryāt digbandhanam tathā
viṃśati arṇa ukta vat kuryāt ādye dhyāna arcana ādikam
dvitīye tu daśārṇa uktam dhyāna pūjā ādikam caret

original: tṛtīye tu hariṃ dhyāyetsamāhitamanāḥ sudhīḥ // NarP_1,81.6 //
analyzed: tṛtīye tu harim dhyāyet samāhita manāḥ sudhīḥ
śakha cakra dhanuḥ bāṇa pāśa aṅkuśa dhara aruṇam

original: dorbhyāṃ dhṛtaṃ dhamantaṃ ca veṇuṃ kṛṣṇadivākaram // NarP_1,81.7 //
analyzed: dorbhyām dhṛtam dhamantam ca veṇum kṛṣṇa divākaram
evam dhyātvā japet mantrān pañca lakṣam pṛthak sudhīḥ
juhuyāt tad daśa aṃśena pāyasena sa sarpiṣā

original: evaṃ siddhe manau mantrī kuryātkāmyāni pūrvavat /
analyzed: evam siddhe manau mantrī kuryāt kāmyāni pūrvavat
śrī śakti kāmaḥ kṛṣṇāya govindāya agnisundarī
ratri arṇaḥ brahma gāyatrī kṛṣṇāḥ ṛṣi ādayaḥ tu
bījaiḥ ama abdhi yugma arṇaiḥ ṣaṣ aṅgāni prakalpayet
viṃśati arṇa udita japa dhyāna homa arcana ādikam
kim bahu uktena mantraḥ yam sarva abhīṣṭa phala pradaḥ

original: daśākṣaraḥ sa evādau proktaḥ śaktiramāyutaḥ // NarP_1,81.12 //
analyzed: daśa akṣaraḥ saḥ eva ādau proktaḥ śakti ramā yutaḥ
mantrau ṣoḍaśa ravya arṇaum cakraiḥ aṅgāni kalpayet
varadā abhaya hastābhyām śliṣyantam sva aṅgake priye
padma utpala kare tābhyām śliṣṭam cakra dara ujvalam
dhyātvā evam prajapet lakṣa daśakam tad daśa aṃśataḥ
ājyaiḥ hutvā tatas siddhau bhavetām mantra nāyakau
sarva kāma pradau sarva saṃpad saubha gāgya dau nṛṇām
aṣṭādaśa arṇaḥ kāma antaḥ manuḥ suta dhana pradaḥ

original: nārado 'sya muniśchando gāyatrī devatā manoḥ // NarP_1,81.16 //
analyzed: nāradaḥ sya muniḥ chandaḥ gāyatrī devatā manoḥ
kṛṣṇaḥ kāmaḥ bījam uktam śaktiḥ vahnipriyā matā
ṣaṣ vīrya āḍhyena bījena ṣaṣ aṅgāni samācaret
pāṇau pāyasa pakvam ca dakṣe haiyaṅgavīnakam
vāme dadhat divya diś aṃbaraḥ gopī sutaḥ vatu
dhyātvā evam prajapet mantram dvātriṃśat lakṣa mānataḥ
daśa aṃśam juhuyāt agnau sita āḍhyena payoṃdhasā
pūrva ukta vaiṣṇave pīṭhe yajet aṣṭādaśa arṇa vat
padma stham kṛṣṇam abhyarcya tarpayet tad mukha aṃbuje
kṣīreṇa kadalī pakkaiḥ dadhnā haiyaṅgavena ca
putra arthī tarpayet evam vatsarāt labhate sutam
yat yat icchati tat sarvam tarpaṇāt eva siddhyati

original: vākkāmo ṅeyutaṃ kṛṣṇapadaṃ māyā tataḥ pagaram // NarP_1,81.22 //
analyzed: vāc kāmaḥ ṅeyutam kṛṣṇa padam māyā tatas pagaram
govindāya ramā paścāt daśārṇam ca samuddharet
manu svara yutau sarga yuktau bhṛgu tad ūrddhūgau

original: ṛṣiḥ syānnāradaśchando gāyatrī devatā punaḥ // NarP_1,81.24 //
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ syāt nāradaḥ chandaḥ gāyatrī devatā punar
vidyā pradaḥ ca gopālaḥ kāmaḥ bījam prakīrtitam
śaktiḥ tu vāc bhavam vidyā prāptaye viniyojanā
vāma ūrddhva haste dadhatam vidyā pustakam uttamam
akṣamālām ca dakṣa ūrddhva sphaāṭikīm mātṛkā mayīm
śabdabrahma mayam veṇum adhas pāṇi dvaye punar
gāyatrī gīta vasanam śyāmalam komala chavim
barha avataṃsam sarvajñam sevitam muni puṅgavaiḥ
dhyātvā evam pramadā veśa vilāsam bhuvaneśvaram
veda lakṣam japet mantram kiṃśukaiḥ tad daśa aṃśataḥ
hutvā tu pūjayet mantrī viṃśati arṇa vidhānataḥ

original: evaṃ yo bhajate mantraṃ bhavedvāgīśvarastu saḥ /
analyzed: evam yaḥ bhajate mantram bhavet vāc īśvaraḥ tu saḥ
adṛṣṭāni api śāstrāṇi tasya gaṅgā taraṅga vat
tāraḥ kṛṣṇa yugam paścāt mahākṛṣṇaḥ iti īrayet
sarvajña tvam praśam śabda ante sīdame gniḥ ca māram

original: ṇānti vidyeśa vidyāmāśu prayaccha tataśca me /
analyzed: vidyeśa vidyām āśu prayaccha tatas ca me
trayastriṃśat akṣaraḥ yam mahāvidyā pradaḥ manuḥ
nāradaḥ sya muniḥ chandaḥ nuṣṭubh kṛṣṇaḥ sya devatā

original: pādaiḥ sarveṇa pañcāṅgaṃ kṛtvā dhyāyettato harim // NarP_1,81.33 //
analyzed: pādaiḥ sarveṇa pañcāṅgam kṛtvā dhyāyet tatas harim

original: divyodyāne vivasvatpratimamaṇimaye maṇḍape yogapīṭhe madhye yaḥ sarvavedāntamayasurataroḥ saṃniviṣṭo mukundaḥ /
analyzed: divya udyāne vivasvat pratima maṇi maye maṇḍape yogapīṭhe madhye yaḥ sarva vedānta maya sura taroḥ saṃniviṣṭaḥ mukundaḥ
vedaiḥ kalpadru rūpaiḥ śikhari śata samālaṃbi kośaiḥ caturbhiḥ nyāyaiḥ tarkaiḥ purāṇaiḥ smṛtibhiḥ abhivṛtaḥ tādṛśaiḥ ca amara ādyaiḥ
dadyāt bibhrat kara agraiḥ api dara muralī puṣpa bāṇa ikṣu cāpān akṣa spṛś pūrṇa kuṃbhau smara lalita vapuḥ divya bhūṣā aṅgarāgaḥ

original: vyākhyāṃ vāme vitanvan sphuṭarucirapado veṇunā viśvamātre śabdabrahmodbhavena śriyamaruṇarucirballavīvallabho naḥ // NarP_1,81.35 //
analyzed: vyākhyām vāme vitanvan sphuṭa rucira padaḥ veṇunā viśvamātre śabdabrahma udbhavena śriyam aruṇa ruciḥ ballavī vallabhaḥ naḥ
evam dhyātvā japet lakṣam daśa aṃśam pāyasaiḥ hunet
aṣṭādaśa arṇa vat kuryāt yajanam ca asya mantra vid
tāraḥ namaḥ bhagavate nanda putrāya saṃvadet
ānanda vapuṣe dadyāt ṛśa arṇam tad anantaram
aṣṭāviṃśati varṇaḥ yam mantraḥ sarva iṣṭa dāyakaḥ
nanda putra padam ṅeṃtam śyāmala aṅga padam tathā

original: tathā bālavapuḥkṛṣṇaṃ govindaṃ ca tathā punaḥ /
analyzed: tathā bāla vapuḥ kṛṣṇam govindam ca tathā punar
bhavet mantraḥ dvātriṃśat akṣara anvitaḥ
anayoḥ nārada ṛṣiḥ chandaḥ tūṣṇih anuṣṭubhau
devatā nanda putraḥ tu khila āptaye
cakraiḥ pañcāṅgam arcā āsyāt aṅga dikpāla hetibhiḥ
dakṣiṇe ratna caṣakam vāme sauvarṇa netrakam
kare dadhānam devībhyām śliṣṭam saṃcintayet vibhum

original: lakṣaṃ japo daśāṃśena juhuyātpāyasena tu // NarP_1,81.42 //
analyzed: lakṣam japaḥ daśa aṃśena juhuyāt pāyasena tu
etābhyām siddha mantrābhyām mantrī kuryāt yathā īpsitam

original: praṇavaḥ kamalā māyā namo bhagavate tataḥ // NarP_1,81.43 //
analyzed: praṇavaḥ kamalā māyā namaḥ bhagavate tatas
nanda putrāya tat paścāt bāla ante vapuṣe padam
ūnaviṃśati varṇaḥ yam muniḥ brahmā samīritaḥ

original: chando 'nuṣṭup devatā ca kṛṣṇo bālavapuḥ svayam /
analyzed: chandaḥ nuṣṭubh devatā ca kṛṣṇaḥ bāla vapuḥ svayam
mantraḥ yam sarva saṃpatti siddhaye sevyate budhaiḥ
tāraḥ rukmiṇī vallabhāya ca
nāradaḥ sya muniḥ chandaḥ nuṣṭubh ca devatā manoḥ
pañcāṅgāni prakurvīta tatas dhyāyet sureśvaram
tāpiccha chaviḥ aṅka gām priyatamām svarṇa prabhām aṃbuja prodyat dāma bhujām sva vāma bhujayā āśliṣyan sva citta āśayā

original: śliṣyantīṃ svayamanyahastavilatsauvarṇavetraściraṃ pāyānnaḥ suviśuddhapītavasano nānāvibhūṣo hariḥ // NarP_1,81.48 //
analyzed: śliṣyantīm svayam anya hasta vilat sauvarṇa vetraḥ ciram pāyāt naḥ su viśuddha pīta vasanaḥ nānā vibhūṣaḥ hariḥ
dhyātvā evam prajapet lakṣam raktaiḥ padmaiḥ daśa aṃśataḥ
trimadhu aktaiḥ hunet pīṭhe pūrva ukte pūjayet harim
aṅgaiḥ nārada mukhyaiḥ ca lokeśaiḥ ca tad āyudhaiḥ
evam siddhaḥ manuḥ dadyāt sarvān kāmān ca mantriṇe
līlā daṇḍa pada abjaḥ pi jana saṃsakta dos padam
daṇḍa ante vā dharā vahniḥ adhīśa āḍhyaḥ lohitaḥ
megha śyāma padam paścāt bhagavān salilaṃsadṛś
viṣṇo iti uktvā ṭha dvayam syāt ekonatriṃśat arṇavān

original: nārado 'sya muniśchando 'nuṣṭup ca devatā manoḥ // NarP_1,81.53 //
analyzed: nāradaḥ sya muniḥ chandaḥ nuṣṭubh ca devatā manoḥ

original: vedaiḥ pañcāṃ gakaṃ bhāgairmantravarṇotthitaiḥ kramāt // NarP_1,81.54 //
analyzed: vedaiḥ bhāgaiḥ mantra varṇa utthitaiḥ kramāt
saṃmohayan ca nija vāma kara stha līlā daṇḍena gopa yuvatīḥ para suṃdarīḥ ca

original: diśyannijapriyasakhāṃsagandakṣahasto devaśriyaṃ nihatakaṃsa urukramo naḥ // NarP_1,81.55 //
analyzed: diśyat nija priya sakha aṃsagat dakṣa hastaḥ deva śriyam nihata kaṃsaḥ uru kramaḥ naḥ
lakṣam japaḥ daśa aṃśena juhuyāt tila taṇḍulaiḥ
trimadhu aktaiḥ tatas bhyarcet aṅgam dikpāla hetibhiḥ

original: līlādaṇḍa hariṃ yo vai bhajate nityamādarāt /
analyzed: līlādaṇḍa harim yaḥ vai bhajate nityam ādarāt

original: sa sarvaiḥ pūjyate lokaistasya gehe sthirā ramā // NarP_1,81.57 //
analyzed: sa sarvaiḥ pūjyate lokaiḥ tasya gehe sthirā ramā
sadya ārūḍhā smṛtiḥ toyam keśava āḍhya dharā yugam
ṛṣiḥ syāt nāradaḥ chandaḥ uṣṇih govallamasya tu
devatā pūrvavat cakraiḥ pañcāṅgāni tu kalpayet
dhyeyaḥ hariḥ sa kapilā gaṇa madhya saṃsthaḥ tāḥ āhvayan dadhat dakṣiṇa dostha veṇum
pāśam sa yaṣṭim aparatra payoda nīlaḥ pīta ambara ahi ripu piccha kṛta avataṃsaḥ
sapta lakṣam japet mantram daśa aṃśam juhuyāt tatas

analyzed: khaḍgīśaḥ rocanīya inte bhagam dhehi namaḥ antakaḥ
tārā ādi pīṭha mantraḥ yam vedarāma akṣaraḥ mataḥ
samarpya āsanam etena tatra saṃpūjayet śivām
trikoṇa madhya ṣaṭkoṇa padma bhūpura madhyatas
bāhya āvaraṇam ārabhya pūjayet pratilomataḥ
bhūpure bāhya bhāgeṣu vajra ādīni prapūjayet
tad antar surarāja ādīn pūjayet haritām patīn
bhūpurasya catur dvārṣu dvārapālān yajet atha
karāla vikarāla ākhyau atikālaḥ tṛtīyakaḥ
mahākālaḥ caturthaḥ syāt atha padma iṣṭa śaktayaḥ

original: ekaliṅgā yoginī ca ḍākinī bhairavī tathā /
analyzed: ekaliṅgā yoginī ca ḍākinī bhairavī tathā
saṃhāriṇī aṣṭamī ca iti ṣaṣ koṇeṣu aṅga mūrtayaḥ
trikoṇa gā chinna mastā pārśvayoḥ tu sakhī dvayam
ḍākinī varṇanī saṃjñam tārā vāgbhyām prapūjayet

original: evaṃ pūjādibhiḥ siddhe mantre mantrī manorathān // NarP_1,87.20 //
analyzed: evam pūjā ādibhiḥ siddhe mantre mantrī manorathān
prāpnuyāt nikhilān sadyas durlabhān tad prasādataḥ
śrī puṣpaiḥ labhate lakṣmīm tad phailaḥ ca samīhitam
vāc siddhim mālatī puṣpaiḥ caṃpakaiḥ havanāt sukham

original: ghṛtāktaṃ chāgamāṃsaṃ yo juhuyātpratyahaṃ śatam // NarP_1,87.22 //
analyzed: ghṛta aktam chāga māṃsam yaḥ juhuyāt pratyaham śatam
māsam ekam tu vaśa gāḥ tasya syuḥ sarva pārthivāḥ
karavīra sumaiḥ śvataiḥ lakṣa saṃkhyaiḥ juhoti yaḥ
roga jālam parābhūya sukhī jīvet śatam samāḥ

original: raktau statsaṃkhyayā hutvā vaśayenmantriṇo nṛpān // NarP_1,87.24 //
analyzed: raktau stad saṃkhyayā hutvā vaśayet mantriṇaḥ nṛpān
phalaiḥ hutvā amuyāt lakṣmīm uduṃbara palāśa jaiḥ
gomāyu māṃsaiḥ tām eva kavi tām pāyasāṃdhasā
bandhūka kusumaiḥ bhāgyam karmi kāraiḥ samīhitam
tila taṇḍula homena vaśayet nikhila añjanān
nārī rajobhiḥ ākṛṣṭaiḥ mṛga māṃsaiḥ samīhitam
staṃbhanam māhiṣaiḥ māṃsaiḥ paṅkajaiḥ sa ghṛtaiḥ api
citā agnau parabhṛt pakṣaiḥ jurhuyāt ari mṛtyave
unmatta kāṣṭha dīpte gnau tad phalam vāyasacchadaiḥ
dyūte vane nṛpa dvāre samare vairi saṃkaṭe

original: vijayaṃ labhate mantrī dhyāyandevīṃ japanmanum // NarP_1,87.29 //
analyzed: vijayam labhate mantrī dhyāyan devīm japan manum
bhuktyai muktyai sitām dhyāyet uccāṭe

original: raktāṃ vaśye mṛtau dhūmrāṃ staṃbhane kanakaprabhām // NarP_1,87.30 //
analyzed: raktām vaśye mṛtau dhūmrām staṃbhane kanaka prabhām
niśi dadyāt balim tasyai siddhaye madirā ādinā
gopanīyaḥ prayogaḥ procyate sarva siddhi daḥ
bhūtāhe kṛṣṇapakṣasya madhyarātre tamaḥ ghane
snāttvā rakta ambara dharaḥ rakta mālya anulepanaḥ
ānīya pūjayet nārīm chinnamastā svarūpiṇīm
sundarīm yauvana ākrāntām nara pañcaka gāminīm
su smitām mukta kabīrīm bhūṣā dāna pratoṣitām
vivastrām pūjayitvā enām ayutam prajapet manum

original: baliṃ dattvā niśāṃ nītvā saṃpreṣya dhanatoṣitām /
analyzed: balim dattvā niśām nītvā saṃpreṣya dhana toṣitām
bhojayet vividhaiḥ annaiḥ brāhmaṇān bhojana ādinā
anena vidhinā lakṣmīm putrān pautrān dhanam yaśaḥ

original: nārīmāyuḥ sukhaṃ dharmamiṣṭaṃ ca samavāpnuyāt // NarP_1,87.36 //
analyzed: nārīm āyuḥ sukham dharmam iṣṭam ca samavāpnuyāt

original: tasyāṃ rātrau vrataṃ kāryaṃ vidyākāmena mantriṇā /
analyzed: tasyām rātrau vratam kāryam vidyā kāmena mantriṇā
manoratheṣu ca anyeṣu gacchet tām prajapan manum
uṣasi utthāya śayyāyām upaviṣṭaḥ japet śatam
ṣaṣ māsa abhyantare mantrī kavi tvena jayet kavim
śivena kīlitā ca iyam tat utkīlanam ucyate

original: māyāṃ tārapuṭāṃ mantrī japedaṣṭottaraṃ śatam // NarP_1,87.39 //
analyzed: māyām tāra puṭām mantrī japet aṣṭa uttaram śatam
mantrasya ādau tathā eva ante bhavet siddhi pradā tu sā
uditā chinna mastā iyam kalau śīghram abhīṣṭa dā
avatāra antaram devyāḥ vacmi te muni sattama
śāntiḥ tathāvidhā ca api nīca sarga anvitāḥ tathā
vāc bhavam kāmarāja ākhyam śakti bīja āhvayam tathā
tribhiḥ bījaiḥ pañca kūṭa ātmikā tripurabhairavī
ṛṣiḥ syāt dakṣiṇāmūrtiḥ chandaḥ paṅktiḥ udīritā
devatā deśikaiḥ uktā devī tripurabhairavī
nābheḥ ācaraṇam nyasya vāc bhavam mantra vid punar
hṛdayāt nābhi paryantam kāmabījam pravinyaset
śirasaḥ hṛd pradeśa antam tārtīyam vinyaset tatas
ādyam dvitīyam karayoḥ tārtīyam ubhayam nyaset

original: mūlādhāre hṛdi nyasya bhūyo bījatrayaṃ kramāt // NarP_1,87.46 //

analyzed: navayoni ātmakam nyāsam kuryāt bījaiḥ tribhiḥ punar
bāla udita prakāreṇa mūrti nyāsam atha ācaret
sva sva bīja ādikam pūrvam mūrdhni īśāna manobhavam
nyaset vaktre tatpuruṣam makaradhvajam ātma vid
hṛdi aghora kumāra ādi kandarppam tad anantaram
guhya deśe pravinyasyet vāmadeva ādi manmatham
sadyojātam kāma devam pādayoḥ vinyaset tatas
ūrddhvam prāc dakṣiṇa udīcya paścimeṣu mukheṣu tān
pravinyaset ya bhṛguḥ vyoma agni saṃsthitaḥ
sadya ādi pañca hrasva ādyāḥ bījam eṣām prakīrtitam
ṣaṣ dīrgha yuktena ādyena bījena aṅga kriyā matā
pañcabāṇān tatas nyasyet mantrī trailokya mohanān

original: drāmādyāṃ drāviṇīṃ mūrdhniṃ drāmādyāṃ kṣobhaṇī pade /
analyzed: drāma ādyām drāviṇīm drāma ādyām kṣobhaṇī pade

original: klīṃvaśīkaraṇīṃ vaktre guhye bḷṃ bījapūrvikām // NarP_1,87.53 //
analyzed: klīṃ vaśīkaraṇīm vaktre guhye bḷṃ bīja pūrvikām
ākarṣaṇīm hṛdi punar sarva anta bhṛgu saṃsthitām
saṃmohanīm kramāt evam bāṇa nyāsaḥ yam īritaḥ
bhāla bhrū madhya vadane ghaṇṭikā kaṇṭha hṛtsu ca
nābhi adhiṣṭhānayoḥ pañca tārā ādyāḥ subhagā ādikāḥ
nābheḥ ca mantriṇā subhagā bhagā
bhagasarpiṇī atha parā bhagamālinī anantaram
anaṅgā anaṅgakusumā bhūyas ca anaṅgamekhalā
anaṅga madanā sarvā mada vibhrama mantharā
pradhānadevatāḥ varṇa bhūṣaṇa ādyaiḥ alaṅkṛtāḥ

original: vākkāmablūṃ strīṃ sarānte tārāḥ pañca prakīrtitāḥ /
analyzed: strīm sara ante tārāḥ pañca prakīrtitāḥ
tatas kuryāt bhūṣaṇa ākhyam nyāsam ukta diśā mune
evam nyasta śarīraḥ sau dhyāyet tripurabhairavīm
sahasra bhānu saṃkāśām aruṇa kṣauma vāsasīm
śiraḥ mālām asṛj lipta stanīm japa vaṭīm karaiḥ

original: vidyāmabhītiṃ ca varaṃ dadhatīṃ trīkṣaṇānanām // NarP_1,87.61 //
analyzed: vidyām abhītim ca varam dadhatīm trīkṣaṇa ānanām
dīkṣām prāpya japet mantram tattva lakṣam jita indriyaḥ
puṣpaiḥ bhānu sahasrāṇi juhuyāt bahmavṛkṣa jaiḥ
trimadhu aktaiḥ prasūnaiḥ vā karavīra samudbhavaiḥ
icchā ādi śaktibhiḥ yuktam bhairavyāḥ pīṭham arcayet

original: icchā jñānā kriyā paścātkāminī kāmadāyinī // NarP_1,87.64 //

analyzed: vara da abhaya dhāriṇyaḥ saṃproktāḥ nava śaktayaḥ
vāc bhavam lohitaḥ rāyai śrīkaṇṭhaḥ lohitaḥ nalaḥ

original: dīrghavānyai parā paścādaparāyau hasau yutaḥ // NarP_1,87.66 //
analyzed: parā paścāt aparāyau hasau yutaḥ
padmāsanam namaḥ
anena manunā dadyāt āsanam śrī guru kramam
prāk madhyayoni antarāle pūjayet kalpayet tatas
pañcabhiḥ praṇavaiḥ mūrtim tasyām āvāhya devatām
pūjayet agama uktena vidhānena samāhitaḥ
tārā vāc śakti kamalāḥ hasa khū phreṃ hasauḥ smṛtāḥ
vāma koṇe yajet devyā ratim indu sama prabhām
sṛṇi pāśa dharām saumyām mada vibhrama vihvalām
prītim takṣiṇa koṇa sthām tapta kāñcana sannibhām

original: aṅkuśaṃ praṇataṃ dobhyāṃ dhārayantīṃ samarcayet // NarP_1,87.71 //
analyzed: aṅkuśam praṇatam dobhyām dhārayantīm samarcayet
agre manobhavām raktām rakta puṣpa ādi alaṅkṛtām
ikṣu kārmuka puṣpa iṣu dhāriṇīm sa smita ānanām
aṅgāni abhyarcayet paścāt yathāpūrvam vidhāna vid
dikṣu agre ca nijaiḥ mantraiḥ pūjayet bāṇa devatāḥ
hasta abjaiḥ dhṛta puṣpa iṣu praṇāma amṛta saprabhāḥ
aṣṭa yoniṣu aṣṭa śaktīḥ pūjayet subhagā ādikāḥ
mātaraḥ bhairava aṅka sthāḥ mada vibhrama vihvalāḥ
aṣṭa patreṣu saṃpūjyāḥ yathāvat kusuma ādibhiḥ
lokapālān tatas dikṣu teṣām astrāṇi tad bahis
pūrva janma kṛtaiḥ puṇyaiḥ jñātvā enām para devatām
yaḥ bhajet ukta mārgeṇa sa bhavet saṃpadām padam
evam siddha manuḥ mantrī sādhayet iṣṭam ātmanaḥ
juhuyāt aruṇa aṃbhoñjaiḥ adoṣaiḥ madhura āplutaiḥ

original: lakṣasaṃkhyaṃ tadarddhaṃ vā pratyahaṃ bhojayeddvijān // NarP_1,87.78 //
analyzed: lakṣa saṃkhyam tad arddham vā pratyaham bhojayet dvijān
vanitāḥ yuvatīḥ ramyāḥ prīṇayet devatā dhiyā
homa ante dhana dhānya ādyaiḥ toṣayet gurum ātmanaḥ

original: evaṃ kṛte jagadvaśyo ramāyā bhavanaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: evam kṛte jagat vaśyaḥ ramāyāḥ bhavanam bhavet
rakta utpalaiḥ trimadhu aktaiḥ aruṇaiḥ vā hayāri jaiḥ
puṣpaiḥ payaḥ naiḥ sa ghṛtaiḥ hemāt viśvam vaśam nayet
vāc siddham labhate mantrī palāśa kusumaiḥ hutaiḥ
karpūra aguru saṃyuktam guggulam juhuyāt sudhīḥ

original: jñānaṃ divyamavāpnoti tenaiva sa bhavetkaviḥ // NarP_1,87.82 //
analyzed: jñānam divyam avāpnoti tena eva sa bhavet kaviḥ
kṣīra aktaiḥ amṛtā khaṇḍaiḥ hemaḥ sarva apamṛtyu jit
homaḥ kṣīra aktābhiḥ dina trayam
girikarṇī bhavaiḥ puṣpaiḥ brāhmaṇān vaśayet hutaiḥ
kahlāraiḥ pārthivān puṣpaiḥ tad vadhūḥ karṇikāra jaiḥ
mallikā kusumaiḥ hutvā rāja putrān vaśam nayet
koraṇṭa kusumaiḥ vaiṃśyān vṛṣalān pāṭalā udbhavaiḥ
anulomām viloma anta sthita sādhya āhvaya anvitam
mantram uccārya juhuyāt mantrī madhura lolitaiḥ
sarṣapaiḥ madhu saṃmiśraiḥ vaśayet pārthivān kṣaṇāt
anena eva vidhānena tad patnīḥ tad sutān api
jāti bilva bhavaiḥ puṣpaiḥ madhuratraya saṃyutaiḥ
nara nārī narapatīn homena vaśayet kramāt
mālatī bakula udbhūtaiḥ puṣpaiḥ candana lolitaiḥ
juhuyāt kavi tām mantrī labhate vatsara antare
madhu ratra ghaya saṃyuktaiḥ phalaiḥ bilva samudbhavaiḥ
juhuyāt vāśayet lokam śriyam prāpnoti vāñchitām
sa ājyam annam prajuhuyāt bhavet anna samṛddhimān
kastūrī kuṅkuma upetam karpūram juhuyāt vaśī
kandarpāt adhikam sadyas saindaryam adhigacchati
lājān prajuhuyāt mantrī dadhi kṣīra madhu plutān
vijitya rogān akhilān sa jīvet śaradām śatam
pādam gorocanā antāni trīṇi piṣṭvā ahima aṃbhasā
vidadhyāt tilakam bhāle yān paśyet yaiḥ vilokyate
yān spṛśet spṛśyate yaiḥ vā vaśyāḥ syuḥ tasya te cirāt
karpūra kapi corāṇi sama bhāgāni kalpayet
catur bhujā jaṭāmāṃsī tāvatī rocanā matā

original: kuṅkumaṃ samabhāgaṃ syāddigbhātaṃ candanaṃ matam // NarP_1,87.96 //

analyzed: aguruḥ nava bhāgam syāt iti bhāga krameṇa ca
hima adbhiḥ kanyayā piṣṭam etat sarvam su sādhitam
ādāya tilakam bhāle kuryyāt bhūmipatīn narān
vanitā mada garva āḍhyāḥ mada unmattān matanda jān
siṃha vyāghrān mahā sarpān bhūta vetāla rākṣasān
darśanāt eva vaśayet tilakam dhārayan naraḥ
iti eṣā bhairavī proktā hi avatāra antaram śṛṇu

original: vāṅmāyā kamalā tāro namonte bhagavatyatha // NarP_1,87.100 //
analyzed: vāc māyā kamalā tāraḥ namaḥ nte bhagavatī atha
śrī mātaṅgeśvari vadet sarva jana manohari
sarva rāja vaśam paścāt kari sarva padam vadet
strī puruṣa vaśam sṛṣṭi vidyā krodhinikā anvitā
sarvam duṣṭa mṛga vaśam kari sarva padam tatas
sarva sattva vaśaṅkari sarva lokam tatas param
amukam me vaśam paścāt ānaya analasundarī
aṣṭāśīti akṣaraḥ mantraḥ muni ādyāḥ bhairavī gatāḥ
nyāsāt mantrī tanau kuryāt vakṣyamāṇān yathākramam
śiraḥ lalāṭa bhrū madhye tālu kaṇṭha gala urasi
anāhate bhuja dvandve jaṭhare nābhi maṇḍale
svādhiṣṭhāne gupta deśe pādayoḥ dakṣa vāmayoḥ
mūlādhāre gude nyasyet padāni aṣṭādaśa kramāt
guṇa eka dvi catuḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ vasu parva nava aṣṭabhiḥ
nanda paṅkti aṣṭa veda agni candra yugma guṇā kṣibhiḥ
yadu kḷptiḥ iyam proktā mantra varṇaiḥ yathākramam
rati ādyāḥ mṛla hṛdaya bhru madhyeṣu vicakṣaṇaḥ
vāc śakti lakṣmī bīja ādyāḥ mātaṅgī antāḥ pravinyaset
śiraḥ vadana hṛd guhya pādeṣu vidhinā nyaset

original: hṛllekhāṃ gaganāṃ raktāṃ bhūyo mantrī karālikām // NarP_1,87.110 //
analyzed: hṛllekhām gaganām raktām bhūyas mantrī karālikām
mahā ucchuṣmām sva nāma ādi varṇa bīja puras sarāḥ

original: mātaṅgyantāḥ ṣaḍaṅgāni tataḥ kurvīta sādhakaḥ // NarP_1,87.111 //
analyzed: mātaṅgī antāḥ ṣaṣ aṅgāni tatas kurvīta sādhakaḥ
varṇaiḥ caturviṃśatibhiḥ hṛd trayodaśabhiḥ śiraḥ
śikhā aṣṭādaśabhiḥ proktā varma tāvadbhiḥ akṣaraiḥ
syāt trayodaśabhiḥ netram dvābhyām astram prakīrtitam
bāṇa nyāsam tatas kuryāt bhairavī prokta vartmanā
mātaṅgī padayoḥ ca anyam manmatha anvadana aṃśayoḥ
bīja traya ādikāt mantrī manmatham makaradhvajam
madanam puṣpadhanvānam pañcamam kusumāyudham
ṣaṣṭham kandarpa nāmānam manobhava ratipriyau
mātaṅgī antāḥ tatas nyasyet sthāneṣu eteṣu mantra vid

original: kusumā mekhalā caiva madanā madanā turā /
analyzed: kusumā mekhalā ca eva madanā madanā turā
anaṅga pada pūrvāḥ ca mātaṅgī antāḥ samīritāḥ
vinyastavyāḥ tatas mūle dhiṣṭhāne maṇipūrake
hṛd kaṇṭha āsye bhruvoḥ madhye mastake ca api matriṇā

original: ādye lakṣmīsarasvatyau ratiḥ prītiśca kṛttikā // NarP_1,87.119 //
analyzed: ādye lakṣmī sarasvatyau ratiḥ prītiḥ ca kṛttikā
śāntiḥ puṣṭiḥ punar tuṣṭi mārta gaṃpada śekharā
mūlamantram pṛthak nyasyet nija mūrddhani mantra vid
ādhāra deśe dhiṣṭhāne nābhau paścāt anāhate

original: kaṇṭhadeśe bhravormadhye bindau bhūyaḥ kalā padoḥ // NarP_1,87.121 //
analyzed: kaṇṭha deśe bhravoḥ madhye bindau bhūyas kalā padoḥ
nirodhikāyām arddhendu nāde nāda antayoḥ punar

original: unnatāṃseṣu vaktre ca dhruvamaṇḍalake śive // NarP_1,87.122 //
analyzed: unnata aṃseṣu vaktre ca dhruva maṇḍalake śive
mātaṅgī antāḥ pravinyasye dvāmām jyeṣṭham atas param
raudrīm praśāntām śraddhā ākhyām punar māheśvarīm atha

original: kriyāśaktiṃ sulakṣmīṃ ca sṛṣṭiṃ saṃjñāṃ ca mohinīm /
analyzed: kriyāśaktim sulakṣmīm ca sṛṣṭim saṃjñām ca mohinīm
pramathāśvāsinīm vidyullatām cicchaktim api atha
tatas ca sundarīm nindām nanda buddhim imāḥ kramāt
śiraḥ bhāla hṛd ādhāreṣu etāḥ bīja traya adhikāḥ
mātaṅgī ādyāḥ pravinyasyet yathāvat deśika uttamaḥ
mātaṅgīm mahat ādyām tām mahā lakṣmī pada ādikām
siddha lakṣmī pada ādyām ca mūlam ādhāra maṇḍalam
nyaset tena eva kurvīta vyāpakam deśika uttamaḥ
evam nyasta śarīraḥ sau cintayet mantradevatām
śyāmām śuka uktim śṛṇvantīm nyasta eka aṅghri śiroruhām
śaśi khaṇḍa dharām vīṇām vādayantīm madhūnmadām
rakta aṃśukām ca kahlāra mālā śobhita cūlikām
śaṅkha patrām tu mātaṅgīm citraka udbhāsi mastakām
ayutam prajapet mantram tad daśa aṃśam madhūka jaiḥ
puṣpaiḥ trimadhura upetaiḥ juhuyāt mantra siddhaye
tri koṇa karṇikam padmam aṣṭa patram prakalpayet
aṣṭa patra āvṛtam bāhye vṛtam ṣoḍaśabhiḥ dalaiḥ
caturasrīkṛtam bāhye kāntyā dṛṣṭi manoharam
etasmin pūjayet pīṭhe nava śaktīḥ kramāt imāḥ
vibhūti pūrvāḥ pūrva uktāḥ mātaṅgī pada paścimāḥ

original: vāksatyalakṣmī bījādya uktaḥ pīṭhārcane manuḥ // NarP_1,87.134 //
analyzed: vāc satya lakṣmī bīja ādyaḥ uktaḥ pīṭha arcane manuḥ

arcayet vidhinā anena vakṣyamāṇena mantra vid
rati ādyāḥ triṣu koṇeṣu pūjayet pūrvavat sudhīḥ

original: hṛhṛllekhāḥ pañcapūjyā madhye dikṣu ca mantriṇā // NarP_1,87.136 //
analyzed: hṛ hṛllekhāḥ pañca pūjyāḥ madhye dikṣu ca mantriṇā

bāṇān abhyarcayet dikṣu pañcamam puratas yajet

original: patrāgreṣu punaḥ pūjyā lakṣmyādyā vallakīkarāḥ // NarP_1,87.139 //

apara aṅgāḥ niṣaṅga ādyāḥ puṣpa astra iṣu dhanurddharāḥ

original: punaḥ ṣoḍaśa patreṣu pūjyāḥ ṣoḍaśa śaktayaḥ /

original: vāyavye baṭukān paścādīśāne kṣetrapaṃ yajet // NarP_1,87.144 //
analyzed: vāyavye baṭukān paścāt īśāne kṣetrapam yajet
lokapālāḥ bahis pūjyāḥ vajra ādyaiḥ āyudhaiḥ saha
mantre smin saṃdhite mantrī sādhayet iṣṭam ātmanaḥ
mallikā jāti punnāgaiḥ hemāt bhāgya ālayaḥ bhavet
phala aurbilya samudbhūtaiḥ tad patraiḥ vā hutāt bhavet
rāja putrasya rājya āptiḥ paṅkajaiḥ śriyam āpnuyāt
utpalaiḥ vaśayet viśvam kṣāraiḥ madhu āśritaiḥ striyam
vañjulasya samidh homaḥ vṛṣṭim vitanute cirāt
kṣīra aktaiḥ amṛtā khaṇḍaiḥ hemāt nāśayati jvaram
dūrvābhiḥ āyuḥ āpnoti tandulaiḥ dhanavān bhavet
kadaṃbaiḥ vaśyam āpnoti sarvam trimadhura plutam
niṃba prasūnaiḥ juhuyāt īpsita śrī samṛddhaye
palāśa kusumaiḥ hemāt tejasvī jāyate naraḥ
vaśyāya ca priya tvāya hutāḥ ca tilakīkṛtāḥ

avatāra antaram bhūyas varṇayāmi niśāmaya

original: upavāsī śmaśāne vā vipine śūnyamandire // NarP_1,87.162 //

virodhi nāma saṃruddham kṛṣṇe pakṣe samuccaret
mahiṣī kṣīra dhūpam ca dadyāt śatru vipad karam

original: durgāyā jagadaṃbāyāḥ kiṃ punaḥ praṣṭumicchasi // NarP_1,87.169 //

original: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde durgāmantracatuṣṭayavarṇanaṃ nāma saptāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī bṛhat nāradīyapurāṇe pūrva bhāge bṛhat upākhyāne tṛtīya pāde durgāmantracatuṣṭayavarṇanam nāma saptāśītitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca

sarvāsām avatārāṇām nāradaḥ devadarśanaḥ
sarva ādyāyāḥ jaganmātuḥ śrī rādhāyāḥ samarcanam
avatāra kalānām hi papraccha vinaya anvitaḥ
nāradaḥ uvāca
dhanyaḥ smi kṛtakṛtyaḥ smi jātaḥ ham tvad prasādataḥ
pad jagat mātṛ mantrāṇām vaibhavam śrutavān mune
yathā lakṣmī mukhānām tu avatārāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

etat śutvā vacaḥ tasya nāradasya vidheḥ sutaḥ
sanatkumāraḥ provāca dhyātvā rādhā pada aṃbujam
sanatkumāraḥ uvāca
śṛṇu vipra pravakṣyāmi rahasya ati rahasyakam

original: candrāvalī ca lalitā dve sakhyau supriye sadā /

śatapatraiḥ jaya avāptyai ketakaiḥ vāhana āptaye
saurabha āḍhyaiḥ prasūnaiḥ tu nityam saubhāgya siddhaye

original: pūjayenmāsamātraṃ vā dviguṇaṃ triguṇaṃ tu vā // NarP_1,90.73 //
analyzed: pūjayet māsa mātram vā dviguṇam triguṇam tu vā
yāvat phala avāpti kāṅkṣī śarkarā ghṛta pāyasaiḥ
sa cakra parivārām tām devīm salila madhya gām
tarppayet kusumaiḥ sārdhyaiḥ sarva upadrava śāntaye

original: ghṛtaiḥ pūrṇāyuṣaḥ siddhyai kṣauddraiḥ saubhāgyasiddhaye // NarP_1,90.75 //
analyzed: ghṛtaiḥ pūrṇa āyuṣaḥ siddhyai kṣauddraiḥ saubhāgya siddhaye
dugdhaiḥ ārogya saṃsiddhyai tribhiḥ aiśvarya siddhaye
nālikera udakaiḥ prītyai hima toyaiḥ nṛpa āptaye
sarva artha siddhaye tauryaiḥ abhiṣiñcet maheśvarīm
pūga udyāne yajet devīm siddha dravyaiḥ divāniśam
nivasan tatra tad puṣpaiḥ jāyate manmatha upamaḥ
pūrṇāsu niyattam devīm kanyakāyām samarcayan

original: kṛtyāḥ pareritā mantrā vimukhāṃstān grasaṃti vai // NarP_1,90.78 //
analyzed: kṛtyāḥ pareritāḥ mantrāḥ vimukhān tān grasaṃti vai
liṅga traya mayīm devīm cakra sthābhiḥ ca śaktibhiḥ
pūjayan iṣṭam akhilam labhate paratra ca
śatamāna kṛtaiḥ svarṇa puṣpaiḥ saurabhya vāsitaiḥ
pūjayat māsa mātreṇa prāc janma ādyaiḥ vimucyate

original: tathā ratnaiśca navabhirmāsaṃ tu yadi pūjayet /
analyzed: tathā ratnaiḥ ca navabhiḥ māsam tu yadi pūjayet
vimukta sarva pāpa oghaiḥ tām ca paśyati cakṣuṣā
aṃśukaiḥ arcayet devīm māsa mātram sugandhibhiḥ
mucyate pāpa kṛtyā ādi duḥkha oghaiḥ itaraiḥ api
devī rūpam svam ātmānam cakram śaktīḥ samantataḥ
bhāvayan viṣayaiḥ puṣpaiḥ pūjayan tad mayaḥ bhavet

original: ṣoḍaśānāṃ tu nityānāṃ pratyeka tithayaḥ kramāt /
analyzed: ṣoḍaśānām tu nityānām pratyeka tithayaḥ kramāt
tad tittithau tad bhajanam japa homa ādikam caret
ghṛtam ca śarkarā dugdham apūpam kadalī palam

original: kṣaudraṃ guḍaṃ nālikeraphalaṃ lājā tilaṃ dadhi // NarP_1,90.85 //
analyzed: kṣaudram guḍam nālikera phalam lājā tilam dadhi
pṛthukam caṇakam mudga pāyasam ca nivedayet
kāmeśvarī ādi śaktīnām sarvāsām api ca uditam
ādyāyāḥ lalitāyāḥ tu sarvāṇi etāni sarvadā
nivedayet ca juhuyāt vahnau dadyāt nṛṇām api
tad tad vidyā akṣara proktam auṣadham tad pramāṇataḥ

original: saṃpiṣya guṭikīkṛtya tābhiḥ sarvaṃ ca sādhayet // NarP_1,90.88 //
analyzed: saṃpiṣya guṭikīkṛtya tābhiḥ sarvam ca sādhayet

original: bhaume raktotpalaiḥ saumye vāre tagarasaṃbhavaiḥ // NarP_1,90.89 //
analyzed: bhaume rakta utpalaiḥ saumye vāre tagara saṃbhavaiḥ
nīlotpalaiḥ mandavāre pūjayet iṣṭam ādarāt
nivedayet kramāt teṣu ravi vāra ādiṣu kramāt
pāyasam dugdha kadalī navanīta sitā ghṛtam
evam iṣṭam samārādhya devīm gandha ādibhiḥ yajet
graha pīḍām vijitya āśu sukhāni ca samaśnute
ardharātre tu sādhyām strīm smaran madana vahninā
dahyamānām hṛta svāntām mastaka sthāpita añjalim
vikīrṇa keśīm ālola locanām aruṇa aruṇām
vāyu preṅkhat patākā sthapadā padma kalevarām
viveka vidhurām mattām māna lajjā bhaya atigām
cintayan arcayet cakram madhye devīm digaṃbarām
japā dāḍima bandhūka kiṃśuka ādyaiḥ samarcayet
anyaiḥ sugandhi śepha ālī kusuma ādyaiḥ samarcayet
tri sapta rātrāt āyāti prokta rūpā mada ākulā
yāvat śarīrapātaḥ syāt śāpaḥ vā anapagā asya sā
padmaiḥ aktaiḥ trimadhu aktaiḥ hemāt lakṣmīm avāpnuyāt

original: tathaiva kairavai raktairaṅganāḥ svavaśaṃ nayet // NarP_1,90.98 //
analyzed: tathā eva kairavaiḥ raktaiḥ aṅganāḥ sva vaśam nayet
samāna rūpa vatsāyāḥ śuklāyāḥ goḥ payaḥ plutaiḥ
mallikā mālatī jātī śatapatraiḥ hutaiḥ bhavet
kīrti vidyā dhana ārogya saubhāgya vitta pādikam
āragvadha prasūnaiḥ tu kṣaudra aktaiḥ havanāt bhavet
svarṇa ādiḥ tam śatroḥ nṛpa ādīnām ca
ājya aktaiḥ karavīra utthaiḥ prasūnaiḥ aruṇaiḥ hutaiḥ
rakta aṃbarāṇi vanitā bhūpa amātya vaśam tathā
bhūṣā vāhana vāṇijya siddhayaḥ ca asya vāñchitāḥ
lavaṇaiḥ sarṣarpaiḥ aiḥ itaraiḥ vā atha homataḥ
sa taila aktaiḥ niśā madhye tu ānayet vāñchitām vadhūm
taila aktaiḥ juhuyāt kṛṣṇadara puṣpaiḥ niśātare
māsāt arāteḥ tasya ārtiḥ jvareṇa bhavati dhruvam
āruṣkaraiḥ dhṛta abhyaktaiḥ tad bījaiḥ niśi homataḥ
śatroḥ ddāha vraṇāni syuḥ duḥsādhyāni cikitsakaiḥ
tathā tad taila saṃsiktaiḥ bījaiḥ aṅkolakaiḥ api
maricaiḥ homa anusārataḥ
vāñchitām vanitām kāma jvara ārtām ānayet drutam
śālibhiḥ ca ājya saṃsiktaiḥ hemāt śālīn avāpnuyāt
mudgaiḥ mudgam ghṛtaiḥ ājyam siddhaiḥ ittham hutaiḥ bhavet
sādhya ṛkṣa vṛkṣa saṃbhūtām piṣṭa pāda rajaḥ kṛtām
rājī marīci loṇa utthām puttalīm juhuyāt niśi
prapadābhyām ca jaṅghābhyām jānubhyām uru yugmataḥ
nābheḥ adhastāt hṛdayāt bhinnena ākaṇṭhaḥ tathā

original: śirasā ca sutīkṣṇena cchitvā śastreṇa vai kramāt // NarP_1,90.110 //
analyzed: śirasā ca su tīkṣṇena chitvā śastreṇa vai kramāt
evam dvādaśadhā homān nara nārī narādhipāḥ
vaśyāḥ bhavanti sapta āḍāt jvara ārttīḥ ca asya vāñchayā
piṣṭena guḍa yuktena maricaiḥ jīrakaiḥ yutām
kṛtvā puttalikām sādhya nāma yuktām atho hṛdi
sa nāma homa saṃpāta ghṛtepācyatām punar
spṛśan nija kara agreṇa sahasram prajapet manum
abhyarcya tat ghṛta abhyaktam bhakṣayet tad dhiyā japan
nara nārī nṛpāḥ tasya vaśyāḥ syuḥ maraṇa avadhim
śakta yaṣṭa gandham saṃpiṣya kanyayā śiśire jale

original: tena vai tilakaṃ bhāle dhārayanvaśayejjagat // NarP_1,90.115 //
analyzed: tena vai tilakam bhāle dhārayan vaśayet jagat
śāli tandulam ādāya prastham bhāṇḍe nave bhipet
raktāyāḥ goḥ payaḥ tathā
dvuguṇam tatra nikṣipya śrapayet saṃskṛte nale

original: ghṛtena siktaṃ sikthaṃ tu kṛtvā tatsasitaṃ kare // NarP_1,90.117 //
analyzed: ghṛtena siktam siktham tu kṛtvā tat sa sitam kare
vidhāya vidyām aṣṭa ūrddhū śatam jasvā hunet tatas
evam homaḥ mahā lakṣmīm āvahet pratipad kṛtaḥ
śukravāreṣu api tathā varṣāt nṛpa samaḥ bhavet

original: pañcamyāṃ tu viśeṣeṇa prāgvaddhomaṃ samācaret // NarP_1,90.119 //
analyzed: pañcamyām tu viśeṣeṇa prāgvat homam samācaret
tasyām tithau trimadhu aktaiḥ mallikā ādyaiḥ sitaiḥ hunet

original: annājyābhyāṃ ca niyataṃ hutvānnāḍhyo bhavennaraḥ // NarP_1,90.120 //
analyzed: anna ājyābhyām ca niyatam hutvā anna āḍhyaḥ bhavet naraḥ

original: yadyaddhi vāñchitaṃ vastu tattatsarvaṃ tu sarvadā /
analyzed: yat yat hi vāñchitam vastu tat tat sarvam tu sarvadā
ghṛta homāt avāpnoti tathā eva tila tandulaiḥ
aruṇaiḥ paṅkajaiḥ hemam kurvan trimadhura āplutaiḥ
maṇḍalāt labhate lakṣmīm mahatīm ślādhya vigrahām

original: juhuyānnityaśo bhaktyā sahasraṃ vikacaiḥ śubhaiḥ // NarP_1,90.123 //
analyzed: juhuyāt nityaśas bhaktyā sahasram vikacaiḥ śubhaiḥ

original: sa tu kīrtiṃ dhanaṃ putrānprāpnuyānnātra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: sa tu kīrtim dhanam putrān prāpnuyāt na atra saṃśayaḥ
caṃpakaiḥ kṣaudra saṃsiktaiḥ sahasra havanāt dhruvam
labhate svarṇa niṣkāṇām śatam māsena nārada
pāṭalaiḥ ghṛta saṃsiktaiḥ tri sahasram hutaiḥ tathā
darśa ādi māsāt labhate citrāṇi vasanāni ca
vastūni labhate hṛdyaiḥ anyaiḥ bhoga upayogibhiḥ

original: śālibhiḥ kṣīrasiktābhiḥ saptamīṣu śataṃ hutam // NarP_1,90.127 //
analyzed: śālibhiḥ kṣīra siktābhiḥ saptamīṣu śatam hutam
tena śāli samṛddhiḥ syāt māsaiḥ ṣaḍrabhiḥ asaṃśayam
tilaiḥ hutaiḥ tu divasaiḥ varṣāt ārogyam āpnuyāt
sva janma ṛkṣa triṣu tathā dūrvābhiḥ juhuyāt naraḥ

original: nirātaṅko mahābhogaḥ śataṃ varṣāṇi jīvati // NarP_1,90.129 //
analyzed: nirātaṅkaḥ mahā bhogaḥ śatam varṣāṇi jīvati
guḍūcī tila dūrvābhiḥ triṣu janmasu vā hunet
tena āyuḥ śrī yaśaḥ bhoga puṇya nidhi ādimān bhavet
ghṛta pāyasa dugdhaiḥ tu hutaiḥ teṣu triṣu kramāt
āyuḥ ārogya vibhavaiḥ nṛpa amātyaḥ bhavet tathā
saptamyām kadalī homāt saubhāgyam labhate nu aham
dūrvā trikaiḥ tu prādeśa mānaiḥ tri svādu saṃyutaiḥ
juhuyāt dinaśas ghore sannipāta jvare tathā

original: taddineṣu japedvidyāṃ nityaśaḥ salilaṃ spṛśan // NarP_1,90.133 //
analyzed: tad dineṣu japet vidyām nityaśas salilam spṛśan
sahasra vāram tad toyaiḥ snānam pānam samācaret
pāka ādyam api kuryāt roga vimuktaye
sādhya ṛkṣa vṛkṣa saṃcūrṇam tryūṣaṇam sarṣapam tilam

original: piṣṭaṃ ca sādhyapādottharajasā ca samanvitam // NarP_1,90.135 //
analyzed: piṣṭam ca sādhya pāda uttha rajasā ca samanvitam
kṛtvā puttalikām samyak hṛdaye nāma saṃyutām
prāgvat śitvā āyasaiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ śastraiḥ puttalikām hanet

original: evaṃ dinaiḥ saptabhistu sādhyo vaśyo bhaveddṛḍham /
analyzed: evam dinaiḥ saptabhiḥ tu sādhyaḥ vaśyaḥ bhavet dṛḍham

original: tathāvidhāṃ puttalikāṃ kuṇḍamadhye nikhanya ca // NarP_1,90.137 //
analyzed: tathāvidhām puttalikām kuṇḍa madhye nikhanya ca
upari agnim nidhāya atha vidyayā dinaśas hunet
tri sahasram tri yamāyām sarṣapaiḥ tad rasa āplutaiḥ
śata yojana dūrāt api ānayet vanitām balāt
vaśayet vanitām hā eṃmāt kauśikaiḥ madhu miśritaiḥ
nālikera phala upe taiḥ guḍaiḥ lakṣmīm avāpnuyāt
tathā ājya siktaiḥ kahlāraiḥ kṣīra aktaiḥ aruṇa utpalaiḥ
trimadhu aktaiḥ caṃparkaḥ ca prasūnaiḥ bakula udbhavaiḥ
madhūka jaiḥ prasūnaiḥ ca hutaiḥ kanyām avāpnuyāt
punnāga jaiḥ hutaiḥ vastrāṇi ājyaiḥ iṣṭam avāpnuyāt
māhiṣaiḥ mahiṣī rājaiḥ ajān gavyaiḥ ca gāḥ tathā

original: avāpnoti hutairājyaiḥ ratnai ratnaṃ ca sādhakaḥ /
analyzed: avāpnoti hutaiḥ ājyaiḥ ratnaiḥ ratnam ca sādhakaḥ

original: śālipiṣṭamayīṃ kṛtvā puttalīṃ sasitāṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,90.143 //
analyzed: śāli piṣṭa mayīm kṛtvā puttalīm sa sitām tatas
hṛd deśa nyasta nāma arṇām pacet taila ājyayoḥ niśi

original: tanmanāśca divārātrau vidyājaptāṃ tu bhakṣayet // NarP_1,90.144 //
analyzed: tanmanāḥ ca divārātrau vidyā japtām tu bhakṣayet
sapta rātra prayogeṇa naraḥ nārī vā
dāsa vat vaśam āyāti citta prāṇa ādi ca arpayet
hayāri puṣpaiḥ aruṇaiḥ sitaiḥ vā juhuyāt tathā
tri sapta rātrāt mahatīm avāpnoti śriyan naraḥ
chāga māṃsaiḥ trimadhu aktaiḥ hemāt svarṇam avāpnuyāt
kṣīra aktaiḥ sasya saṃpannām bhuvam āpnoti maṇḍalāt
padmākṣaiḥ havanāt lakṣmīm avāpnoti tribhiḥ dinaiḥ
bilvaiḥ daśa aṃśam juhuyāt mantra ādyaiḥ sādhane jape
evam saṃsiddha mantraḥ tu mantritaiḥ culuka udakaiḥ

original: phaṇidaṣṭamṛtānāṃ tu mukhe saṃtāḍya jīvayet // NarP_1,90.149 //
analyzed: phaṇi daṣṭa mṛtānām tu mukhe saṃtāḍya jīvayet
tad karṇayoḥ japan vidyām yaṣṭyā vā japa siddhayā
saṃtāḍya śīrṣam sahasā mṛtam utthāpayet iti
kṛtvā yonim kuṇḍa madhye tatra agnau vidhivat dhrunet
tila sarṣapa godhūma śāli dhānya yavaiḥ hunet
trimadhu aktaiḥ ekaśas vā sametaiḥ vā samṛddhaye
bakulaiḥ caṃpakaiḥ abjaiḥ kahlāraiḥ aruṇa utpalaiḥ
kairavaiḥ mallikā kunda madhūkaiḥ indirā āptaye
aśokaiḥ pāṭalaiḥ vilvaiḥ jātī vikaṅkataiḥ sitaiḥ
nava nīlotpalaiḥ aśva ripu jaiḥ karṇikāra jaiḥ

original: homāllakṣmīṃ ca saubhāgyaṃ nidhimāyuryaśo labhet // NarP_1,90.154 //
analyzed: homāt lakṣmīm ca saubhāgyam nidhim āyuḥ yaśaḥ labhet
dūrvām guḍūcīm aśvattham vaṭam āragvadham tathā
sita arka plakṣa jam hutvā cirāt mucyeta rogataḥ
ikṣu jaṃbū nālikera mocā guḍa sitā yutaiḥ

original: acalāṃ labhate lakṣmīṃ bhoktā ca bhavati dhruvam // NarP_1,90.156 //
analyzed: acalām labhate lakṣmīm bhoktā ca bhavati dhruvam
sarṣapa ājyaiḥ hute mṛtyuḥ kāṣṭha agnau vairi mṛtyave
catur aṅgula jaiḥ hemān catur aṅga bale ripoḥ
sapta ahāt roga duḥkha ārtiḥ bhavati eva na saṃśayaḥ

original: nityaṃ nityārcanaṃ kuryāttathā homaṃ ghṛtena vai // NarP_1,90.158 //
analyzed: nityam nitya arcanam kuryāt tathā homam ghṛtena vai
vidyā abhimantritam toyam pibet prātar tad āptaye
kāśmīra kālāgurubhiḥ mṛga sveda mayaiḥ api
pūjayet ca śivām etaiḥ gandhaiḥ sarva artha siddhaye
sarvābhiḥ api nityābhiḥ prātarmātṛkayā samam

original: trijaptābhiḥ pibettoyaṃ tathā vāksidvaye śivam // NarP_1,90.161 //
analyzed: tri japtābhiḥ pibet toyam tathā vāc siddhaye śivam
vidadhyāt sādhanam prāgvat varṇa lakṣam payovrataḥ
tri svādu siktaiḥ aruṇaiḥ ambujaiḥ havanam caret
japa tarpaṇa homa arcā seka siddha manuḥ naraḥ
kuryāt uktān prayogān ca na ced tat manu devatāḥ
prāṇān tasya grasaṃti eva kupitāḥ tad kṣaṇāt mune

original: anayā vidyayā loke yadasādhyaṃ na tatkvacit // NarP_1,90.164 //
analyzed: anayā vidyayā loke yat asādhyam na tat kvacid
araṇya vaṭa mūle ca parvata agra guhāsu ca
udyāna madhya kāntāre mātṛ pādapa mūlataḥ
siṃdhu tīre vane ca etāḥ yakṣiṇīḥ sādhayet naraḥ

original: kamalaiḥ kairavai raktaiḥ sitaiḥ saugandhikotpalaiḥ // NarP_1,90.166 //
analyzed: kamalaiḥ kairavaiḥ raktaiḥ sitaiḥ saugandhika utpalaiḥ
sugandhi śiphā ālikayā trimadhu aktaiḥ yathāvidhi

original: homātsaptasu vāreṣu tanmaṇḍalata eva vai // NarP_1,90.167 //
analyzed: homāt saptasu vāreṣu tad maṇḍalataḥ eva vai
vijayam samavāproti samare dvandva yuddhake

original: mallayuddhe śastrayuddhe vāde dyūtahnaye 'pi ca // NarP_1,90.168 //
analyzed: malla yuddhe śastra yuddhe vāde dyūta hnaye pi ca
vyavahāreṣu sarvatra jayam āpnoti niścitam
caturaṅgula jaiḥ puppaiḥ hemāt saṃstaṃbhayet arīn
tathā eva karṇikāra utthaiḥ punnāga utthaiḥ nameru jaiḥ
caṃpakaiḥ ketakaiḥ rājavṛkṣa jaiḥ mādhava udbhavaiḥ
prāgvat dāreṣu juhuyāt kramāt puṣpaiḥ tu saptabhiḥ

original: prokteṣu staṃbhanaṃ śatrorbhaṅgo vā bhavati dhruvam // NarP_1,90.171 //
analyzed: prokteṣu staṃbhanam śatroḥ bhaṅgaḥ vā bhavati dhruvam
śatroḥ nakṣatra vṛkṣa agnau tad samiddhiḥ tu homataḥ
sarṣapa ājya plutābhiḥ te praṇamanti eva pādayoḥ
mṛtyu kāṣṭha anale mṛtyu patra puṣpa phalaiḥ api
samidbhiḥ juhuyāt samyak vāre śārcana pūrvakam
arāteḥ catur aṅgam tu balam roga ardditam bhavet

original: tenāsya vijayo bhūyānnidhanenāpi vā punaḥ // NarP_1,90.174 //
analyzed: tena asya vijayaḥ bhūyāt nidhanena api vā punar
arka vāra irka jaiḥ idhmaiḥ samiddhe gnau tad udbhavaiḥ

original: patraiḥ puṣpaiḥ phalaiḥ kāṇḍairmūlaiścāpi hunetkramāt // NarP_1,90.175 //
analyzed: patraiḥ puṣpaiḥ phalaiḥ kāṇḍaiḥ mūlaiḥ ca api hunet kramāt
savarṇa aruṇa vatsāyāḥ ghṛta siktaiḥ tu maṇḍalāt

original: arātidiṅmukho bhūtvā kuṇḍe tryasre vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,90.176 //
analyzed: arāti diś mukhaḥ bhūtvā kuṇḍe tri asre vidhānataḥ
palāyate vā roga ārtaḥ praṇamet vā bhaya anvitaḥ
palāśa idhma anale tasya pañcāṅgaiḥ tad ghṛta āplutaiḥ
homena somavāre ca bhavet prāgvat na saṃśayaḥ
khādira idhma anale tasya pañcāṅgaiḥ tad ghṛta āplutaiḥ
vāre bhaumasya havanāt tat āpnoti su niścitam
apāmārgasya saumye hni pippalasya guroḥ dine
uduṃbarasya bhṛguje śamyāḥ mānde hni go ghṛtaiḥ
śubhra pīta sita śyāma varṇa ādyāḥ pūrvavat tathā
tad phalam samavāpnoti tad samidh dīpite nale
pratipad tithim ārabhya pañcamī antam krameṇa vai
śālī caṇaka mudgaiḥ ca yava māṣaiḥ ca homataḥ
māhiṣa ājya plutaiḥ tābhiḥ tithibhiḥ samavāpnuyāt
ṣaṣṭhī ādi saptamī antam tu ca ajā bhava ghṛtaiḥ tathā
prāk uktaiḥ nistuṣaiḥ hemāt prāk ukta phalam āpnuyāt
tat varddham pañcake tu etaiḥ samastaiḥ ca tila dvayaiḥ
sita annaiḥ pāyasaiḥ siktaiḥ āvikaiḥ tu ghṛtaiḥ tathā
havanāt tat avāpnoti yat ādau phalam īritam
evam nakṣatra vṛkṣa uttha vahnau taiḥ taiḥ madhu plutaiḥ
havanāt api tad prāptiḥ bhavati eva na saṃśayaḥ

original: vidyāṃ saṃsādhya pūrvaṃ tu paścāduktānaśeṣataḥ // NarP_1,90.186 //
analyzed: vidyām saṃsādhya pūrvam tu paścāt ukta anaśeṣataḥ
prayogān sādhayet dhīmān maṅgalāyāḥ prasādataḥ

original: saṃpūjya devatāṃ viprakumārīṃ kanyakāṃ tu vā // NarP_1,90.187 //
analyzed: saṃpūjya devatām vipra kumārīm kanyakām tu vā
sa śubha avayavām mugdhām snātām dhauta aṃbarām śubhām

original: tathāvidhaṃ kumāraṃ vā saṃsthāpyabhyarcya vidyayā // NarP_1,90.188 //
analyzed: tathāvidham kumāram vā saṃsthāpya abhyarcya vidyayā
spṛṣṭa śīrṣaḥ japet vidyām śata vāram tathā arcayet
prasūnaiḥ aruṇaiḥ śubhraiḥ saurabha āḍhyaiḥ atha api vā
dadyāt guggula dhūpam ca yāvat karma avasānakam

original: tato devyā samāviṣṭe tasminsaṃpūjya bhaktitaḥ // NarP_1,90.190 //
analyzed: tatas devyā samāviṣṭe tasmin saṃpūjya bhaktitaḥ
tatas tām upacāraiḥ taiḥ prāc uktaiḥ vidyayā vratī

original: prajapaṃstāṃ tataḥ pṛcchedabhīṣṭaṃ kathayecca sā // NarP_1,90.191 //
analyzed: prajapan tām tatas pṛcchet abhīṣṭam kathayet ca sā
bhūtam bhavat bhaviṣyam ca yat anyat manasi sthitam

original: janmāntarāṇyatītāni sarvaṃ sā pūjitā vadet // NarP_1,90.192 //
analyzed: janmāntarāṇi atītāni sarvam sā pūjitā vadet
tatas tām prāgvat abhyarcya sva ātmani udvāsya tām japet
sahasra vāram sthira dhīḥ pūrṇa ātmā vicaret sukhī
madhuratraya saṃsiktaiḥ aruṇaiḥ aṃbajaiḥ śriyam
prāpnoti maṇḍalam homāt sitaiḥ ca mahat yaśaḥ
raktaiḥ havanāt prokta kālataḥ

original: suvarṇaṃ samavāpnoti nidhiṃ vā vasudhāṃ tu vā // NarP_1,90.195 //
analyzed: suvarṇam samavāpnoti nidhim vā vasudhām tu vā
kṣīra aktaiḥ kairavaiḥ hemāt proktam kāmam avāpnuyāt

original: dhānyāni vividhānyāśu subhagaḥ sa bhavennaraḥ // NarP_1,90.196 //
analyzed: dhānyāni vividhāni āśu subhagaḥ sa bhavet naraḥ
ājya aktaiḥ utpalaiḥ hemāt vāñchitam samavāpnuyāt
tad aktaiḥ api kahlāraiḥ havanāt rāja vallabhaḥ
palāśa puṣpaiḥ tri svādu yuktaiḥ tad kāla homataḥ

original: caturvidhaṃ tu pāṇḍityaṃ bhavatyeva na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,90.198 //
analyzed: caturvidham tu pāṇḍityam bhavati eva na saṃśayaḥ
lājaiḥ trimadhura upetaiḥ tad kāla havanena vai
kanyakām labhate patnīm samasta guṇa saṃyutām
kṣaudrākṣam juhuyāt tadvat ayatnāt dhanada upamaḥ
tathā eva anna ājya homena sa tandula tilaiḥ api
prasūnaiḥ aruṇaiḥ tadvat tathā bandhūka saṃbhavaiḥ
sitaiḥ prasūna rvāc siddhim havanāt samavāpnuyāt
sita raktaiḥ tu militaiḥ āyuḥ ārogyam āpnuyāt
dūrvā trikaiḥ tri madhu aktaiḥ havanāt tu jayet ca tān

original: tathā guḍūcyā homena pāyasena tilena ca // NarP_1,90.203 //
analyzed: tathā guḍūcyāḥ homena pāyasena tilena ca
śrīkhaṇḍa paṅka karpūra militaiḥ śatapatrakaiḥ
havanāt śriyam āpnoti yāvat anvaya gā bhavet
tad paṅka mardditaiḥ hemāt kahlāraiḥ vikacaiḥ sumaiḥ
rāja kalpaḥ śriyāḥ bhūyāt jīvet varṣa śatam bhuvi
ikṣu kāṇḍasya śakalaiḥ havanāt vastram āpnuyāt
tathā eva karavīra utthaiḥ prasūnaiḥ aruṇaiḥ sitaiḥ
kṣaudra aktaiḥ pāṭalā puṣpaiḥ havanāt vaśayet vadhūḥ
tathā eva paṅkajaiḥ hemāt rūpājīvām vaśam nayet
sarūpa vatsa asita go kṣīra akta sita homataḥ
labhate nu upamām lakṣmīm api pāpiṣṭha cetanaḥ
sauvīra aktaiḥ tu kārpāsa bījaḥ tad kāla homataḥ

original: arddhendukuṇḍe niyataṃ vaśagā ripavo mune // NarP_1,90.210 //
analyzed: arddhendukuṇḍe niyatam vaśa gāḥ ripavaḥ mune
ariṣṭa patraiḥ tad bījaiḥ tad vahnau taiḥ tathā hutaiḥ
mṛtyu bījaiḥ nimba taila siktaiḥ hemān nihṝnti tān
roga ārtān turagān tadvat pañcagavyaiḥ hutaiḥ dhruvam
akṣa bījaiḥ tu taila aktaiḥ hemaḥ sarva vināśanaḥ
karañja bījaiḥ saṃsiktaiḥ hemāt vairī piśācavān
tathā eva akṣa taru udbhūta pañcāṅga havanāt api
niṃba taila anvitaiḥ akṣadruma bījaiḥ tu homataḥ

original: taddine syādapasmārī vairī bhavati niścitam // NarP_1,90.214 //
analyzed: tad dine syāt apasmārī vairī bhavati niścitam
arāteḥ janma nakṣatra vṛkṣa indhana gate nale
tad yoni piśitaiḥ taiḥ ca havanāt mṛtyu kṛt ripoḥ
padmākṣa bījaiḥ sarṣapa taila aktaiḥ havanāt tathā
jāyante vairiṇaḥ kuṣṭha rogāḥ deha vilopakāḥ
maricaiḥ sarṣapaiḥ hemāt taila aktaiḥ madhya rājake
dāha jvareṇa grastaḥ syāt arātiḥ tad dine dhruvam
evam nigraha homeṣu sva rakṣāyai tathā anvaham
snigdhaiḥ saṃprāpta sat vidyaiḥ japa homa ādi kārayet
mṛtyuñjayena vā tad tad prayoga sthābhiḥ eva vā
vidyābhiḥ anyathā asiddha mantram asya āśu nāśayet

original: lakṣatrayaṃ kṛte proktaṃ tretāyāṃ dviguṇaṃ tathā /
analyzed: lakṣa trayam kṛte proktam tretāyām dviguṇam tathā

original: dvāpare triguṇaṃ proktaṃ kalautattu caturguṇam // NarP_1,90.220 //
analyzed: dvāpare triguṇam proktam kalau tat tu caturguṇam
daśa aṃśam havanam kāryam tarpaṇam tad daśa aṃśataḥ
tad daśa aṃśam mārjanam syāt daśa aṃśam dvija bhojanam

original: evaṃ krameṇa sarvāsāṃ yā yā saṃkhyā japasya sā /
analyzed: evam krameṇa sarvāsām yā yā saṃkhyā japasya sā

original: kāryā siddhyai tu vidyāyāstataḥ kuryātprayogakān // NarP_1,90.222 //
analyzed: kāryā siddhyai tu vidyāyāḥ tatas kuryāt prayogakān

original: dviguṇo hi japaḥ kāryaḥ kāmeśvaryā munīśvara /
analyzed: dviguṇaḥ hi japaḥ kāryaḥ kāmeśvaryāḥ muni īśvara

original: siddhe mantre prayogāṃstu vidadhīta yathā tathā // NarP_1,90.223 //
analyzed: siddhe mantre prayogān tu vidadhīta yathā tathā
japaḥ lakṣam samākhyātaḥ homa ādiḥ tad haśa aṃśataḥ
kartavyaḥ bhaga mālāyāḥ vidyā siddhyai muni īśvara

original: kāryaḥ siddhyai tu vidyāyāḥ prayogānsādhayettataḥ // NarP_1,90.225 //
analyzed: kāryaḥ siddhyai tu vidyāyāḥ prayogān sādhayet tatas
tatas maunī payaḥ bhakṣaḥ prajapet nava lakṣakam
bheruḍā mantra muktam tu śeṣam kuryāt prayatnataḥ
anyat sarvam purāvat ca kāryyam sādhaka sattamaiḥ

original: havanādi daśāṃśena kāryaṃ proktakrameṇa hi // NarP_1,90.228 //
analyzed: havana ādi daśa aṃśena kāryam prokta krameṇa hi
atandritaḥ japet lakṣa mitam dūtī manum mune
tad daśa aṃśa krameṇa eva homa ādiḥ prokta mārgataḥ
tvaritām prajapet lakṣa pramitām tad daśa aṃśataḥ
kṛtvā homa ādikam sarvam vidyā siddhi yai muni īśvara
japaḥ lakṣam samākhyātaḥ homa ādiḥ tad daśa aṃśataḥ
vidyāyāḥ kula sundaryāḥ kartavyaḥ dvijasattama
homa ādiḥ tad daśa aṃśena proktaḥ prokta vidhānataḥ
tripañcāśat lakṣa muktaḥ niyamena muni īśvara
japaḥ nitya patākāyāḥ homa ādiḥ tad daśa aṃśataḥ
vijayāyāḥ jayaḥ proktaḥ lakṣa mānena nārada
anyat pūrvavat ākhyātam vidyā siddhyai tu sādhanam
danta lakṣa pramāṇena sarva maṅgālikām japet
tad daśa aṃśa krameṇa eva homa ādi samudīritam
aṣṭa lakṣam haviṣya āśī jvālāmālinikām japet
homa ādiḥ tad daśa aṃśena prokta dravyaiḥ samīritaḥ
citrāyāḥ bhūpa lakṣam tu japaḥ homa ādikaḥ tatas

original: proktena vidhinā kāryo vidyāsiddhyai munīśvara // NarP_1,90.237 //
analyzed: proktena vidhinā kāryaḥ vidyā siddhyai muni īśvara
etat saṃkṣepataḥ proktam nityā paṭalam ādita
jñātavyam sarvam eva atra yantra sādhana pūrvakam

original: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde nityāpaṭalakathanaṃ nāma navatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī bṛhat nāradīyapurāṇe pūrva bhāge bṛhat upākhyāne tṛtīya pāde nityāpaṭalakathanam nāma navatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
sanatkumāraḥ uvāca
atha vakṣye maheśasya mantram sarva artha sādhakam

original: yaṃ samārādhya manujo bhuktiṃ muktiṃ ca vindati // NarP_1,91.1 //
analyzed: yam samārādhya manujaḥ bhuktim muktim ca vindati
hṛdayam sabakaḥ sūkṣmaḥ lāntaḥ nanta anvitaḥ marut
pañca akṣaraḥ manuḥ proktaḥ tāra ādyaḥ yam ṣaṣ akṣaraḥ
vāmadevī munīḥ chandaḥ paṅktiḥ īśaḥ sya devatā
ṣaḍbhiḥ varṇaiḥ ṣaṣ aṅgāni kuryāt mantreṇa deśikaḥ
mantra varṇa ādikān nyasyet mantra mūrtiḥ yathākramam
tarjanī madhyayoḥ antyā anāmikā aṅguṣṭhake punar
tāḥ syuḥ tatpuruṣa aghora bhava vāma īśa saṃjñikāḥ
vaktra hṛd pāda guhyeṣu nija mūrddhani tāḥ punar
prāc yāmya vāruṇa udīcya madhya vaktreṣu pañcasu
mantrāṅgāni nyaset paścāt jāti yuktāni ṣaḍ kramāt
kurvīta golaka nyāsam rakṣāyai tad anantaram

original: hṛdi vaktreṃ'sayorūrvoḥ kaṇṭhe nābhau dvipārśvayoḥ // NarP_1,91.7 //
analyzed: hṛdi vaktra iṃsayoḥ ūrvoḥ kaṇṭhe nābhau dvi pārśvayoḥ

original: pṛṣṭhe hṛdi tathā mūrdhni vadane netrayornasoḥ /
analyzed: pṛṣṭhe hṛdi tathā mūrdhni vadane netrayoḥ nasoḥ
dos pat saṃdhiṣu sāgreṣu vinyaset tat anantaram
śiraḥ vadana hṛd kukṣi soru pāda dvaye punar
hṛdi vaktra aṃbuje ṭaṅka mṛgāḥ bhaya vareṣu atha
vaktra aṃsa hṛd sa pāda ūru jaṭhareṣu kramāt nyaset
mūlamantrasya
mūrdhni bhāla udara aṃseṣu hṛdaye tāḥ punar nyaset

original: paścādanena mantreṇa kurvīta vyāpakaṃ sudhīḥ // NarP_1,91.11 //
analyzed: paścāt anena mantreṇa kurvīta vyāpakam sudhīḥ
namaḥ astu ananta rūpāya jyotiḥ liṅga amṛta ātmane
catur mūrti vapuḥ chāyā ābhāsita aṅgāya śaṃbhave
evam nyasta śarīraḥ sau cintayet pārvatīpatim
dhyāyet nityam maheśānam raupya parvata sannibham
cāru candra avataṃsam ca ratna ākalpa ujjvala aṅgakam
paraśvadha vara abhīti mṛga hastam śubha ānanam
padma āsīnam samantāt tu stutam sumanasām gaṇaiḥ

original: vyāghrakṛtiṃ vasānaṃ ca viśvādyaṃ viśvarūpakam // NarP_1,91.15 //
analyzed: vyāghra kṛtim vasānam ca viśva ādyam viśva rūpakam
trinetram pañcavaktram ca sarva bhīti haram śivam
tattva lakṣam japet mantram dīkṣitaḥ śaiva vartmanā
tāvat saṃkhya sahasrāṇi juhuyāt pāyasaiḥ śubhaiḥ
tatas siddhaḥ bhavet mantraḥ sādhaka abhīṣṭa siddhi daḥ
devam saṃpūjayet pīṭhe vāma ādi nava śaktike

original: vāmā jyeṣṭhā tathā raudrī kālī kalapadādikā // NarP_1,91.18 //

analyzed: vikāriṇī āhvayā proktā balā ādyā vikariṇī atha
balapramathanī paścāt sarvabhūtadamanī atha
manonmanī iti saṃproktāḥ śaiva pīṭhasya śaktayaḥ
namaḥ bhagavate paścāt sakala ādi vadet tatas
guṇa ātma śakti bhaktāya tatas nantāya tat param
yogapīṭha ātmane bhūyas namaḥ tāra ādikaḥ manuḥ
amunā manunā dadyāt āsanam girijāpateḥ

original: mūrtiṃ mūlena saṃkalpya tatrāvāhya yajecchivam // NarP_1,91.22 //
analyzed: mūrtim mūlena saṃkalpya tatra āvāhya yajet śivam
karṇikāyām yajet mūrtiḥ īśam īśāna diggajam
śuddha sphaṭika saṃkāśam dikṣu tatpuruṣa ādikā
pīta añjana śveta raktāḥ pradhāna sadṛśa āyudhāḥ
caturvaktra samāyuktāḥ yathāvat tāḥ prapūjayet
koṇeṣu arcet nivṛttya ādyāḥ tejaḥ rūpāḥ kalāḥ kramāt
aṅgāni kesara sthāni vighneśān pannagān yajet
anantam sukha nāmānam śiva uttamam anantaram
ekanetram ekarudram trimūrtim tad anantaram
paścāt śīkaṇṭha nāmānam śikhaṇḍinam iti kramāt
rakta pīta sita ārakta kṛṣṇa rakta añjana asitān
kirīṭa arpita bāla indūn padma sthān bhūṣaṇa anvitān
tri netrān śūla vajra astra cāpa hastān manoramān
uttara ādi yajet paścāt rudram caṇḍeśvaram punar

original: tato nandimahākālau gaṇeśaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ punaḥ // NarP_1,91.29 //
analyzed: tatas nandi mahākālau gaṇeśam vṛṣabham punar
atha bhṛṅgim riṭim skandam etān padmāsana sthitān
svarṇa toya aruṇa śyāma mukta indu sita pāṭalān
indra ādayaḥ tatas pūjyāḥ vajra ādi āyudha saṃyutāḥ

original: itthaṃ saṃpūjayeddevaṃ sahasraṃ nityaśo japet // NarP_1,91.31 //
analyzed: ittham saṃpūjayet devam sahasram nityaśas japet
sarva pāpa vinirmuktaḥ prāpnuyāt vāñchitam śriyam

original: dvisahasraṃ japan rogānmucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,91.32 //
analyzed: dvi sahasram japan rogāt mucyate na atra saṃśayaḥ
tri sat mantram japan mantram dīrgham āyuḥ avāpnuyāt
sahasravṛddhayā prajapan sarva kāmān avāpnuyāt
ājya anvitaiḥ tilaiḥ śuddhaiḥ juhuyāt lakṣam ādarāt
utpāta janitān kleśān nāśayet na atra saṃśayaḥ
śata lakṣam japan sākṣāt śivaḥ bhavati mānavaḥ
ṣaṣ akṣaraḥ śakti ruddhaḥ ṣṭa akṣaraḥ manuḥ
ṛṣiḥ chandaḥ purā proktaḥ devatā syāt umāpatiḥ
aṅgāni pūrvam uktāni saumyam īśam vicintayet
bandhūka ābham tri netram ca śaśi khaṇḍa dharam vibhum

original: smerāsyaṃ svakaraiḥ śūlaṃ kaṃpālaṃ varadābhaye // NarP_1,91.37 //
analyzed: smera āsyam sva karaiḥ śūlam kaṃpālam varadā abhaye
bhujena āśliṣṭa deham tam cintayet manasā hṛdi
manu lakṣam japet mantram tad sahasram yathāvidhi
juhuyāt mānmadhu sa siktaiḥ āragvadha samidh varaiḥ
prāk prokte pūjayet pīṭhe gandha puṣpaiḥ umāpatim
aṅga āvṛtaiḥ bahis pūjyāḥ hṛllekhā ādyāḥ yathā purā
madhya prāc dakṣiṇa udīcya paścimeṣu vidhānataḥ
yajet pūrva ādi patreṣu vṛṣabha ādyān anukramāt
śūla ṭaṅka akṣa valaya kamaṇḍalu lasat karam
rakta ākāram trinayanam caṇḍeśam atha pūjayet
cakra śaṅkha abhaya abhīṣṭa karām marakata prabhām
durgām prapūjayet saumyām trinetrām cāru bhūṣaṇām
kalpa śākhā antare ghaṇṭām dadhānam dvādaśa īkṣaṇam
bāla arka ābham śiśum kāntam ṣaṇmukham pūjayet tatas
nanditam ca yajet saumyām ratna bhūṣaṇa maṇḍitam
paraśvadha vara abhīti ṭaṅkinam śyāma vigraham
pāśa aṅkuśa vara abhīṣṭa dhāriṇam kuṅkuma prabham
vighnanāyakam abhyarcet candra arddha kṛta śekharam
śyāmam rakta utpala karam vāma aṅka nyasta tad karam
dvi netram rakta vastra āḍhyam senāpatim atha arcayet
ṣṭa mātaraḥ pūjyāḥ brāhma ādyāḥ prokta lakṣaṇāḥ
indra ādikān lokapālān sva sva dikṣu samarcayet
vajra ādīni tad astrāṇi tad bahis kramatas urcayet

original: evaṃ yo bhajate mantrī devaṃ śaṃbhumumāpatim // NarP_1,91.49 //
analyzed: evam yaḥ bhajate mantrī devam śaṃbhum umāpatim
sa bhavet sarva lokānām saubhāgya śreyasām padam
prāsāda ākhyaḥ manuḥ proktaḥ bhajatām sarva siddhi daḥ
ṣaṣ dīrgha yukta bījena ṣaḍaṅga vidhiḥ īritaḥ
ṣaṣ arṇa vat tu muni ādyāḥ proktāḥ ca asya api nārada
īśāna ādyāḥ nyaset mūrtīḥ aṅguṣṭha ādiṣu deśikaḥ
īśāna ākhyam tatpuruṣam aghoram tad anantaram
vāmadeva āhvayam sadyojāta bījam kramāt viduḥ
ukāra ādyaiḥ ca yat
tad tad aṅgulibhiḥ bhūyas tad tad ikān nyaset
śiraḥ vadana hṛd guhya pāda deśe yathākramāt
urddha prāc dakṣiṇa udīcya paścimeṣu mukheṣu ca
tatas pravinyaset vidvān aṣṭatriṃśat kalāḥ stanau
īśāna ādyāḥ ṛcaḥ samyak aṅgulīṣu yathākramāt
aṅguṣṭha ādi kaniṣṭhā antam nyaset deśika sattamaḥ
mūrddha āsya hṛdaya aṃbhoja guhya pāde tu tāḥ punar
vaktre mūrdha ādiṣu nyasya bhūyas ṅgāni prakalpayet
tāra pañcakam uccārya sarvajñāya hṛdi īritam

original: amṛte tejo mālini tṛptāyeti padaṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: amṛte tejaḥ mālini tṛptāya iti padam punar

original: tadante brahmaśiḥse śirogaṃ jvalitaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,91.59 //
analyzed: tad ante śiraḥ gam jvalitam tatas
śikhim śikhāya paratas na ādi bodhāya tat śikhā

original: saiṃ saiṃ haumiti saṃbhāṣya parato toṃ guhyaśaktaye /
analyzed: saiṃ saiṃ haum iti saṃbhāṣya paratas toṃ guhya śaktaye

original: netramuktaṃ ślīpaśuṃ huṃ phaḍante netraṃ śaktaye // NarP_1,91.61 //
analyzed: netra muktam ślīpaśum hum phaṭ ante netram śaktaye
astra muktam ṣaṣ aṅgāni kuryāt evam samāhitaḥ
pūrva dakṣiṇa paścāt prāc saumya madhyeṣu pañcasu
vaktreṣu pañca vinyasyet īśānasya kalāḥ kramāt

original: īśānaḥ sarvavidyānāṃ śaśinī prathamā kalā // NarP_1,91.63 //
analyzed: īśānaḥ sarva vidyānām śaśinī prathamā kalā
īśvaraḥ sarva bhūtānām maṅgalā tad anantaram
brahmā adhipatiḥ śabda ante brahmaṇaḥ dhipatiḥ punar
brahma iṣṭa dā tṛtīyā asyāt śivaḥ me astu tad parā

original: marīciḥ kathitā vipra caturthī ca sadāśive // NarP_1,91.65 //
analyzed: marīciḥ kathitā vipra caturthī ca sadāśive
aṃśumālinī atha parā praṇava ādyāḥ namaḥ nvitāḥ
pūrva paścima yāmya udak vaktreṣu tad anantaram
catasraḥ vinyaset mantrī puruṣasya kalāḥ kramāt
ādyā tatpurupāya iti vidmahe śāntiḥ īritā
mahādevāya śabda ante dhīmahi syāt tatas param

original: vidyā dvitīyā kathitā tanno rudraḥ padaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,91.68 //
analyzed: vidyā dvitīyā kathitā tat naḥ rudraḥ padam tatas
pratiṣṭhā kathitā paścāt tṛtīyā syāt pracodayāt
nivṛttiḥ tad parā sarvā praṇava ādyā namaḥ nvitā
hṛdi ca aṃsa dvaye nābhi kukṣau pṛṣṭhe vakṣasi

original: athorasi kalā nyasyedaṣṭau mantrī yathāvidhi // NarP_1,91.70 //
analyzed: atha urasi kalāḥ nyasyet aṣṭau mantrī yathāvidhi
aghorebhyaḥ tathā pūrvam īritā prathamā kalā
atha ghorebhyaḥ iti ante moha āsyāt tad anantaram
aghora ante kṣamā paścāt tṛtīyā parikīrtitā
ghoratarebhyaḥ nidrā syāt sarvebhyaḥ sarva tatparā
vyādhiḥ tu pañcamī proktā śarvebhyaḥ tad anantaram

original: mṛtyurnigaditā ṣaṣṭhī namaste astu tatparam // NarP_1,91.73 //
analyzed: mṛtyuḥ nigaditā ṣaṣṭhī namaḥ te astu tat param
kṣudhā syāt saptamī rudra rūpebhyaḥ kathitā tṛṣā
aṣṭamī kathitā etāḥ adhruva ādyāḥ namasā anvitāḥ
guhya yugma ūru yugmeṣu jānu jaṅghā sphijoḥ punar
kaṭyām pārśva dvaye vāma kalāḥ nyasyet trayodaśa
prathamā vāmadevāya namaḥ nte syāt rujā kalā

original: syājjyeṣṭhāya namo rakṣā dvitīyā parikīrtitā // NarP_1,91.76 //
analyzed: syāt jyeṣṭhāya namaḥ rakṣā dvitīyā parikīrtitā

original: namaḥ saṃyamanī ṣaṣṭhī kathitā tadanantaram // NarP_1,91.77 //
analyzed: namaḥ saṃyamanī ṣaṣṭhī kathitā tad anantaram

original: namo vṛddhistvaṣṭamī syādbalānte ca sthirā kalā // NarP_1,91.78 //
analyzed: namaḥ vṛddhiḥ tu aṣṭamī syāt bala ante ca sthirā kalā
paścāt pramathanāya ante namaḥ rātriḥ udīritā

original: manonmanyai namaḥ paścājjvarā proktā trayodaśī // NarP_1,91.80 //
analyzed: manonmanyai namaḥ paścāt jvarā proktā trayodaśī
praṇava ādyāḥ caturthī antāḥ namaḥ ntāḥ tu prakīrtitāḥ
pāda dos tana nāsāsu mūrdhni bāhu yuge nyaset

original: sadyojātaṃ prapadyāmi siddhiḥ syātprathamā kalā // NarP_1,91.82 //
analyzed: sadyojātam prapadyāmi siddhiḥ syāt prathamā kalā

original: sadyojātāya vai bhūyo namaḥ syād vṛddhirīritā /
analyzed: sadyojātāya vai bhūyas namaḥ syāt vṛddhiḥ īritā
bhavet yutiḥ tṛtīyā syāt abhave tat anandaram
