original: medhā syātpañcamī proktā kalābhūyo bhavasva mām // NarP_1,91.84 //
analyzed: medhā syāt pañcamī proktā kalā bhūyas bhavasva mām

original: prājñā samīritā ṣaṣṭhī bhavānte syātprabhā kalā /
analyzed: prājñā samīritā ṣaṣṭhī bhava ante syāt prabhā kalā

original: udbhavāya namaḥ paścātsudhā syādaṣṭamī kalā // NarP_1,91.85 //
analyzed: udbhavāya namaḥ paścāt sudhā syāt aṣṭamī kalā
praṇava ādyāḥ caturthī antā kalāḥ sarvāḥ namaḥ nvitāḥ
aṣṭātriṃśat kalāḥ proktāḥ pañca brahma pada ādikāḥ
iti vinyasta dehaḥ sau bhavet gaṅgādharaḥ svayam

original: tataḥ samāhito bhūtvā dhyāyedevaṃ sadāśivam // NarP_1,91.87 //
analyzed: tatas samāhitaḥ bhūtvā dhyāyet evam sadāśivam
sita pīta asita śveta japa ābhaiḥ pañcabhiḥ mukhaiḥ
akṣaiḥ yutam glau mukuṭam koṭi pūrṇa indu saṃprabham
śūlam ṭaṅkam kṛpāṇam ca vajra agni ahi patīn karaiḥ
dadhānam bhūṣaṇa uddīptam ghaṇṭā pāśa vara abhayān
evam dhyātvā japet mantram pañca lakṣam madhu plutaiḥ
prasūnaiḥ karavīra utthaiḥ juhuyāt tad hṛśa aṃśataḥ
pūrva udite yajet pīṭhe martim mūlena kalpayet
āvāhya pūjayet tasyām mūrtau āvaraṇaiḥ saha
śaktim ḍamaruka abhīti varān saṃdadhatam karaiḥ

original: īśānaṃ trīkṣaṇaṃ śubhramaiśānyāṃ diśi pūjayet // NarP_1,91.92 //
analyzed: īśānam trīkṣaṇam śubhram aiśānyām diśi pūjayet
paraśveṇa vara abhītīḥ dadhānam vidyut ujjvalam
caturmukham tatpuruṣam trinetram pūrva antāḥ urcayet
akṣa srajam vedapāśau tatas

original: khaṭvāṅgaṃ niśitaṃ śūlaṃ kapālaṃ bibhrataṃ karaiḥ // NarP_1,91.94 //
analyzed: khaṭvāṅgam niśitam śūlam kapālam bibhratam karaiḥ
añjana ābham catur vaktram bhīma dantam bhaya āvaham
aghoram trīkṣaṇam yāmye pūjayet mantra vittamaḥ
kuṅkuma ābha caturvaktram vāmadevam trilocanam
hariṇa akṣa guṇa abhīti vara hastam caturmukham
saumyam sadyojātam trilocanam
vara abhaya akṣa valaya kuṭhārān dadhatam karaiḥ
vilāsinam smera vaktram saumye samyak samarcayet
koṇeṣu arcet nivṛttya ādyāḥ tejaḥ rūpāḥ kalāḥ kramāt
vighneśvarān ananta ādyān patreṣu paritas yajet
umā ādikāḥ tatas bāhye śakra ādyān āyudhaiḥ saha

original: iti saṃpūjya deveśaṃ bhaktyā paramayā yutaḥ // NarP_1,91.100 //
analyzed: iti saṃpūjya deveśam bhaktyā paramayā yutaḥ
praṇīyet nṛtya gīta ādyaiḥ stotra mairtrīm manoharaiḥ
tāraḥ māyā viyat bindu manu svara samanvitaḥ
pañca akṣara samāyuktaḥ vasu varṇaḥ manuḥ mataḥ
pañcākṣara ukta vat kuryāt aṅganyāsa ādikam budhaḥ
siṃdūra ābham lasat ratna mukuṭam candra maulinam
divya bhūṣā aṅgarāgam ca nāga yajña upavītinam
vāma ūru stha priya uroja nyasta hastam ca bibhratam
veda ṭaṅka iṣma bhayam dhyāyet sarveśvaram śivam
aṣṭa lakṣam japet mantram tad sahasram ghṛta anvitaiḥ
pāyasaiḥ juhuyāt pīṭhe mūrtim saṃkalpya mūlataḥ
aṅgaiḥ āvaraṇam pūrvam ananta ādyaiḥ anantaram
umā ādibhiḥ samuddiṣṭam tṛtīyam loka nāyakaiḥ
caturtham pañcamam teṣām āyudhaiḥ parikīrtitam
evam pratidinam devam pūjayet sādhaka uttamaḥ
putra pautra ādi gām lakṣmīm saṃprāpya hi atra modate
tāraḥ sthirā sa karṇa induḥ bha ghṛguḥ sarga samanvitaḥ
akṣara ātmā nigaditaḥ mantraḥ mṛtyuñjaya ātmakaḥ

original: ṛṣaiḥ kaholo devyādigāyatrī chanda īritam // NarP_1,91.109 //
analyzed: ṛṣaiḥ kaholaḥ devī ādi gāyatrī chandaḥ īritam
mṛtyuñjayaḥ mahādevaḥ devatā asya samīritaḥ
bhṛguṇā dīrgha yuktena ṣaṣ aṅgāni samācaret
mudrā pāśaiṇa akṣa sūtra lasat pāṇim śaśi prabham
bhāla indu vigalan pīyūṣa pluta aṅgam alaṅkṛtam
hāra ādyaiḥ nija kāntyā tu dhyāyet viśva vimohanam
guṇa lakṣam japet mantram tad daśa aṃśam hunet sudhīḥ
amṛtā śakalaiḥ śuddha dugdha ājya samabhiplutaiḥ
śaive saṃpūjayet pīṭhe mūrtim saṃkalpa mūlataḥ
aṅga āvaraṇam ārādhya paścāt loka īśvarān yajet
tad astrāṇi tatas bāhye pūjayet sādhaka uttamaḥ
japa pūjā ādibhiḥ siddhe mantre smin muni sattama
kuryāt prayogān kalya uktān abhīṣṭa phala siddhaye
dugdha siktaiḥ sudhā khaṇḍaiḥ hutvā pratyaham ādarāt
sahasra māsa paryantam labhet āyuḥ dhanam sutān

original: sudhāvaṭatitānpūrvā payaḥ sarpiḥ payo haviḥ // NarP_1,91.117 //
analyzed: payaḥ sarpiḥ payaḥ haviḥ
sapta dravyāṇi vāreṣu kramāt daśaśatam hunet
sapta adhikān dvijān nityam bhojayet madhura anvitam
ṛtvigbhyaḥ dakṣiṇām dadyāt aruṇām gām payasvinīm
gurum saṃprīṇayet paścāt hana ādyaiḥ devatā dhiyā
anena vidhinā sādhyaḥ kṛtyā droha jvaṃra ādibhiḥ
vimuktaḥ su ciram jīvet śaradām śatam añjasā
abhicāre jvare staṃbha ghora unmāde śiraḥ gade

original: asādhyaroge kṣveḍārtauṃ mohe dāhe mahābhaye // NarP_1,91.121 //
analyzed: asādhya roge kṣveḍa ārtaum mohe dāhe mahā bhaye
homaḥ yam śānti daḥ proktaḥ sarva abhaya pradāyakaḥ
dravyaiḥ etaiḥ prajuhuyāt tri janmasu yathāvidhi
bhojayet madhuraiḥ bhojyaiḥ brāhmaṇān vedapāragān
dīrgham āyuḥ avāpnoti vāñchitām vindati śriyam
ekādaśa āhutīḥ nityam dūrvābhiḥ juhuyāt budhaḥ
apamṛtyu jit eva syāt āyuḥ ārogya varddhanam
tri janmasu sudhā vallī kāśmīrī bakula udbhavaiḥ
samidh varaiḥ kṛtaḥ homaḥ sarva mṛtyu gada apahaḥ
siddhārthaiḥ vihitaḥ homaḥ mahājvara vināśanaḥ
apāmārga samidh homaḥ sarva āmaya niṣūdanaḥ
dakṣiṇāmūrtaye pūrvam tubhyam padam anantaram
vaṭa mūla padasya ante pravadet ca nivāsine
dhyāna eka nirata aṅgāya paścāt brūyāt namaḥ padam
rudrāya śaṃbhave tāra śakti ruddhaḥ yam īritaḥ
ṣaṭtriṃśat akṣaraḥ mantraḥ sarva kāma phala pradaḥ
muniḥ śukaḥ samuddiṣṭaḥ chandaḥ nuṣṭubh prakīrtitam
devatā dakṣiṇāmūrtiḥ nāmnā śaṃbhuḥ udīritaḥ
tāra śakti yuktaiḥ pūrvam hrī mā ādi antaiḥ ca mantra jaiḥ
ṣaṣ ṣaṣṭha aṣṭeṣu vahni arṇaiḥ hṛdaya ādi aṅga kalpanam

original: mūrdhni bhāle dṛśoḥ śrotre gaṇḍayugme sanāsike // NarP_1,91.131 //
analyzed: mūrdhni bhāle dṛśoḥ śrotre gaṇḍa yugme sa nāsike
āsya dos saṃdhiṣu gale stana hṛd nābhi maṇḍale
kaṭyām guhye punar pāda saṃdhiṣu arṇān nyaset manoḥ
vyāpakam tāra śaktibhyām kuryāt dehe tatas param
himācala taṭe ramye siddhi kinnara sevite
vividha druma śākhābhiḥ sarvatas vārita ātape
su puṣpitaiḥ latā jālaiḥ āśliṣṭa kusuma drume
śilā vivara nirgacchat nirjhara anila śītale
gāyat deva aṅganā saṃghe nṛtyat barhi kadambake
kūjat kokila saṃghena mukharīkṛta diṅmukhe
paraspara vinirmukta mātsarya mṛga sevite
jala jaiḥ sthala jaiḥ puṣpaiḥ āmodibhiḥ alaṅkṛte
ādyaiḥ śuka ādyaiḥ munibhiḥ ajasra sukha sevite
purandara mukhaiḥ devaiḥ sa aṃganā ādyaiḥ vilokite
vaṭa vṛkṣam mahā ucchrāyam padmarāga phala ujjlam
gārutmata mayaiḥ patraiḥ nibiḍaiḥ upaśobhitam
nava ratna maya ākalpaiḥ laṃbamānaiḥ alaṅkṛtam
saṃsāra tāpa viccheda kuśala chāyam adbhutam
tasya mūle su saṃkḷpta ratna siṃhāsane śubhe
āsīnam asitā kalpam śarad candra nibha ānanam
nāsā agra ālokana param vīrāsana samāsthitam
kakṣa baddha bhujaṅgam ca su prasannam haram smaret
ayuta dvaya saṃyukta guṇa lakṣam japet manum
tad daśa aṃśam tilaiḥ śuddhaiḥ juhuyāt kṣīra saṃyutaiḥ
pañcākṣara udite pīṭhe tad vidhānena pūjayet
bhikṣā āhāraḥ japet māsam manum enam jita indriyaḥ

original: nityaṃ sahasramaṣṭārddhaṃ parāṃ vindati vākchriyam // NarP_1,91.145 //
analyzed: nityam sahasram aṣṭa arddham parām vindati vāc śriyam
tri vāram japtam etena payaḥ tu manunā pibet
dakṣiṇāmūrtiṃsaṃdhyānāt śāstra vyākhyāna kṛt bhavet
praṇavaḥ hṛdayam paścāt vadet bhagavatepadam
ṅeyutam dakṣiṇāmūrtim mahyaṃmedhām udīrayet
prayaccha ṭha dvaya antaḥ yam dvāviṃśati akṣaraḥ manuḥ
muniḥ caturmukhaḥ chandaḥ gāyatrī devatā uditā
tāra ruddhaiḥ svaraiḥ dīrghaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ aṅgāni kalpayet
padaiḥ mantra bhavaiḥ vā apidhyāna ādyam pūrvavat matam
lohita ugrya āsanaḥ sadyas bindumān prathamam tatas
dvitīyam vahni bīja sthā dīrghā śāntīndu bhūṣitā
tṛtīyā lāṅgalī īśa arṇa mantraḥ bīja traya anvitaḥ
kaparddine pada yugam śiromantraḥ udāhṛtaḥ
nīlakaṇṭhāya ṭha dvandvam śikhā mantraḥ yam īritaḥ
kālakūṭa padasya ante viṣa bhakṣaṇa ṅeyutam
hum phaṭ kavacam uddiṣṭam nīlakaṇṭhinaḥ iti atas
svāhā antam astram etāni pañcāgāni manoḥ viduḥ
mūrdhni kaṇṭhe hṛd aṃbhoje kramāt vīja trayam nyaset
bāla arka ayuta varcaskam jaṭā jūṭa indu śobhitam
nāga ābhūṣam japa vaṭīm śūlam brahma kapālakam
khaṭvāṅgam dadhatam dorbhiḥ trinetram cintayet haram
japet
haviṣā juhuyāt samyak saṃskṛte havyavāhane
śaivam pīṭhe yajet devam nīlakaṇṭham samāhitaḥ
mṛtyum jaya vidhānena viṣa dvaya vināśanam
cintāmaṇiḥ iti khyātam bījam sarva samṛddhi dam
kaśyapaḥ muniḥ ākhyātaḥ chandaḥ nuṣṭubh udāhṛtam

original: arddhanārīśvaraḥ prokto devatā jagatāṃ patiḥ // NarP_1,91.160 //
analyzed: arddhanārīśvaraḥ proktaḥ devatā jagatām patiḥ
repha ādi vyañjanaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ kuryāt aṅgāni ṣaḍ kramāt
trinetram nīla maṇibham śūlapāśam kapālakam
rakta utpalam ca hasta abjaiḥ dadhatam cāru bhūṣaṇam
bāla indu baddha mukuṭam arddhanārīśvaram smaret
eka lakṣam japet mantram tri śatam madhura āplutaiḥ
tilaiḥ hunet yajet pīṭhe śaiva iṅga āvaraṇaiḥ saha
vṛṣa ādyaiḥ mātṛbhiḥ paścāt lokapālaiḥ tad āyudhaiḥ
prāsāda ādyam japet mantram ayutam roga śāntaye
svāhā vṛttam idam bījam vigalat parama amṛtam
candra biṃba sthitam mūrdhni dhyātam kṣveḍa gada apaham
pratiloma svara āḍhyā ca bījam vahni gṛhe sthitam
bhūta ārtasya smṛtam mūrdhni bhūtam āśu vināśayet

original: pīḍitāṅge smṛtaṃ tattatpīḍāṃ śamayati dhruvam // NarP_1,91.167 //
analyzed: pīḍita aṅge smṛtam tat tat pīḍām śamayati dhruvam

original: praṇavo hṛdayaṃ paścān ṅeṃtaḥ paśupatiḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: praṇavaḥ hṛdayam paścāt ṅeṃtaḥ paśupatiḥ punar

original: tāro namo bhūtapadaṃ tato 'dhipataye dhruvam // NarP_1,91.168 //
analyzed: tāraḥ namaḥ bhūta padam tatas dhipataye dhruvam
namaḥ rudrāya yugalam khaḍga rāvaṇa śabdataḥ
vihara dvitayam paścāt narī nṛtya yugam pṛthak
śmaśāna bhasma ācita ante śaraṇyāya tatas param
ghaṇṭā kapāla mālā ādi dharāya iti padam punar
vyāghra carma padasya ante paridhānāya tat param
śaśāṅka kṛta śabda ante śekharāya tatas param
kṛṣṇa sarpa padāt paścāt vadet yajña upavītine
bala yugmam calā yugmam anivarta kapāline
hanu yugmam tatas bhūtān trāsayat vitayam punar

original: bhūyo maṇḍalamadhye syātkaṭayugmaṃ tataḥ param // NarP_1,91.173 //
analyzed: bhūyas maṇḍala madhye syāt kaṭa yugmam tatas param
rudrāṅkuśena śamaya praveśaya yugam tatas
āveśaya yugam paścāt caṇḍa asi padam īrayet

original: saurī vibhūtiruditā sātvatī ca tataḥ param // NarP_1,96.20 //
analyzed: saurī vibhūtiḥ uditā sātvatī ca tatas param
purāṇa saṃkhyā kathanam āśraye dvādaśaḥ hi ayam

original: ityevaṃ kathitaṃ vatsa śrīmadbhāgavataṃ tava // NarP_1,96.21 //
analyzed: iti evam kathitam vatsa śrīmat bhāgavatam tava
vaktuḥ śrotuḥ ca upadeṣṭuḥ anumodituḥ eva ca
sāhāyya kartuḥ gaditam bhakti bhukti vimukti dam
prauṣṭhapadyām pūrṇimāyām hema siṃha samanvitam
deyam bhāgavatāya idam
saṃpūjya vastra hema ādyaiḥ bhagavat bhaktim icchatā
yaḥ pi anukramaṇīm etām śrāvayet śṛṇuyāt tathā
sa purāṇa śravaṇa jam prāpnoti phalam uttamam

original: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde śrīmadbhāgavatānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṇṇavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī bṛhat nāradīyapurāṇe pūrva bhāge bṛhat upākhyāne caturtha pāde śrīmadbhāgavatānukramaṇīnirūpaṇam nāma ṣaṇṇavatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī brahmā uvāca
śṛṇu vipra pravakṣyāmi purāṇam nāradīyakam
pañcaviṃśati sāhasram bṛhatkalpa kathā āśrayam
sūta śaunaka saṃvādaḥ sṛṣṭi saṃkṣepa varṇanam
nānā dharma kathāḥ puṇyāḥ pravṛtte samudāhṛtāḥ
prāgbhāge prathame pāde sanakena mahātmanā
dvitīye mokṣadharma ākhye mokṣa upāya nirūpaṇam
vedāṅgānām ca kathanam śuka utpattiḥ ca vistarāt
sanandanena gaditā nāradāya mahātmane
mahā tantre samuddiṣṭam paśu pāśa vimokṣaṇam
mantrāṇām śodhanam dīkṣā mantra uddhāraḥ ca pūjanam
prayogāḥ kavacam nāma sahasram stotram eva ca
gaṇeśa sūrya viṣṇūnām śiva śaktyoḥ anukramāt
sanatkumāra muninā nāradāya tṛtīyake

original: purāṇalakṣaṇaṃ caiva pramāṇaṃ dānameva ca // NarP_1,97.7 //
analyzed: purāṇa lakṣaṇam ca eva pramāṇam dānam eva ca
pṛthak pṛthak samuddiṣṭam dāna kāla puraḥsaram
caitra ādi sarva māseṣu tithīnām ca pṛthak pṛthak
proktam pratipad ādīnām vratam sarva agha nāśanam
sanātanena muninā nāradāya caturthake
pūrva bhāgaḥ yam uditaḥ bṛhat ākhyāna saṃjñitaḥ

original: asyottare vibhāge tu praśna ekādaśīvrate // NarP_1,97.10 //
analyzed: asya uttare vibhāge tu praśne ekādaśīvrate
vasiṣṭhena atha saṃvādaḥ māndhātuḥ parikīrtitaḥ
rukmāṅgada kathā puṇyāmohinī utpatti karma ca
vasu śāpaḥ ca mohinyai paścāt uddharaṇa kriyā
gaṅgā kathā puṇyatamā gayā yātrā anukīrtanam
kāśyāḥ māhātmyam atulam puruṣottama varṇanam
yātrā vidhānam kṣetrasya bahu ākhyāna samanvitam
prayāgasya atha māhātmyam kurukṣetrasya tat param
hari dvārasya ca ākhyānam kāmoda ākhyānakam tathā
badarītīrtha māhātmyam kāmākṣāyāḥ tathā eva ca

original: prabhāsasya ca māhātmyaṃ puṣkarākhyānakaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,97.15 //
analyzed: prabhāsasya ca māhātmyam puṣkara ākhyānakam tatas
gautama ākhyānakam paścāt veda pāda stavaḥ tatas
gokarṇa kṣetra māhātmyam lakṣmaṇa ākhyānakam tathā
setu māhātmya kathanam narmadā tīrtha varṇanam
avantyāḥ ca eva māhātmyam madhurāyāḥ tatas param
bṛndāvanasya mahimā paśoḥ brahma antike gatiḥ

original: mohinīcaritaṃ paścādevaṃ paścādevaṃ vai nāradīyakam // NarP_1,97.18 //
analyzed: mohinīcaritam paścāt evam paścāt evam vai nāradīyakam
yaḥ śṛṇoti naraḥ bhaktyā āśrāvayet vā samāhitaḥ

original: sa yāti brahmaṇo dhāma nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // NarP_1,97.19 //
analyzed: sa yāti brahmaṇaḥ dhāma na atra kāryā vicāraṇā
yaḥ tu etat iṣu pūrṇāyām dhenūnām saptaka anvitam
pradadyāt dijarṃyāya saṃlabhet mokṣam eva ca
yaḥ ca anukramaṇīm etām nāradīyasya varṇayet
saḥ svarga gatim labhet

original: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde nāradīyapurāṇānukramaṇīkathanaṃ nāma saptanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī bṛhat nāradīyapurāṇe pūrva bhāge bṛhat upākhyāne caturtha pāde nāradīyapurāṇānukramaṇīkathanam nāma saptanavatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī brahmā uvāca
atha te saṃpravakṣyāmi mārkaṇḍeya abhidham mune

original: purāṇaṃ sumahatpuṇyaṃ paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ sadā // NarP_1,98.1 //
analyzed: purāṇam su mahat puṇyam paṭhatām śṛṇvatām sadā
yatra adhikṛtya śakunīn sarva dharma nirūpaṇam
mārkaṇḍeyapurāṇam tat nava sāhasram īritam
mārkaṇḍeya muneḥ praśnaḥ jaimineḥ prāk samīritaḥ
pakṣiṇām dharma saṃjñānam tatas janma nirūpaṇam
pūrva janma kathā ca eṣām vikriyā divaspateḥ
tīrtha yātrā balasya atha draupadeya kathānakam
hariścandra kathā puṇyā yuddham āḍībaka abhidham
pitāputra samākhyānam tatas
haihasasya atha caritam mahā ākhyāna samanvitam
sṛṣṭi saṃkīrtanam puṇyam navadhā pārikīrtitam
rudra ādi sṛṣṭiḥ api uktā dvīpa caryā anukīrtanam

original: manūnāṃ ca kathā nānākīrtitāḥ pāpahārikāḥ // NarP_1,98.8 //
analyzed: manūnām ca kathāḥ nānā kīrtitāḥ pāpa hārikāḥ
tāsu durgā kathā atyantam puṇya dā ca aṣṭameṃtare
tad paścāt praṇava utpattiḥ trayī tejaḥ samudbhavā
mārtaṇḍasya ca janma ākhyā tad māhātmya samanvitā
vaivasvata anvayaḥ ca api vatsaprīḥ caritam tatas

original: khanitrasya tataḥ proktā kathā puṇyā mahātmanaḥ /
analyzed: khanitrasya tatas proktā kathā puṇyā mahātmanaḥ
avikṣit caritam ca eva kimiccha vrata kīrttanam
nariṣyantasya caritam ikṣvāku caritam tatas
nalasya caritam paścāt rāmacandrasya sat kathā
kuśa vaṃśa samākhyānam soma vaṃśa anukīrttanam

original: pururavaḥ kathā puṇyā nahuṣasya kathādbhutā // NarP_1,98.13 //
analyzed: pururavaḥ kathā puṇyā nahuṣasya kathā adbhutā
yayāti caritam puṇyam yadu vaṃśa anukīrttanam
śrī kṛṣṇa bāla caritam māthuram caritam tatas
dvārakā caritam ca atha kathā sarva avatāra jā
tatas sāṃkhya samuddeśaḥ prapañca asattva kīrtanam
mārkaṇḍeyasya caritam purāṇa śravaṇe phalam

original: yaḥ śṛṇoti naro bhaktyā purāṇamidamādarāt // NarP_1,98.16 //
analyzed: yaḥ śṛṇoti naraḥ bhaktyā purāṇam idam ādarāt
mārkaṇḍeya abhidham vatsa sa labhet paramām gatim

original: yastu vyākurute caitacchaivaṃ sa labhate padam // NarP_1,98.17 //
analyzed: yaḥ tu vyākurute ca etat śaivam sa labhate padam
tat prayacchet likhitvā yaḥ sauvarṇa kari saṃyutam

original: kārtikyāṃ dvijavaryāya sa labhendbrahmaṇaḥ padam // NarP_1,98.18 //
analyzed: kārtikyām dvija varyāya sa labhet brahmaṇaḥ padam
śṛṇoti śrāvayet vā api yaḥ ca anukramaṇīm imām
mārkaṇḍeyapurāṇasya sa labhet vāñchitam phalam

original: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde mārkaṇḍeyapurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī bṛhat nāradīyapurāṇe pūrva bhāge bṛhat upākhyāne caturtha pāde mārkaṇḍeyapurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇam nāma aṣṭanavatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī brahmā uvāca
atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi tava āgneyapurāṇakam
īśāna kalpa vṛttāntam vasiṣṭhāya analaḥ bravīt
tat pañcadaśa sāhasram nānā caritam adbhutam

original: paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ caiva sarvapāpaharaṃ nṛṇām // NarP_1,99.2 //
analyzed: paṭhatām śṛṇvatām ca eva sarva pāpa haram nṛṇām
praśnaḥ pūrvam purāṇasya kathā sarva avatāra jā
sṛṣṭi prakaraṇam ca atha viṣṇu pūjā ādikam tatas
agni kāryam tatas paścāt mantra mudrā ādi lakṣaṇam
sarva dīkṣā vidhānam ca abhiṣeka nirūpaṇam
lakṣaṇam maṇḍala ādīnām kuśa apāmārjanam tatas
pavitra āropaṇa vidhiḥ devālaya vidhiḥ tatas
śālagrāma ādi pūjā ca mūrti lakṣma pṛthak pṛthak

original: nyāsādīnāṃ vidhānaṃ ca pratiṣṭhāpūrtakaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,99.6 //
analyzed: nyāsa ādīnām vidhānam ca pratiṣṭhāpūrtakam tatas
vināyaka ādi pūjā ca nānā dīkṣā vidhiḥ param
pratiṣṭhā sarva devānām brahmaṇḍasya nirūpaṇam

original: jyotiṣaṃ ca tataḥ proktaṃ śāstraṃ yuddhajayārṇavam /
analyzed: jyotiṣam ca tatas proktam śāstram yuddha jaya arṇavam

original: ṣaṭkarma ca tataḥ proktaṃ mantramantrauṣadhīgaṇaḥ // NarP_1,99.9 //
analyzed: ṣaṭkarma ca tatas proktam mantra mantra oṣadhī gaṇaḥ
kubjikā ādi sama ṛca tvam ṣoḍhā nyāsa vidhiḥ tathā
koṭi homa vidhānam ca manvantara nirūpaṇam
brahmacarya ādi dharmān ca śrāddha kalpa vidhiḥ tatas
graha yajñaḥ tatas proktaḥ vaidika smārta karma ca
prāyaścitta anukathanam tithīnām ca vrata ādikam
navavyūha arcanam proktam narakāṇām nirūpaṇam
vratānām ca api dānānām nirūpaṇam iha uditam
nāḍī cakra samuddeśaḥ saṃdhyā vidhiḥ anuttamaḥ
gāyatrī arthasya nirddeśaḥ liṅga stotram tatas param
rājya abhiṣeka mantra uktiḥ ddharma kṛtyam ca bhūbhujām
svapnādhyāyaḥ tatas proktaḥ śakuna ādi nirūpaṇam
ratna dīkṣā vidhiḥ tatas
rāma ukta nīti nirddeśaḥ ratnānām lakṣaṇam tatas
dhanuḥ vidyā tatas proktā vyavahāra pradarśanam
deva asura vimarda ākhyā hi āyurveda nirūpaṇam

original: gajādīnāṃ cikitsā ca teṣāṃ śāntistataḥ param // NarP_1,99.18 //
analyzed: gaja ādīnām cikitsā ca teṣām śāntiḥ tatas param
gonara ādi cikitsā ca nānā pūjāḥ tatas param
śāntayaḥ ca api vividhāḥ chandaḥ śāstram atas param
sāhityam ca tatas paścāt ekārṇa ādi samāhvayāḥ
siddha śabda anuśiṣṭiḥ ca kośaḥ sarga ādi vargakaḥ
pralayānām lakṣaṇam ca śārīraka nirūpaṇam

original: varṇanaṃ narakāṇāṃ ca yogāśtramataḥ param // NarP_1,99.21 //
analyzed: varṇanam narakāṇām ca yoga āśtram atas param
brahma jñānam tatas paścāt purāṇa śravaṇe phalam
etat āgneyakam vipra purāṇam parikīrtitam
tat likhitvā tu yaḥ dadyāt suvarṇa kalama anvitam

original: tiladhenu yutaṃ cāpi mārgaśīrṣyāṃ vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,99.23 //
analyzed: tiladhenu yutam ca api mārgaśīrṣyām vidhānataḥ
purāṇa artha vide saḥ tha svarga loke mahīyate
eṣā anukramaṇī proktā tava āgneyasya mukti dā

original: śṛṇvatāṃ paṭhatāṃ caiva nṛṇāṃ ceha paratra ca // NarP_1,99.25 //
analyzed: śṛṇvatām paṭhatām ca eva nṛṇām ca iha paratra ca

original: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde 'gnipurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī bṛhat nāradīyapurāṇe pūrva bhāge bṛhat upākhyāne caturtha pāde gnipurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇam nāma ekonaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī brahmā uvāca
atha te saṃpravakṣyāmi purāṇam sarva siddhi dam
bhaviṣyam bhavataḥ sarva loka abhīṣṭa pradāyakam
yatra aham sarva devānām ādikartā samudgataḥ

original: sṛṣṭyarthaṃ tatra saṃjāto manuḥ svāryabhuvaḥ purā // NarP_1,100.2 //
analyzed: sṛṣṭi artham tatra saṃjātaḥ manuḥ sva ārya bhuvaḥ purā

original: sa māṃ praṇamya papraccha dharmaṃ sarvāthasādhakam /
analyzed: sa mām praṇamya papraccha dharmam sarva atha sādhakam

original: ahaṃ tasmai tadā prītaḥ prāvocaṃ dharmasaṃhitām // NarP_1,100.3 //
analyzed: aham tasmai tadā prītaḥ prāvocam dharma saṃhitām

original: purāṇānāṃ yadā vyāso vyāsaṃ caktre mahāmatiḥ /
analyzed: purāṇānām yadā vyāsaḥ vyāsam caktre mahāmatiḥ

original: tadā tāṃ saṃhitāṃ sarvāṃ pañcadhā vyabhajanmuniḥ // NarP_1,100.4 //
analyzed: tadā tām saṃhitām sarvām pañcadhā vyabhajat muniḥ
adhora kalpa vṛttāntam nānā āścarya katha nvitam

original: tatrādimaṃ smṛtaṃ parvaṃ brāhmaṃ yatrāstyupakramaḥ // NarP_1,100.5 //
analyzed: tatra ādimam smṛtam parvam brāhmam yatra asti upakramaḥ
sūta śaunaka saṃvāde purāṇa praśna saṃkramaḥ
āditya carita prāyaḥ sarva ākhyāna samanvitaḥ
sṛṣṭi ādi lakṣaṇa upetaḥ śāstra sarva svarūpakaḥ

original: pustalekhakalekhānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ ca tataḥ param // NarP_1,100.7 //
analyzed: pusta lekhaka lekhānām lakṣaṇam ca tatas param

original: saṃskārāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ cātra kīrtitam /
analyzed: saṃskārāṇām ca sarveṣām lakṣaṇam ca atra kīrtitam

original: pakṣasyāditithīnāṃ ca kalpāḥ sapta ca kīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,100.8 //
analyzed: pakṣasya ādi tithīnām ca kalpāḥ sapta ca kīrtitāḥ
aṣṭamī ādyāḥ śeṣa kalpāḥ vaiṣṇave parvaṇi smṛtāḥ

original: śaive ca kāyato bhinnāḥ saure cāntyakathānvayaḥ // NarP_1,100.9 //
analyzed: śaive ca kāyataḥ bhinnāḥ saure ca antya kathā anvayaḥ
pratisarga āhvayam paścāt nānā ākhyāna samanvitam
purāṇasya upasaṃhāra sahitam parva pañcamam
eṣu pañcasu pūrvasmin brahmaṇaḥ mahima adhikāḥ

original: dharme kāme ca mokṣe tu viṣṇoścāpi śivasya ca // NarP_1,100.11 //
analyzed: dharme kāme ca mokṣe tu viṣṇoḥ ca api śivasya ca

original: dvitīyaṃ ca tṛtīye ca saure vargacatuṣṭaye /
analyzed: dvitīyam ca tṛtīye ca saure varga catuṣṭaye
pratisarga āhvayam tu antyam proktam sarva kathā anvitam
sabhaviṣyam vinirddiṣṭam parva vyāsena dhīmatā
caturddaśa sahasram tu purāṇam parikīrtitam
bhaviṣyam sarva devānām sāmyam yatra prakīrtitam

original: guṇānāṃ tāratamyena samaṃ brahmeti hi śrutiḥ // NarP_1,100.14 //
analyzed: guṇānām tāratamyena samam brahma iti hi śrutiḥ

original: taṃ likhitvā tu yo dadyātpauṣyāṃ vidvānvimatsaraḥ /
analyzed: tam likhitvā tu yaḥ dadyāt pauṣyām vidvān vimatsaraḥ
guḍadhenu yutam hema vastra mālya vibhūṣaṇaiḥ
vācakam pustakam ca api pūjayitvā vidhānataḥ
gandha ādyaiḥ bhojya bhakṣyaiḥ ca kṛtvā nīrājana ādikam

original: yo vai jitendriyo bhūtvā sopavāsaḥ samāhitaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ vai jita indriyaḥ bhūtvā sa upavāsaḥ samāhitaḥ
atha vā eka haviṣi āśī kīrtayet śṛṇuyāt api

original: sa muktaḥ pātakairghoraiḥ prayāti brahmaṇaḥ padam /
analyzed: sa muktaḥ pātakaiḥ ghoraiḥ prayāti brahmaṇaḥ padam
yaḥ pi anukramaṇīm etām bhaviṣyasya nirūpitām

original: paṭhedvā śṛṇuyāccaitāṃ bhuktiṃ muktiṃ ca vindati // NarP_1,100.19 //
analyzed: paṭhet vā śṛṇuyāt ca etām bhuktim muktim ca vindati

original: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde bhaviṣyapurāṇānukramaṇī nirūpaṇaṃ nāma śatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī bṛhat nāradīyapurāṇe pūrva bhāge bṛhat upākhyāne caturtha pāde bhaviṣyapurāṇānukramaṇī nirūpaṇam nāma śatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī brahmā uvāca

original: śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ daśamaṃ tava /
analyzed: śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyāmi purāṇam daśamam tava
brahmavaivartakam nāma veda mārga anudarśakam
sāvarṇiḥ yatra bhagavān sākṣāt devarṣaye sthitaḥ
nāradāya purāṇa artham prāha sarvam alaukikam
dharma artha kāma mokṣāṇām sāraḥ prītiḥ harau hare
tayoḥ abheda siddhi artham brahmavaivartam uttamam
rathantarasya kalpasya vṛttāntam yat mayā uditam
śatakoṭipurāṇe tat saṃkṣipya prāha veda vid
vyāsaḥ caturddhā saṃvyasya brahmavaivarta saṃjñite
aṣṭādaśa sahasram tat purāṇam parikīrtitam
brahma prakṛti vighneśa kṛṣṇa khaṇḍa samanvitam
tatra sūta ṛṣi saṃvāde purāṇa upakramaḥ tatas
sṛṣṭi prakaraṇam tu ādyam tatas nārada vedhasoḥ
vivādaḥ su mahān yatra dvayoḥ āsīt parābhavaḥ
śiva loka gatiḥ paścāt jñāna lābhaḥ śiva ātmane
śiva vākyena tat paścāt marīceḥ nāradasya tu
gamanam ca eva sāvarṇeḥ jñāna artham siddha sevite
āśrame su mahā puṇye trailokya āścarya kāriṇī
etat hi brahmakhaṇḍam hi śrutam pāpa vināśanam
tatas sāvarṇi saṃvādaḥ nāradasya samīritaḥ

go kule gamanam

original: rahasye rādhayā krīḍā varṇitā bahuvistarā // NarP_1,101.17 //

yat ca liṅga abhidham tiṣṭhan vahni liṅge haraḥ bhyadhāt

tatas dādhīca caritam yuga dharma nirūpaṇam
tatas bhuvana kośa ākhyā sūryasoma anvayaḥ tatas
tatas ca vistarāt sargaḥ tripura ākhyānakam tathā
liṅga pratiṣṭhā ca tatas paśu pāśa vimokṣaṇam

śaivam sahasranāma atha dakṣa yajña vināśanam

upamanyu kathā ca api pūrva bhāgaḥ iti īritaḥ

śivam āha tmya se yuktaḥ strāna yāga ādikam tatas

dānāni bahudhā aktāni śrāddha prakaraṇam tatas
tatas ghorasya kīrtanam

somavāravratam ca api sīmantinyāḥ kathānakam

bhadrāyu mahimā ca api bhasma māhātmya kīrtanam
śabara ākhyānakam ca eva umāmāheśvaram vratam
rudrākṣasya ca māhātmyam rudrādhyāyasya puṇyakam
śravaṇa ādika puṇyam ca brahmakhaṇḍaḥ yam īritaḥ
atas param caturtham tu kāśīkhaṇḍam anuttamam
vindhya nāradayoḥ yatra saṃvādaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
satya loka prabhāvaḥ ca agastya āvāse sura āgamaḥ
pativratā caritram ca tīrtha yātrā praśaṃsanam
tatas ca saptapurī ākhyā saṃyaminyāḥ nirūpaṇam
budhasya ca tathā indra agnyoḥ loka āptiḥ śivaśarmaṇaḥ
agneḥ samudbhavaḥ ca eva kravyād varuṇa saṃbhavaḥ
gandhavatī alakā puryoḥ īśvaryāḥ ca samudbhavaḥ
candra arka budha lokānām kuja ijyā arka bhuvām kramāt
mama viṣṇoḥ dhruvasya api tapolokasya varṇanam
dhruva loka kathā puṇyā satya loka nirīkṣaṇam
prabhāvaḥ ca api gaṅgāyāḥ gaṅgā nāma sahasrakam
vārāṇasī praśaṃsā ca bhairava āvirbhavaḥ tatas
daṇḍa pāṇi jñāna vāpyoḥ udbhavaḥ samanantaram
tatas kalāvatī ākhyānam sat ācāra nirūpaṇam
brahmacāri samākhyānam tatas strī lakṣaṇāni ca
kṛtyākṛtya vinirdeśaḥ hi avimukta īśa varṇanam
gṛhastha yoginaḥ dharmāḥ kāla jñānam tatas param
divodāsa kathā puṇyā kāśikā varṇanam tatas
māyā gaṇapateḥ ca atha bhuvi prādurbhavaḥ tatas
divodāsa vimokṣaṇam
tatas pañcanada utparttiḥ bindu mādhava saṃbhavaḥ
tatas vaiṣṇavatīrtha ākhyā śūlinaḥ kāśika āgamaḥ
jaigīṣavyena saṃvādaḥ jyeṣṭheśākhyāḥ maheśituḥ
śaileśa ratneśvarayoḥ kṛttivāsasya ca udbhavaḥ
devatānām adhiṣṭānam durga asura parākramaḥ
durgāyāḥ vijayaḥ ca atha oṅkāra īśasya varṇanam
māhātmya
kedāra ākhyā ca dharmeśa kathā viṣṇu bhuja udbhavā
viśvakarmā īśa mahimā dakṣa yajña udbhavaḥ tathā
satīśasya amṛteśa ādeḥ bhuja staṃbhaḥ parāśare
kṣetra tīrtha kadaṃbaḥ ca mukti maḍapa saṃkathā
viśveśa vibhavaḥ ca atha tatas yātrā parikramaḥ

original: ataḥ paraṃ tvavantyākhyaṃ śṛṇu khaṇḍa ca pañcamam ///
analyzed: atas param tu avantya ākhyam śṛṇu khaṇḍa ca pañcamam
mahākāla vana ākhyānam brahma śīrṣa chidā tatas
prāyaścitta vidhiḥ ca agneḥ utpattiḥ ca sura āgamaḥ
kapola mocana ākhyānam mahākāla vana sthitiḥ
tīrtham kanakhaleśasya sarva pāpa praṇāśanam
kuṇḍam apsarasaṃjñam ca saraḥ rudrasya puṇya dam
kuḍaveśam ca vidyādhram markaṭeśvara tīrthakam
gandhavatītīrtham pāpa praṇāśanam
piśācaka ādi yātrā ca hanumat kavaceśvarau
mahākāla īśa yātrā ca valmīkeśvara tīrthakam

original: śukre ca pañcame cākhye kuśasthalyāḥ pradakṣiṇāḥ // NarP_1,104.98 //
analyzed: śukre ca pañcame ca ākhye kuśasthalyāḥ pradakṣiṇāḥ
akrūra saṃjñakam tu eka pādam candra arka vaibhavam
karabheśa ākhya tīrtham ca laṭukeśa ādi tīrthakam
keśava arkam śakti bhedam svarṇa sāra mukhāni ca
oṅkāra īśa ādi tīrthāni andhaka śruti kīrtanam
kālāraṇye liṅga saṃkhyā svarṇa śṛṅga abhidhānakam
kuśasthalyāḥ avantyāḥ ca ujjayinyāḥ abhidhānakam
kumudvatī amarāvatī nāmakam
viśālā pratikalpa abhidhānam ca jvara śāntikam
hiraṇyākṣa vadha ākhyānam tīrtham suṃdarakuṇḍakam
puruṣottama abhidhānam tu tat tīrtham ca agha nāśanam
gomatī vāmanam kuṇḍaḥ viṣṇoḥ nāma sahasrakam
vīreśvarasaraḥ kālabhairavasya ca tīrthakam
kuṭumba īśvara yātrā ca deva sādhaka kīrtanam
karkarāja ākhya tīrtham ca vighneśa ādi su rohanam
rundrakuṇḍa prabhṛtiṣu bahu tīrtha nirūpaṇam
yātrā aṣṭa tīrtha jā puṇyā revāmāhātmyam ucyate
dharmaputrasya vairāgyaḥ mārkaṇḍeyena saṃgamaḥ

original: kalpe kalpe pṛthaṅ nāma narmadāyāḥ prakīrtitam // NarP_1,104.110 //
analyzed: kalpe kalpe pṛthak nāma narmadāyāḥ prakīrtitam
stava mārṣam nāma idam ca kālarātri kathā tatas
mahādeva stutiḥ paścāt pṛthak kalpa kathā adbhutā
viśalya ākhyānakam paścāt jāleśvara kathā tathā
gorīvrata samākhyānam tripura jvālanam tatas
dehapāta vidhānam ca kāverīsaṃgamaḥ tatas
dārutīrtham brahmāvartam yatra īśvara kathānakam
kuṇḍaleśam pippalādam vimaleśam ca śūlabhid
śacīharaṇam ākhyā nam abhrakasya vadhaḥ tatas
śūlabheda udbhavaḥ yatra dāna dharmāḥ pṛthagvidhāḥ
ākhyānam dīrghatapasaḥ ṛṣyaśṛṅga kathā tatas
citrasena kathā puṇyā kāśi rājyasya lakṣaṇam
tatas devaśilā ākhyānam śabarī tīrthaka anvitam
vyādha ākhyānam tatas puṇyam puṣkariṇī arkatīrthakam
āpretya īśvaratīrtham ca śakratīrtham karoṭikam
kumāra īśam agastya īśam ānanda īśam ca mātṛ jam

original: lokeśaṃ dhanadeśaṃ ca maṅgaleśaṃ ca kāmajam // NarP_1,104.119 //
analyzed: loka īśam dhana deśam ca maṅgala īśam ca kāma jam
nāgeśam ca api gopāram gautamam śaṅkhacūḍakam
dadhiskanda ādi tīrthāni hanūmatā īśvaram tatas
rāmeśvara ādi tīrthāni someśam piṅgaleśvaram
ṛṇamokṣam kapileśam pūtikeśam jaleśayam

original: caṇḍārkaṃ yamatīrthaṃ ca kālhoḍīśaṃ vanādike // NarP_1,104.122 //
analyzed: caṇḍārkam yamatīrtham ca kālhoḍīśam vanādike
nārāyaṇam ca koṭīśam vyāsatīrtham prabhāsakam
airaṇḍīsaṃgamam puṇyam suvarṇa śila tīrthakam

original: karañjaṃ kāmahaṃ tīrthaṃ bhāṇḍīro rohiṇībhavam // NarP_1,104.124 //
analyzed: karañjam kāmaham tīrtham bhāṇḍīraḥ rohiṇībhavam
koṭitīrtham ayoni akhyam aṅgāra ākhyam trilocanam

original: indreśaṃ kaṃbukeśaṃ ca someśaṃ kohanaṃ śakam /
analyzed: indra īśam kaṃbuka īśam ca soma īśam kohanam śakam
nārmadam ca arkam āgneyam bhārgaveśvaram uttamam
brāhmam daivam ca mārgeśam ādi vārāhaka īśvaram
rāmeśam atha siddheśam āhalyam kaṅkaṭeśvaram

original: śākraṃ saumyaṃ ca nādeśaṃ toyeśaṃ rukmiṇībhavam /
analyzed: śākram saumyam ca nādeśam toyeśam rukmiṇībhavam
yojana īśam varāha īśam dvādaśī śiva tīrthakam
siddheśam maṅgaleśam ca liṅga vārāha tīrthakam
śukla ādīni ca tīrthāni huṅkāra svāmi tīrthakam
saṃgameśam nahuṣeśam mokṣaṇam pañcagopakam
nāgaśāvam ca siddheśam mārkaṇḍāṅkrūra tīrthake
kāmoda śūla āropa ākhye māṇḍavyam gopakeśvaram
kapileśam piṅgaleśam bhūteśam gāṅga gautame
āsvamedham bhṛgukaccham kedāreśam ca pāpa nud
kalakaleśam jāleśam śālagrāmam varāhakam
candraprabhāsam ādityam śrīpati ākhyam ca haṃsakam
mūlya sthānam ca śūla īśam ugra ākhyam citra daivakam
śikhīśam kāṇṭitīrtham ca daśakanyam suvaṇakam

original: ṛṇamokṣaṃ bhārabhūti puṅkhāṃ muḍiṃ ca ḍiṇḍimam // NarP_1,104.134 //
analyzed: ṛṇamokṣam bhārabhūti puṅkhām muḍim ca ḍiṇḍimam
āmala īśam kapāla īśam śṛṅga eraṇḍī bhavam tatas
koṭitīrtham loṭaṇeṣam phala stutiḥ atas param
dṛmijaṅgalamāhātmye rohitāśva kathā tatas
dhundhumāra samākhyānam vadha upāyaḥ vai
vadhau dhundhoḥ tatas paścāt tatas citravaha udbhavaḥ
mahimā asya tatas caḍīśa prabhāvaḥ ratīśvaraḥ
mukhāram cyavana andha āsyam brahmaṇaḥ ca saraḥ tatas
cakra ākhyam lalitā ākhyānam tīrtham ca bahu gomayam

original: rudrāvartaṃ ca markaṇḍaṃ tīrthaṃ pāpapraṇāśanam // NarP_1,104.139 //
analyzed: rudrāvartam ca markaṇḍam tīrtham pāpa praṇāśanam

original: ataḥ paraṃ nāgarākhyaḥ khaṇḍaḥ ṣaṣṭho 'bhidhīyate // NarP_1,104.141 //
analyzed: atas param nāgara ākhyaḥ khaṇḍaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ abhidhīyate

viśvāmitrasya māhātmyam triśaṅku svargatiḥ tathā
hāṭake śvara māhātmye vṛtra asura vadhaḥ tathā
nāgabilam śaṅkhatīrtham acaleśvara varṇanam
viṣṇu pādam ca gokarṇam yuga rūpam samāśrayaḥ
siddheśvaram nāgasaraḥ sapta ārṣeyam hi agastyakam

śāramiṣṭham somanātham ca daurgamātarjaka īśvaram

original: rāmahradaṃ nāgapuraṃ ṣaāḍliṅgaṃ caiva yajñabhūḥ // NarP_1,104.147 //
analyzed: rāmahradam nāgapuram ṣaāḍliṅgam ca eva yajñabhūḥ

original: rudraśīrṣaṃ ca yāgeśaṃ vālakhilyaṃ ca gāruḍam // NarP_1,104.148 //
analyzed: rudraśīrṣam ca yāgeśam vālakhilyam ca gāruḍam
lakṣmī śāpaḥ saptaviṃśa somaprāsādam eva ca
aṃbābaddham pāṇḍuka ākhyam āgneyam brahmakuṇḍakam

original: aṭeśvaraṃ yājñavalkya gauryaṃ gāṇeśameva ca // NarP_1,104.153 //
analyzed: aṭeśvaram yājñavalkya gauryam gāṇeśam eva ca

original: bhārgavaṃ caritaṃ caiva vaiśvāmaitraṃ tataḥ param /

original: sārasvataṃ paippalādaṃ kaṃsārīśaṃ ca paiṇḍakam // NarP_1,104.157 //

original: pauṣkaraṃ naimiṣaṃ dhārmamaraṇya tritayaṃ smṛtam // NarP_1,104.159 //
analyzed: pauṣkaram naimiṣam dhārmam araṇya tritayam smṛtam

original: nadīnāṃ tritayaṃ gaṅgā narmadā ca sarasvatī // NarP_1,104.162 //
analyzed: nadīnām tritayam gaṅgā narmadā ca sarasvatī

sa aṃba ādityam śrāddha kalpam yaudhiṣṭhiram atha andhakam

maṅkaṇeśam śivarātriḥ tulāpuruṣadānakam

pāpa piṇḍam māsa laiṅgam yuga māna ādi kīrtanam

original: someśo yatra viśveśor'kasthalaṃ puṇyadaṃ mahat // NarP_1,104.168 //
analyzed: someśaḥ yatra viśveśa urkasthalam puṇya dam mahat
siddheśvara ādika ākhyānam pṛthak atra prakīrtitam

budha ijya bhṛgu saura āgu śiravī īśāḥ hara vigrahāḥ

original: varārohā hyajā pālā maṅgalā laliteśvarī // NarP_1,104.171 //
analyzed: varārohā hi ajā pālā maṅgalā lalitā īśvarī
lakṣmīśaḥ vāḍaveśaḥ ca urvīśaḥ kāmesvaraḥ tathā
gaurīśa varuṇa īśa ākhyam durvāsa īśam gaṇeśvaram
tatas koṭīśa bāla brahma ādi sat kathā
naraka īśa saṃvartta īśa nidhi īśvara kathā tatas
balabhadra īśvarasya atha gaṅgāyāḥ gaṇapasya ca
jāṃbavatī ākhya saritaḥ pāṇḍukūpasya sat kathā
śatamedha lakṣamedha koṭimedha kathā tathā
durvāsa arka ghaṭa sthāna hiraṇya āsaṃgama utkathā
nagara arkasya kṛṣṇasya saṃkarṣaṇa samudrayoḥ
kumāryāḥ kṣetrapā asya brahmeśasya kathā pṛthak
ṛṣi tīrthasya nanda arka tritakūpasya kīrtanam
sa sopānasya parṇa arka nyaṅkumatyoḥ kathā adbhutā
kathā kanakanandāyāḥ kutī gaṅgeśayoḥ tathā
camasodbeda vidura tri lokeśa kathā tatas
maṅkaṇeśa traipura īśa ṣaṇḍatīrtha kathāḥ tathā
sūryaprācī trīkṣaṇayā uru mānāta kathā tathā
bhūddhāra śūla sthalayoḥ cyavana arka īśayoḥ tathā
ajāpāla īśa bāla arka kubera sthala jā kathā
ṛṣi toyā kathā puṇyā saṃgāla īśvara kīrtanam
taptakuṇḍasya māhātmyam mūlacaṇḍīśa varṇanam
caturvaktra gaṇādhyakṣa kalaṃba īśvarayoḥ kathā
gopāla svāmī iva kula svāminoḥ marutām kathā
tatas
kālameghasya rukmiṇyāḥ durvāsa īśvara bhadrayoḥ
śaṅkhāvarta mokṣatīrtha goṣpada acyuta sadmanām
jāleśvarasya huṅkāreśvara caṇḍīśayoḥ kathā
āśā pura stha vighneśa kalā kuṇḍa kathā adbhutā

original: kapileśasya ca kathā jaradgavaśivasya ca // NarP_1,104.187 //
analyzed: kapila īśasya ca kathā jaradgava śivasya ca
nala karkeṭa īśvarayoḥ hāṭaka īśvara jā kathā
suparṇa elā ākhya bhairavyoḥ bhallatīrtha bhavā kathā
kīrtanam kardamālasya guptasomeśvasya ca
bahu svarṇa īśa śṛṅga īśa koṭīśvara kathā tatas
svarṇarekhā brahmakuṇḍam kuntī bhīmeśvarau tathā

original: mṛgīkuṇḍaṃ ca sarvasvaṃ kṣetre vastrāpathe smṛtam // NarP_1,104.191 //
analyzed: mṛgī kuṇḍam ca sarva svam kṣetre vastrāpathe smṛtam
durgā bhilla īśa gaṅgā īśa raivatānām kathā adbhutā
kathā acala īśvara kīrtanam

original: bhadrakarṇasya māhātmyaṃ trinetrasya tataḥ param // NarP_1,104.193 //
analyzed: bhadrakarṇasya māhātmyam trinetrasya tatas param
kedārasya ca māhātmyam tīrtha aṅgamana kīrtanam
koṭīśvara rūpa tīrtha hṛṣīkeśa kathāraḥ tatas

original: kātyāyanyāśca māhātmyaṃ tataḥ piṇḍārakasya ca // NarP_1,104.196 //
analyzed: kātyāyanyāḥ ca māhātmyam tatas piṇḍārakasya ca
tatas kanakhalasya atha cakra mānuṣa tīrthayoḥ
kapila agnitīrtha kathā tathā rakta anubandha jā
gaṇeśa pārtha īśvarayoḥ yāntrāyām ujjvalasya ca
kāmeśvarasya mārkaṇḍeya utpatteḥ ca kathā tatas
uddālaka īśa siddha īśa gata tītha kathā pṛthak
śrī devara vāta utpattiḥ ca vyāsa gautama tīrthayoḥ
tripuṣkara rudra hrada guha īśvara kathā śubhā
avimuktasya māhātmyam umā māheśvarasya ca
mahā ojasaḥ prabhāvaḥ ca jaṃbūtīrthasya varṇanam
gaṅgādhara miśrakayoḥ kathā
dvārakāyāḥ ca māhātmye candraśarma kathānakam
jāgara ādi arcana ādi ākhyā vratam ekādaśī bhavam
mahādvādaśika ākhyānam prahlāda ṛṣi samāgamaḥ
durvāsasaḥ upākhyānam yātrā upakrama kīrtanam
gomatī utpatti kathanam tasyām snāna ādi jam phalam
cakratīrthasya māhātmyam gomatī udadhi saṃgamaḥ
sanaka ādi hrada ākhyānam nṛga tīrtha kathā tatas
go pracāra kathā puṇyā gopīnām dvārakā āgamaḥ
pañca nadī āgama ākhyānam nānā ākhyāna samanvitam
trivikramasya mūrta ākhyā durvāsaḥ kṛṣṇa saṃkathā
gomatyām dvārakāyām ca tīrtha āgamana kīrtanam
kṛṣṇa mandira saṃprekṣā drāravatī abhiṣecanam

original: ityeṣa saptamaḥ proktaḥ khaṇḍaḥ prābhāsiko dvijāḥ // NarP_1,104.211 //
analyzed: iti eṣa saptamaḥ proktaḥ khaṇḍaḥ prābhāsikaḥ dvijāḥ
skānde sarva uttara kathe śiba māhātmya varṇane
likhitvā etat tu yaḥ dadyāt hema śūla samanvitam

original: mādhyāṃ satkṛtya viprāya sa śaive modate pade // NarP_1,104.213 //
analyzed: mādhyām satkṛtya viprāya sa śaive modate pade

original: iti śrībṛhannāradīya purāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde skandapurāṇānukramaṇīvarṇanaṃ nāma caturadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī bṛhat nāradīya purāṇe pūrva bhāge bṛhat upākhyāne caturtha pāde skandapurāṇānukramaṇīvarṇanam nāma catur adhika śatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
brahmā uvāca
śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyāmi purāṇam vāmana abhidham
trivikrama caritra āḍhyam daśa sāhasra saṃkhyakam
kūrmakalpa samākhyānam varga traya kathānam
bhāga dvaya samāyuktam vaktṛ śrotṛ śubha āvaham
purāṇapraśnaḥ prathamam brahma śīrṣa chidā tatas
kapāla mocana ākhyānam dakṣa yajña vihiṃsanam
harasya kāla rūpa ākhyā kāmasya dahanam tatas
prahlāda nārāyaṇayoḥ yuddham deva asura āhavaḥ
sukeśī arka samākhyānam tatas bhuvanakośakam
tatas kāmya vrata ākhyānam śrī durgā caritam tatas
tapatīcaritam paścāt kurukṣetrasya varṇanam
satyā māhātmyam atulam pārvatī janma kīrtanam
tapaḥ tasyāḥ vivāhaḥ ca gaurī upākhyānakam tatas
tatas kauśikyupākhyānam kumāracaritam tatas
tatas ndhaka vadha ākhyānam sādhya upākhyānakam tatas
jābāli caritam paścāt arajāyāḥ kathā adbhutā
andhaka īśarayoḥ yuddham gaṇa tvam ca andhakasya ca

original: marutāṃ janmakathanaṃ baleśca caritaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,105.9 //
analyzed: marutām janma kathanam baleḥ ca caritam tatas
tatas tu lakṣmyāḥ caritam traivikramam atas param
prahlāda tīrtha yātrāyām procyante kathāḥ śubhāḥ
tatas ca dhundhu caritam preta upākhyānakam tatas
nakṣatrapuruṣa ākhyānam śrī dāma caritam tatas
prahlāda bali saṃvāde sutale hari śaṃsanam
iti eṣa pūrva bhāgaḥ sya purāṇasya tava uditaḥ
śṛṇṇataḥ sya uttaram bhāgam bahadvāmana saṃjñakam
māheśvarī bhāgavatī saurī gāṇeśvarī tathā
catasraḥ saṃhitāḥ ca atra pṛthak sāhasra saṃkhyayā

original: māheśvaryāṃ tu kṛṣṇasya tadbhaktānāṃ ca kīrtanam /
analyzed: māheśvaryām tu kṛṣṇasya tad bhaktānām ca kīrtanam
bhāgavatyām jaganmātu khatāra kathā adbhutā
sauryām sūryasya mahimā gaditaḥ pāpa nāśanaḥ

original: gāṇeśvaryāṃ gaṇeśasya caritaṃ ca maheśituḥ // NarP_1,105.16 //
analyzed: gāṇeśvaryām gaṇeśasya caritam ca maheśituḥ
iti etat vāmanam nāma purāṇam su vicitrakam
pulastyena samākhyātam nāradāya mahātmane
tatas nāradataḥ prāptam vyāsena su mahātmanā
vyāsāt tu labdhavān ca etat tad śiṣyaḥ romaharṣaṇaḥ

original: sa cākhyāsyati viprebhyo naimiṣīyebhya eva ca /
analyzed: sa ca ākhyāsyati viprebhyaḥ naimiṣīyebhyaḥ eva ca

original: evaṃ paraṃparāprāptaṃ purāṇaṃ vāmanaṃ śubham // NarP_1,105.19 //
analyzed: evam paraṃparā prāptam purāṇam vāmanam śubham

original: ye paṭhanti ca śṛṇvanti te 'pi yānti parāṃ gatim /
analyzed: ye paṭhanti ca śṛṇvanti te pi yānti parām gatim
likhitvā etat purāṇam tu yaḥ śarad viṣuvā īrpayet
viprāya veda viduṣe ghṛtadhenu samanvitam
sa samuddhṛtya narakān nayet svargam pitṝn svakān

original: dehānte bhuktabhogo 'sau yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam // NarP_1,105.21 //
analyzed: dehānte sau yāti viṣṇoḥ param padam

original: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde vāmanapurāṇānukramaṇīvarṇanaṃ nāma pañcādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī bṛhat nāradīyapurāṇe pūrva bhāge bṛhat upākhyāne caturtha pāde vāmanapurāṇānukramaṇīvarṇanam nāma pañcādhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
brahmā uvāca

original: śṛṇu vatsa marīce tvaṃ purāṇaṃ kūrmasaṃjñakam /
analyzed: śṛṇu vatsa marīce tvam purāṇam kūrma saṃjñakam
lakṣmī kalpa anucaritam yatra kūrma vapuḥ hariḥ
dharma artha kāma mokṣāṇām māhātmyam ca pṛthak pṛthak
indradyumna prasaṃgena prāha ṛṣibhyaḥ dayā anvitaḥ
tat saptadaśa sāhasram su catuḥ saṃhitam śubham

original: yatra brāhmāḥ purā proktā dharmā nānāvidhā mune // NarP_1,106.3 //
analyzed: yatra brāhmāḥ purā proktāḥ dharmāḥ nānāvidhāḥ mune
nānanā kathā prasaṃgena nṛṇām sat gati dāyakāḥ

original: tatra pūrvavibhāge tu purāṇopakramaḥ purā // NarP_1,106.4 //
analyzed: tatra pūrva vibhāge tu purāṇa upakramaḥ purā
lakṣmī indradyumna saṃvādaḥ kūrṃma ṛṣi gaṇa saṃkathā
varṇa āśrama ācāra kathā jagat utpatti kīrtanam
kāla saṃkhyā samāsena laya ante stavanam vibhoḥ

original: tataḥ saṃkṣepataḥ sargaḥ śāṅkaraṃ caritaṃ tathā // NarP_1,106.6 //
analyzed: tatas saṃkṣepataḥ sargaḥ śāṅkaram caritam tathā
sahasranāma pārvatyāḥ yogasya ca nirūpaṇam
bhṛgu vaṃśa samākhyānam tatas svāyambhuvasya ca
deva ādīnām samutpattiḥ dakṣa yajña āhatiḥ tatas
dakṣa sṛṣṭi kathā paścāt kaśyapa anvaya kīrtanam
ātreya vaṃśa kathanam caritam śubham
mārtaṇḍa kṛṣṇa saṃvādaḥ vyāsa pāṇḍava saṃkathā
yuga dharma anukathanam vyāsa jaimini kīrtanam

original: vārāṇasyāśca māhātmyaṃ prayāgasya tataḥ param // NarP_1,106.10 //
analyzed: vārāṇasyāḥ ca māhātmyam prayāgasya tatas param
trailokya varṇanam ca eva veda śākhā nirūpaṇam

original: uttare 'syā vibhāge tu purā gītaiśvarī tataḥ // NarP_1,106.11 //
analyzed: uttare syāḥ vibhāge tu purā gītā aiśvarī tatas
vyāsagītā tatas proktā nānā dharma prabodhinī

original: nānāvidhānāṃ tīrthānāṃ māhātmyaṃ ca pṛthak tataḥ // NarP_1,106.12 //
analyzed: nānāvidhānām tīrthānām māhātmyam ca pṛthak tatas
pratisarga prakathanam brāhmī iyam saṃhitā smṛtā
atas param bhāgavatīsaṃhitā artha nirūpaṇam
kathitā yatra varṇānām pṛthak vṛttiḥ udāhṛtā

original: pāda'syāḥ prathame proktā brāhmaṇānāṃ vyavasthitiḥ // NarP_1,106.14 //
analyzed: pādasyāḥ prathame proktā brāhmaṇānām vyavasthitiḥ
sadā vatsa bhoga saukhya vivarddhanī

original: dvitīye kṣattriyāṇāṃ tu vṛttiḥ samyakprakīrtitā // NarP_1,106.15 //
analyzed: dvitīye kṣattriyāṇām tu vṛttiḥ samyak prakīrtitā
yayā tu āśritayā pāpam vidhūya iha vrajet divam
tṛtīye vaiśya jātīnām vṛttiḥ uktā caturvidhā
yayā caritayā samyak labhe gatim uttamām
caturthe syāḥ tathā pāde śūdra vṛttiḥ udāhṛtā
yayā saṃtuṣyati śrīśaḥ nṛṇām śreyaḥ vivarddhanaḥ
pañcame syāḥ tatas pāde vṛttiḥ saṃkara jā uditā
yayā caritayā āpnoti bhāvinīm gatim uttamām

original: ityeṣā pañcapadyuktā dvitīyā saṃhitā mune // NarP_1,106.19 //
analyzed: iti eṣā pañca padī uktā dvitīyā saṃhitā mune
tṛtīyā atrā uditā saurī nṝṇām kārya vidhāyinī

original: ṣoḍhā ṣaṭkarmasirddhi bodhayantī ca kāminām // NarP_1,106.20 //
analyzed: ṣoḍhā bodhayantī ca kāminām
caturthīvaiṣṇavaḥ nāma mokṣa dā parikīrtitā
catuṣpadī dvijātīnām sākṣāt brahma svarūriṇī
tāḥ kramāt ṣaṣ catur dvi iṣu sāhasrāḥ parikīrtitāḥ
etat kūrmapurāṇam tu caturvarga phala pradam
paṭhatām śṛṇvatām nṝṇām sarva utkṛṣṭa gati pradam
likhitvā etat tu yaḥ bhaktyā hemakūrma samanvitam

original: brāhmaṇāyā yane dadyātsa yāti paramāṃ gatim // NarP_1,106.24 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇāyāḥ yane dadyāt sa yāti paramām gatim

original: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde kūrmaparāṇānukramaṇīkathanaṃ nāma ṣaḍuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī bṛhat nāradīyapurāṇe pūrva bhāge bṛhat upākhyāne caturtha pāde kūrmaparāṇānukramaṇīkathanam nāma ṣaḍuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
brahmā uvāca

original: atha mātsyaṃ purāṇaṃ te pravakṣye dvijasattama /
analyzed: atha mātsyam purāṇam te pravakṣye dvijasattama

original: yatroktaṃ saptakalpānāṃ vṛttaṃ saṃkṣipya bhūtale // NarP_1,107.1 //
analyzed: yatra uktam sapta kalpānām vṛttam saṃkṣipya bhū tale
vyāsena veda viduṣā nārasiṃha upavarṇane
upakramya tat uddiṣṭam caturddaśa sahasrakam
manu matsya susaṃvādaḥ brahmāṇḍa kathanam tatas
brahma deva asura utpattiḥ māruta utpattiḥ eva ca
madanadvādaśī tadvat lokapāla abhipūjanam
manvantara samuddeśaḥ vaiśya rājya abhivarṇanam
sūrya vaivasvata utpattiḥ budha saṃgamanam tathā
pitṛ vaṃśa anukathanam śraddhā kālaḥ tathā eva ca
pitṛtīrtha pracāraḥ ca soma utpattiḥ tathā eva ca
kīrtanam soma vaṃśasya yayāti caritam tathā
pitṛ vaṃśa anukathanam sṛṣṭa vaṃśa anukīrtanam
bhṛgu śāpaḥ tathā viṣṇoḥ daśadhā janmane kṣitau
kīrttanam pūru vaṃśasya vaṃśaḥ hautāśanaḥ param
kriyā yogaḥ tatas paścāt purāṇa parikīrtanam
vratam nakṣatrapuruṣam mārtaṇḍaśayanam tathā
kṛṣṇa aṣṭamī vratam tadvat rohiṇī candra saṃjñitam
taḍāga vidhi māhātmyam pādapa utsargaḥ eva ca
saubhāgyaśayanam tadvat agastyavratam eva ca
tathā ananta tṛtīyāyāḥ rasakalyāṇinīvratam

original: tathaivānaṃ dakaryāśca vrataṃ sārasvataṃ punaḥ // NarP_1,107.11 //
analyzed: tathā eva anam dakaryāḥ ca vratam sārasvatam punar
uparāga abhiṣekaḥ ca saptamīśanam tathā
bhīma ākhyā dvādaśī tadvat anaṅgaśayanam tathā
a śūnya śayanam tadvat tathā eva aṅgārakavratam
saptamī saptakam tadvat viśoka dvādaśīvratam
meru pradānam daśadhā graha śāntiḥ tathā eva ca
graha svarūpa kathanam tathā śivacaturdaśī
tathā sarva phala tyāgaḥ sūryavāra vratam tathā
saṃkrānti snapanam tadvat vibhūti dvādaśīvratam
ṣaṣṭīvratānām māhātmyam tathā snāna vidhi kamaḥ
prayāgasya tu māhātmyam dvīpa loka anuvarṇanam
tathā antarikṣa cāraḥ ca dhruva māhātmyam eva ca
bhavanāni suredrāṇām tripura udyotanam tathā
caturyugasya saṃbhūtiḥ yuga dharma nirūpaṇam
vajrāṅgasya tu saṃbhūtiḥ stāraka utpattiḥ eva ca
tāraka asura māhātmyam brahma deva anukīrtanam
pārvatī saṃbhavaḥ tadvat tathā śiva tapovanam
anaṅga deha dāhaḥ ca rati śokaḥ tathā eva ca
gaurī tapaḥ vanam tadvat śivena atha prasādanam
pārvatī ṛṣi saṃvādaḥ tathā airā udvāha maṅgalam
kumārasaṃbhavaḥ tadvat kumāravijayaḥ tathā
tārakasya vadhaḥ ghoraḥ narasiṃha upavarṇanam
padmodbhava visargaḥ tu tathā eva andhaka ghātanam
vārāṇasyāḥ tu māhātmyam narmadāyāḥ tathā eva ca
pravara anukramaḥ tadvat pitṛ gāthā anukīrtanam
tathā ubhaya mukhī dānam dānam kṛṣṇājinasya ca
tatas sāvitrī upākhyānam rāja dharmāḥ tathā eva ca
vividha utpāta kathanam grahaṇa antaḥ tathā eva ca
yātrā nimitta kathanam svapna maṅgala kīrtane

original: vāmanasya tu māhātmyaṃ vārāhasya tataḥ param // NarP_1,107.26 //
analyzed: vāmanasya tu māhātmyam vārāhasya tatas param
samudra mathanam tadvat kālakūṭa abhiśāntanam
deva asura vimardaḥ ca vāstu vidyā tathā eva ca
pratimā lakṣaṇam tadvat devatāyatanam tathā
prāsāda lakṣaṇam ca lakṣaṇam
bhaviṣya rājñām uddeśaḥ mahā dāna anukīrtanam
kalpa anukīrtanam tadvat purāṇe smin prakīrtitam
pavitram etat kalyāṇam āyuḥ kīrti vivarddhanam

original: yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādvāpi sa yāti bhavanaṃ hareḥ // NarP_1,107.30 //
analyzed: yaḥ paṭhet śṛṇuyāt vā api sa yāti bhavanam hareḥ
likhitvā etat tu yaḥ dadyāt hema matsya gavānvitam

original: viprāyābhyarcya viṣuve sa yāti paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,107.31 //
analyzed: viprāya abhyarcya viṣuve sa yāti paramam padam

original: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde matsyapurāṇānukramaṇīkathanaṃ nāma saptottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī bṛhat nāradīyapurāṇe pūrva bhāge bṛhat upākhyāne caturtha pāde matsyapurāṇānukramaṇīkathanam nāma saptottaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
brahmā uvāca

original: marīce śṛṇu vakṣyābhi purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ śubham /
analyzed: marīce śṛṇu vakṣyā abhi purāṇam gāruḍam śubham
garuḍāya abravīt pṛṣṭaḥ bhagavān garuḍāsanaḥ
ekonaviṃśa sāhasram tārkṣya kalpa kathā anvitam
purāṇa upakrama praśnaḥ sargaḥ saṃkṣepataḥ tatas
sūrya ādi pūjana vidhiḥ dīkṣā vidhiḥ atas param
śrāddha pūjā tatas paścāt navavyūha arcanam dvija

original: pūjāvidhānaṃ ca tathā vaiṣṇavaṃ pañjaraṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: pūjā vidhānam ca tathā vaiṣṇavam pañjaram tatas
yoga adhyāyaḥ tatas viṣṇoḥ nāma sāhasra kīrtanam
dhyānam viṣṇoḥ tatas sūrya pūjā mṛtyuñjaya arcanam

original: mālāmantraḥ śivārcātha gaṇapūjā tataḥ param // NarP_1,108.5 //
analyzed: mālāmantraḥ śiva arcā atha gaṇa pūjā tatas param
gopāla pūjā trailokya mohana śrīdhara arcanam
viṣṇu arcā pañcatattva arcā cakra arcā deva pūjanam
nyāsa ādi saṃdhyā upāstiḥ ca durga arcā atha sura arcanam
pūjā māheśvarī ca atas pavitra āropaṇa arcanam
prāsādānām ca lakṣaṇam
pratiṣṭhā sarva devānām pṛthak pūjā vidhānataḥ
ṣaṣ aṅgaḥ dāna dharmāḥ prayaścitta vidhi kriyā
dvīpa īśa naraka ākhyānam sūrya vyūhaḥ ca jyotiṣam
sāmudrikam svara jñānam nava ratna parīkṣaṇam
māhātmyam atha tīrthānām gayāmāhātmyam uttamam
tatas manvantara ākhyānam pṛthak pṛthak vibhāgaśaḥ
pitṛ ākhyānam varṇa dharmāḥ dravya śuddhiḥ samarpaṇam
śrāddham vināyakasya arcā graha yajñaḥ tathaā śramāḥ
janana ākhyam preta śaucam nīti śāstram vrata uktayaḥ
sūryavaṃśaḥ somavaṃśaḥ vatāra kathanam hareḥ
rāmāyaṇam hareḥ vaṃśaḥ bhārata ākhyānakam tatas
āyurveda nidānam prāk cikikatsā dravya jāḥ guṇāḥ

original: rogaghnaṃ kavacaṃ viṣṇorgāruḍaṃ traipuro manuḥ // NarP_1,108.14 //
analyzed: roga ghnam kavacam viṣṇoḥ gāruḍam traipuraḥ manuḥ
praśna cūḍāmaṇiḥ ca antaḥ haya āyurveda kīrtanam
oṣaghī nāma kathanam tatas vyākaraṇa ūhanam
chandaḥ śāstram sat ācāraḥ tatas snāna vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ

original: tarpaṇaṃ vaiśvadevaṃ ca saṃdhyā pārvaṇakarma ca // NarP_1,108.16 //
analyzed: tarpaṇam vaiśvadevam ca saṃdhyā pārvaṇa karma ca

original: pratisaṃkrama uktāḥ sma yugadharmāḥ kṛteḥ phalam // NarP_1,108.17 //
analyzed: pratisaṃkrame uktāḥ sma yuga dharmāḥ kṛteḥ phalam
yoga śāstram viṣṇu bhaktiḥ namaskṛti phalam hareḥ
māhātmyam vaiṣṇavam ca atha nārasiṃha stava uttamam
vedānta sāṃkhya siddhāntaḥ brahma jñānam tathā almakam
atha asya eva uttare khaṇḍe preta kalpaḥ purā uditaḥ
yatra tārkṣyeṇa saṃpṛṣṭaḥ bhagavān āha vāḍavāḥ
dharma prakaṭanam pūrvam yoginām gati kāraṇam
dāna ādikam phalam ca api prokta mantra ūrddha daihikam

original: yamalokasthamārgasya varṇana ca taḥ param // NarP_1,108.22 //
analyzed: yama loka stha mārgasya ca param
ṣoḍaśa śrāddha phalakaḥ vṛttāntaḥ ca atra varṇitaḥ
niṣkṛtiḥ yama mārgasya dharmarājasya vaibhavam

original: pretānāṃ caritākhyānaṃ kāraṇaṃ pretatāṃ prati // NarP_1,108.24 //
analyzed: pretānām carita ākhyānam kāraṇam preta tām prati
preta kṛtya vicāraḥ ca sarpiḍīkaraṇa uktayaḥ
preta tva mokṣaṇa ākhyānam dānāni ca vimuktaye
āvaśyaka uttamam dānam preta saukhyaka rohanam
śārīraka vinirdeśaḥ yama lokasya varṇanam
mṛtyoḥ pūrva kriyā ākhyānam paścāt karma nirūpaṇam
sūtakasya atha saṃkhyā aṃnam nārāyaṇa bali kriyā
vṛṣotsargasya māhātmyam niṣiddha parivarjanam
apamṛtyu kriyā uktiḥ ca vipākaḥ karmaṇām nṛṇām
kṛtyā akṛtya vicāraḥ ca viṣṇu dhyāna vimuktaye
svar gatau vihita ākhyānam svarga saukhya nirūpaṇam

analyzed: sarvam dinam kṣipet evam pradoṣe tu śivālaye
gatvā saṃpūjayet devam liṅga rūpiṇam īśvaram
gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ samyak pūjayitvā maheśvaram

original: japetpañcākṣarī vidyāṃ śataṃ cāpi sahasrakam // NarP_1,114.21 //
analyzed: japet pañcākṣarī vidyām śatam ca api sahasrakam
japam nivedya devāya bhavāya bhava rūpiṇe
stutvā sarvaiḥ vaundikaiḥ ca paurāṇaiḥ ca api an ākulaḥ
prārthayet devam īśānam śaśvat sarva anna siddhaye
śāradīyāni ca annāni tathā vāsaṃtikāni api

original: yāni syustaiḥ samṛddho 'haṃ bhūyāṃ janmani janmani /
analyzed: yāni syuḥ taiḥ samṛddhaḥ ham bhūyām janmani janmani

original: evaṃ saṃprārthya deveśaṃ gṛhamāgatya vai svakam // NarP_1,114.24 //
analyzed: evam saṃprārthya deveśam gṛham āgatya vai svakam
da tvā annam brāhmaṇa ādibhyaḥ pakvam bhuñjīta vāgyataḥ
etat anna vratam vipra vidhinā ācaritam nṛbhiḥ
sarva anna saṃpad janakam para loke gati pradam
śrāvaṇe śukla pañca jamyām nṛbhiḥ āstikya tatparaiḥ
dvārasya ubhayatas lekhyāḥ gomayena viṣa ulbaṇāḥ
gandha ādyaiḥ pūjayet tān ca tathā indrāṇīm anantaram
saṃpūjya svarṇa rūpya ādi dadhi akṣata kuśa aṃbubhiḥ
gandhaiḥ puṣpaiḥ tathā dhūpaiḥ dīpaiḥ naivedya saṃcayaiḥ
tatas pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tat dravyam saṃpraṇamya ca
saṃprārthya bhakti bhāvena vipra agryeṣu samarpayet
yat idam svarṇa raupya ādi dravyam vai viprasātkṛtam
tat ananta phalam bhūyāt mama janmani janmani
iti evam dadataḥ dravyam bhakti bhāvena nārada
etat vratam naraḥ kṛtvā viprān saṃbhojya bhaktitaḥ
paścāt svayam ca bhuñjīta dāra apatya suhṛd dṛtaḥ

original: bhādre tu kṛṣṇapañcamyāṃ nāgān kṣīreṇa tarpayet // NarP_1,114.33 //
analyzed: bhādre tu kṛṣṇa pañcamyām nāgān kṣīreṇa tarpayet
yaḥ tasya āsaptamam yāvat kulam sarpāt su nirbhayam
bhādrasya śukla pañcamyām pūjayet ṛṣi sattamān
prātar nadī ādike snātvā kṛtvā nityam atandritaḥ
gṛham āgatya yatnena vedikām kārayet mṛdā
gomayena upalipya atha kṛtvā puṣpa upaśobhitām
tatra āstīrya kuśān vipra ṛṣīn sapta samarcayet
gandhaiḥ ca vividhaiḥ puṣpaiḥ dhūpaiḥ dīpaiḥ
tris bharadvājau viśvāmitraḥ tha gautamaḥ
jamadagniḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ ca saptā ete ṛṣayaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: etaibhyo 'ghya ca vidhivatkalpayitvā pradāya ca // NarP_1,114.38 //
analyzed: ca vidhivat kalpayitvā pradāya ca
naivedyam vipacet vīmān śyāmāka ādyaiḥ akṛṣṭakaiḥ
tat nivedya visṛjya imān svayam ca adyāt tat eva hi
anena vidhinā sapta varṣāṇi prativatsaram

original: kṛtvā vratānte varayedācāryān sapta vaidikān // NarP_1,114.40 //
analyzed: kṛtvā vrata ante varayet ācāryān sapta vaidikān
pratimāḥ saptakurvīnta suvarṇena sva śaktitaḥ
jaṭilāḥ sa akṣasūtrāḥ ca kamaṇḍalu samanvitāḥ
saṃsthāpya kalaśeṣu etān tāmreṣu mṛd mayeṣu vā
snāpayet vidhi vat bhaktyā pṛthak pañcāmṛtaiḥ api
upacāraiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ tatas saṃpūjya bhaktitaḥ

original: arghyaṃ datvā tato homaṃ tilavrīhiyavādibhiḥ // NarP_1,114.43 //
analyzed: arghyam da tvā tatas homam tila vrīhi yava ādibhiḥ
ṭha sa ha stomāḥ iti ṛkhāḥ nāma nantraiḥ tu vā pṛthak
puṇyaiḥ mantraiḥ tathā eva anyaiḥ hutvā pūrṇāhutim caret
tatas tu sapta gāḥ dadyāt vastra alaṅkāra saṃyutāḥ
ācāryam vastra alaṅkāra bhūṣaṇaiḥ
anujñayā guroḥ paścāt mūrtīḥ vipreṣu ca arpayet

original: bhojayitvā tu tānbhaktyā praṇipatya visarjayet // NarP_1,114.46 //
analyzed: bhojayitvā tu tān bhaktyā praṇipatya visarjayet
tatas ca iṣṭaiḥ saha āsīnaḥ svayam brāhmaṇa śeṣitam

original: bhuṅktvā vai ṣaḍrasopetaṃ pramudyātsaha bandhubhiḥ // NarP_1,114.47 //
analyzed: bhuṅktvā vai ṣaṣ rasa upetam pramudyāt saha bandhubhiḥ
etat kṛtvā vratam gāṅgam bhogān bhuktvā atha vāñchitān
saptarṣīṇām prasādena vimāna vara gaḥ bhavet
āśvine śukla pañcamyām upāṅgalalitāvratam

original: tasyāḥ svarṇamayīṃ mūrtiṃ śaktyā nirmāya nārada /
analyzed: tasyāḥ svarṇa mayīm mūrtim śaktyā nirmāya nārada
upacāraiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ pūjayet tām vidhānataḥ
pakva annam phala saṃyuktam sa ghṛtam dakṣiṇā anvitam
dvijavaryāya dātavyam vrata saṃpūrti hetave
sa vāhanā śakti yutā vara dā pūjitā mayā
mātar mām anugṛhya atha gamyatām nija mandiram
kārtike śukla pañcamyām jayāvratam anuttamam
kartavyam pāpa nāśāya śraddhayā dvijasattama
pūjayitvā jayām vipra yathāvidhi samāhitaḥ
upacāraiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ tatas śuciḥ alaṅkṛtaḥ

original: vipraikaṃ bhojayeccāpi tasmai dattvā ca dakṣiṇām /
analyzed: vipra ekam bhojayet ca api tasmai dattvā ca dakṣiṇām
visarjayet tatas paścāt svayam bhuñjīta vāgyataḥ

original: yastu vai bhaktisaṃyuktaḥ snānaṃ kuryāj jayādine /
analyzed: yaḥ tu vai bhakti saṃyuktaḥ snānam kuryāt jayādine

original: naśyanti tasya pāpāni siṃhākrāntā mṛgā yathā // NarP_1,114.56 //
analyzed: naśyanti tasya pāpāni siṃha ākrāntāḥ mṛgāḥ yathā
yat aśvamedha avabhṛthe phalam snānena kīrtitam
tat phalam prāpyate vipra snānena api jayā dine

original: aputro labhate putraṃ vandhyā gabha ca vindati /
analyzed: aputraḥ labhate putram vandhyā gabha ca vindati

original: rogī rogātpramucyeta baddho mucyeta bandhanāt // NarP_1,114.58 //
analyzed: rogī rogāt pramucyeta baddhaḥ mucyeta bandhanāt
mārga śukle ca pañcamyām nāgān iṣṭvā vidhānataḥ

original: nāgebhyo hyabhayaṃ labdhvā modate saha bāndhavaiḥ // NarP_1,114.59 //
analyzed: nāgebhyaḥ hi abhayam labdhvā modate saha bāndhavaiḥ
pauṣe śukla pañcamyām sampūjya madhusūdanam
labhate bāñchitān kāmān na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: pañcamyāṃ pratimāse tu śukle kṛṣṇe ca nārada /
analyzed: pañcamyām pratimāse tu śukle kṛṣṇe ca nārada

original: pitṝṇāṃ pūjanaṃ śastaṃ nāgānāṃ cāpi sarvathā // NarP_1,114.61 //
analyzed: pitṝṇām pūjanam śastam nāgānām ca api sarvathā

original: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthapañcamīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturdaśādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī bṛhat nāradīyapurāṇe pūrva bhāge bṛhat upākhyāne caturtha pāde dvādaśamāsasthapañcamīvratanirūpaṇam nāma caturdaśa adhika śatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
sanātanaḥ uvāca

original: śṛṇu vipra pravakṣyāmi ṣaṣṭhyāścaiva vratāni te /
analyzed: śṛṇu vipra pravakṣyāmi ṣaṣṭhyāḥ ca eva vratāni te
yāni samyak vidhāya atra
caitra māse śukla ṣaṣṭhyām kumāravratam uttamam

original: tatreṣṭvā ṣaṇmukhaṃ devaṃ nānāpūjā vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,115.2 //
analyzed: tatra iṣṭvā ṣaṇmukham devam nānā pūjāḥ vidhānataḥ
putram sarva guṇa upetam prāpnuyāt cira jīvinam

original: vaiśākhaśuklaṣaṣṭhyāṃ ca pūjayitvā ca kārtikam // NarP_1,115.3 //
analyzed: vaiśākha śukla ṣaṣṭhyām ca pūjayitvā ca kārtikam

original: labhate mātṛjaṃ saukhyaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
analyzed: labhate mātṛ jam saukhyam na atra kāryā vicāraṇā
jyeṣṭha māse śukla ṣaṣṭhyām vidhinā iṣṭvā divākaram
labhate vāñchitān kāmān tad prasādāt na saṃśayaḥ
āṣāḍha śukla ṣaṣṭhyām vai skandavratam anuttamam
upoṣya pūjayitvā enam śiva umā priyam ātmajam
labhate bhīpsitān kāmān putra pautra ādi saṃtatīḥ
śrāvaṇe śukla ṣaṣṭhyām tu śarajanmānam arcayet
upacāraiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ bhaktyā paramayā anvitaḥ
labhate bhīpsitān arthān ṣaṇmukhasya prasādataḥ
bhādra māse kṛṣṇa ṣaṣṭyām lalitāvratam ucyate
prātar snātvā vidhānena nārī śukla ambara āvṛtā
vā api nadyāḥ saṃgama vālukām

original: gṛhītvā vaṃśapātre tu dhṛtvā piṇḍākṛtiṃ ca tām /

original: paṅkajaṃ karavīraṃ ca nepālīṃ mālatīṃ tathā /
analyzed: paṅkajam karavīram ca nepālīm mālatīm tathā

original: nīlotpalaṃ ketakīṃ ca saṃgṛhya tagaraṃ tathā // NarP_1,115.11 //
analyzed: nīlotpalam ketakīm ca saṃgṛhya tagaram tathā
ekaika aṣṭaśatam grāhyam aṣṭāviṃśatiḥ eva ca

original: akṣatāḥ kalikā gṛhya tābhirdevīṃ prapūjayet // NarP_1,115.12 //
analyzed: akṣatāḥ kalikāḥ gṛhya tābhiḥ devīm prapūjayet
prārthayet agratas sthitvā devīm tām giriśa priyām
gaṅgādvāre kuśāvartte vilvake nīlaparvate

original: snātvā kanakhale devi harariṃ labdhavatī patim /
analyzed: snātvā kanakhale devi hararim labdhavatī patim
lalite subhagam devi sukha saubhāgya dāyini
anatam dahi saubhāgye mahyam tubhyam namaḥ namanaḥ
mantreṇa anena kusuma aiśvaṃpakasya su śobhanaiḥ
abhyarcya vidhivat tasyāḥ na vaidyam puratas nyaset
trapuṣaiḥ api kūṣmāṇḍaiḥ nālikeraiḥ sudāḍimaiḥ
bījapūraiḥ su tuḍīraiḥ kāravallaiḥ sa cirbhaṭaiḥ
phalaiḥ tad kāla saṃbhūtaiḥ kṛtvā śobhām tad agratas
virūḍha dhānya aṅkurakaiḥ su dīpa āvalibhiḥ tathā
sargaṇakaiḥ dhūpaḥ sauhālaka karañjakaiḥ
guḍa puṣpaiḥ karṇaveṣṭaḍaiḥ modakaiḥ upamodakaiḥ
bahu prakāraiḥ naivedyaiḥ yathā vibhava sārataḥ
evam abhyarcya vidhivat rātrau jāgaraṇa utsavam
gīta vādya naṭaiḥ nṛtyaiḥ prokṣaṇīyaiḥ anekadhā

original: sakhībhiḥ sahitā sādhvī tāṃ rātriṃ prasabhaṃ nayet /
analyzed: sakhībhiḥ sahitā sādhvī tām rātrim prasabham nayet
na ca saṃmīlayet netre nārī yāma catuṣṭayam

original: evaṃ jāgaraṇaṃ kṛtvā saptamyāṃ saritaṃ nayet // NarP_1,115.22 //
analyzed: evam jāgaraṇam kṛtvā saptamyām saritam nayet
gandha puṣpaiḥ tathā abhyarcya gīta vādya puraḥsaraiḥ
tat ca dadyāt dvijendrāya naivedya ādi dvijottama

original: snātvā gṛhaṃ samāgatya hutvā vaiśvānaraṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: snātvā gṛham samāgatya hutvā vaiśvānaram tatas
devān pitṝn manuṣyān ca pūjayitvā su vāsinīḥ
kanyakāḥ ca eva saṃbhojya brāhmaṇān daśa pañca ca
bhakṣya bhojyaiḥ bahuvidhaiḥ da tvā dānāni bhūriśas
lalitā me stu su prītā iti uktvā tān visarjayet
yaḥ kaścid ācaret etat vratam saubhāgya dam param

original: naro vā yadi vā nārī tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu /
analyzed: naraḥ vā yadi vā nārī tasya puṇya phalam śṛṇu
yat vrataiḥ ca tapobhiḥ ca dānaiḥ vā niyamaiḥ api
tat etena iha labhyeta kim bahu uktena nārada
mṛteḥ anantaram prāpya śiva lokam sanātanam
modate lalitā devyā śaive vai sakhi vat ciram

original: nabhasye māsi yā śuklā ṣaṣṭhī sā candanāhvayā // NarP_1,115.29 //
analyzed: nabhasye māsi yā śuklā ṣaṣṭhī sā candana āhvayā

original: rohiṇī pātabhaumaistu saṃyutā kapilā bhavet // NarP_1,115.30 //
analyzed: rohiṇī pāta bhaumaiḥ tu saṃyutā kapilā bhavet
tasyām ravim samabhyarcya vratī niyama tatparaḥ
labhate vāñchitān kāmān bhāskarasya prasādataḥ
anna dānam japaḥ homam pitṛ deva ṛṣi tarpaṇam
sarvam eva akṣayam jñeyam kṛtam deva ṛṣi sattama
kapilām dhenum abhyarcya vastra mālya anule panaiḥ
pradadyāt veda viduṣe dvādaśa ātma pratuṣṭaye
atha iṣu śukla ṣaṣṭhyām tu pūjyā kātyāyanī dvija
gandha ādyaiḥ maṅgala dravyaiḥ naivedyaiḥ vividhaiḥ tathā
tatas kṣamāpya deveśīm praṇipatya visarjayet

original: pūjyātra saikatī mūrtiryadvā dvijasatī mudā // NarP_1,115.35 //
analyzed: pūjyā atra saikatī mūrtiḥ yat vā dvijasatī mudā
vastra alaṅkaraṇaiḥ bhavyaiḥ kātyāyinyāḥ pratuṣṭaye

original: kanyā varaṃ prāpnuyācca vāñcitaṃ putramaṅganā // NarP_1,115.36 //
analyzed: kanyā varam prāpnuyāt ca vāñcitam putram aṅganā

original: kārtike śuklaṣaṣṭhyāṃ tu ṣaṇmukhena mahātmanā // NarP_1,115.37 //
analyzed: kārtike śukla ṣaṣṭhyām tu ṣaṇmukhena mahātmanā

original: atastasyāṃ suraśreṣṭhāṃ devasenāṃ ca ṣaṇmukham // NarP_1,115.38 //
analyzed: atas tasyām sura śreṣṭhām devasenām ca ṣaṇmukham
saṃpūjya nikhilaiḥ eva upacāraiḥ manoharaiḥ
prāpnuyāt atulām siddhim manaḥ bhīṣṭām dvijottama
atrā eva vahni pūjā uktām tām ca sampad samācaret
vividha dravya homaiḥ ca vahni pūjā puraḥsaram
mārgaśīrṣe śakla ṣaṣṭhyām nihataḥ tāraka asuraḥ

original: skandena satkṛtiḥ prāptā brahamādyaiḥ parikalpitā // NarP_1,115.41 //
analyzed: skandena satkṛtiḥ prāptā brahama ādyaiḥ parikalpitā
syām pūjayet skandam gandha puṣpa akṣataiḥ phalaiḥ
vastraiḥ ābhūṣaṇaḥ ca api naivedyaiḥ vividhaiḥ tathā
ravi vāreṇa saṃyuktā tathā śatabhiṣā anvitā

original: yadi cetsā samuddiṣṭā caṃpāhvā munisattama // NarP_1,115.43 //
analyzed: yadi ced sā samuddiṣṭā caṃpā āhvā muni sattama
tasyām viśveśvaraḥ devaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ pāpa nāśanaḥ
pūjanīyaḥ vedanīyaḥ smartavyaḥ saukhyam icchatā
snāna dāna ādikam ca atra sarvam akṣayyam ucyate
pauṣa māse śukla ṣaṣṭhyām devaḥ dinapatiḥ dvija
viṣṇu rūpī jagattrātā pradurbhūtāḥ sanātanaḥ
sa tasmāt pūjanīyaḥ syām dravyaiḥ gandha puraskṛtaiḥ
naivedyaiḥ vasttra bhūṣā ādyaiḥ sarva saukhyam abhīpsubhiḥ

original: māghamāse sitā ṣaṣṭhī varuṇāhvā smṛtā tu sā /
analyzed: māgha māse sitā ṣaṣṭhī varuṇa āhvā smṛtā tu sā
tasyām varuṇam abhyarcyet viṣṇu rūpam sanātanam
raktaiḥ gandha aṃśukaiḥ puṣpaiḥ naivedyaiḥ dhūpa dīpakaiḥ
evam abhyarcya vidhivat yat yat ca abhilaṣet naraḥ
tat tat ca phalataḥ labdhvā modate tad prasādataḥ

original: phaālgune śuklaṣaṣṭhyāṃ tu devaṃ paśupatiṃ dvija // NarP_1,115.50 //
analyzed: phaālgune śukla ṣaṣṭhyām tu devam paśupatim dvija
mṛd mayam vidhinā kṛttvā pūjayet upacārakaiḥ
saṃsnāpya śatarudreṇa pṛthak pañcāmṛtaiḥ jalaiḥ
gandhaiḥ ālipya su śvetaiḥ akṣataiḥ śveta puṣpakaiḥ
bilva patraiḥ ca dhattūra kusumaiḥ ca phalaiḥ tathā
sampūjya nānā naivedyaiḥ vidhivat tatas
kṣamāpya praṇipatya enam kailāsāya visarjayet

original: evaṃ kṛta śivārcastu naro nāryathavā mune /

original: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthitaṣaṣṭhīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcadaśādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī bṛhat nāradīyapurāṇe pūrva bhāge bṛhat upākhyāne caturtha pāde dvādaśamāsasthitaṣaṣṭhīvratanirūpaṇam nāma pañcadaśa adhika śatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
sanātanaḥ uvāca
śṛṇu nārada vakṣyāmi saptamyāḥ te vratāni aham

original: yāni kṛtvā naro bhaktyā sūryasāyujyamāpnuyāt // NarP_1,116.1 //
analyzed: yāni kṛtvā naraḥ bhaktyā sūrya sāyujyam āpnuyāt

original: caitre tu śuklasaptamyāṃ bahiḥ snānaṃ samācaret /

original: vinyasetpūrvapatre tu devau dvau kṛtadhātukau // NarP_1,116.3 //
analyzed: vinyaset pūrva patre tu devau dvau kṛta dhātukau

original: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe bṛhadupākhyāne pūrvabhāge caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasya dvādaśīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikaviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī bṛhat nāradīyapurāṇe bṛhat upākhyāne pūrva bhāge caturtha pāde dvādaśa māsasya dvādaśīvratanirūpaṇam nāma ekaviṃśatyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: sa ca prāha prasādena bhavataḥ sarvamasti me /
analyzed: sa ca prāha prasādena bhavataḥ sarvam asti me

original: sarveṣāṃ yogivaryāṇāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ tatra vāḍavāḥ // NarP_1,125.21 //
analyzed: sarveṣām yogi varyāṇām śṛṇvatām tatra vāḍavāḥ
papraccha śāṃbhivam jñānam paśu pāśa vimokṣaṇam

original: sa śivaḥ sādaraṃ tasya bhaktyā saṃtuṣṭamānasaḥ // NarP_1,125.22 //
analyzed: sa śivaḥ sa ādaram tasya bhaktyā saṃtuṣṭa mānasaḥ
yogam aṣṭa aṅga saṃyuktam prāha praṇata vatsalaḥ

original: sa labdhvā śāṃbhavaṃ jñānaṃ śaṅkarāllokaśaṅkarāt // NarP_1,125.23 //
analyzed: sa labdhvā śāṃbhavam jñānam śaṅkarāt loka śaṅkarāt
su prasanna manāḥ natvā yayau nārāyaṇa antikam
tatra api nāradaḥ bhīkṣṇam gata āgata parāyaṇaḥ
sevitam yogibhiḥ siddhaiḥ nārāyaṇam atoṣayat

original: etadvaḥ kīrtitaṃ viprā nāradīyaṃ mahanmayā // NarP_1,125.25 //
analyzed: etat vaḥ kīrtitam viprāḥ nāradīyam mahat mayā
upākhyānam veda samam sarva śāstra nidarśanam
catuṣpāda samāyuktam śṛṇvatām jñāna varddhanam
yaḥ etat kīrtayet viprāḥ nāradīyam śivālaye
samāje dvijamukhyānām tathā keśava mandire
mathurāyām prayāge ca puruṣottama sannidhau

original: setau kāñcyāṃ kuśasthalyāṃ gaṅgādvāre kuśasthale // NarP_1,125.28 //
analyzed: setau kāñcyām kuśasthalyām gaṅgādvāre kuśasthale
puṣkareṣu nadī tīre yatra kutra api bhaktimān

original: sa labhetsarvaya jñānāṃ tīrthānāṃ ca phalaṃ mahat // NarP_1,125.29 //
analyzed: sa labhet sarva ya jñānām tīrthānām ca phalam mahat
dānānām ca api sarveṣām tapasām vā api aśeṣatas
upavāsa paraḥ vā api haviṣya āśī jita indriyaḥ
śrotā ca eva tathā vaktā nārāyaṇa parāyaṇaḥ
śiva bhakti rataḥ vā api śṛṇvan siddhim avāpnuyāt
asninna śeṣa puṇyānām siddhīnām ca samudbhavaḥ

original: kathitaḥ sarvapāpaghnaḥ paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ sadā // NarP_1,125.32 //
analyzed: kathitaḥ sarva pāpa ghnaḥ paṭhatām śṛṇvatām sadā
sarveṣām īpsitam ca idam sarva jñāna prakāśakam
śaivānām vaiṣṇavānām ca śāktānām sūya sevinām
tathā eva gāṇapatyānām varṇa āśramavatām dvijāḥ

original: tapasāṃ ca vratānāṃ ca phalānāṃ saṃprakāśakam /
analyzed: tapasām ca vratānām ca phalānām saṃprakāśakam

original: mantrāṇāṃ caiva yantrāṇāṃ vedāṅgānāṃ vibhāgaśaḥ // NarP_1,125.35 //
analyzed: mantrāṇām ca eva yantrāṇām vedāṅgānām vibhāgaśaḥ
tathā āgamānām sāṃkhyānām vedānām ca eva saṃgraham

original: ya etatpaṭhate bhaktyā śṛṇuyādvā samāhitaḥ // NarP_1,125.36 //
analyzed: yaḥ etat paṭhate bhaktyā śṛṇuyāt vā samāhitaḥ
sa labhet vāñchitān kāmān deva ādiṣu api durlabhān

original: śrutvedaṃ nāradīyaṃ tu purāṇaṃ vedasaṃmitam // NarP_1,125.37 //
analyzed: śrutvā idam nāradīyam tu purāṇam veda saṃmitam
vācakam pūjayet bhaktyā dhana ratna aṃśuka ādibhiḥ
bhūmi dānaiḥ gavām dānaiḥ ratna dānaiḥ ca saṃtatam
hasti aśva ratha dānaiḥ ca prīṇayet satatam gurum

original: yastu vyākurute viprāḥ purāṇaṃ dharmasaṃgraham // NarP_1,125.39 //
analyzed: yaḥ tu vyākurute viprāḥ purāṇam dharma saṃgraham
caturvarga pradam nṝṇām kaḥ nyaḥ tad sadṛśaḥ guruḥ

original: kāyena manasā vācā dhanādyairapi saṃtatam // NarP_1,125.40 //
analyzed: kāyena manasā vācā dhana ādyaiḥ api saṃtatam
priyam samācaret tasya guroḥ ddharma upadeśinaḥ

original: śrutvā purāṇaṃ vidhivaddhomaṃ kṛtvā surārcanam // NarP_1,125.41 //
analyzed: śrutvā purāṇam vidhivat homam kṛtvā sura arcanam
brāhmaṇān bhojayet paścāt śatam miṣṭānna pāyasaiḥ

original: dakṣiṇāṃ pradadecchaktyā bhaktyā prīyeta mādhavaḥ // NarP_1,125.42 //
analyzed: dakṣiṇām pradadet śaktyā bhaktyā prīyeta mādhavaḥ

original: yathā śreṣṭhā nadī gaṅgā puṣkaraṃ ca saro yathā /
analyzed: yathā śreṣṭhā nadī gaṅgā puṣkaram ca saraḥ yathā

original: kāśī purī nago merurdevo nārāyaṇo hariḥ // NarP_1,125.43 //
analyzed: kāśī purī nagaḥ meruḥ devaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ hariḥ
kṛtam yugam sāmavedaḥ dhenuḥ vipraḥ annam aṃbu ca

original: mārgo mṛgendraḥ puruṣo 'śvatthaḥ prahlāda ānanam // NarP_1,125.44 //
analyzed: mārgaḥ mṛgendraḥ puruṣaḥ śvatthaḥ prahlādaḥ ānanam

original: uccaiḥ śravā vasaṃtaśca japaḥ śeṣor'yamā dhanuḥ /
analyzed: uccais śravāḥ vasaṃtaḥ ca japaḥ śeṣoḥ yamāḥ dhanuḥ

original: pāvako viṣṇurindraśca kapilo vākpatiḥ kaviḥ // NarP_1,125.45 //
analyzed: pāvakaḥ viṣṇuḥ indraḥ ca kapilaḥ vākpatiḥ kaviḥ
arjunaḥ hanumān darbhaḥ cittam citraratha uṃbujam
urvaśī kāñcanam yadvat śreṣṭāḥ ca ete sva jātiṣu
tathā eva nāradīyam tu purāṇeṣu prakīrtitam

original: śāntirastu śivaṃ cāstu sarveṣāṃ vo dvijottamāḥ // NarP_1,125.47 //
analyzed: śāntiḥ astu śivam ca astu sarveṣām vaḥ dvijottamāḥ
gamiṣyāmi guroḥ pārṃśvam vyāsasya amita tejasaḥ
iti uktvā abhyarcitaḥ sūtaḥ śaunaka ādyaiḥ mahātmabhiḥ
ājñaptaḥ ca punar sarvaiḥ darśana artham guroḥ yayau
te sarve dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ śaunaka ādyāḥ samāhitāḥ

original: śrutaṃ samyaganuṣṭhāya tatra tasthuśca satriṇaḥ // NarP_1,125.49 //
analyzed: śrutam samyak anuṣṭhāya tatra tasthuḥ ca satriṇaḥ
kali kalmaṣa viṣa nāśanam harim yaḥ japa pūjana vidhi bheṣaja upasevī

original: sa tu nirviṣamanasā sametya yāgaṃ labhate satamabhīpsitaṃ hi lokam // NarP_1,125.50 //
analyzed: sa tu nirviṣa manasā sametya yāgam labhate satam abhīpsitam hi lokam

original: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde purāṇamahimāvarṇanaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī bṛhat nāradīyapurāṇe bṛhat upākhyāne caturtha pāde purāṇamahimāvarṇanam nāma pañcaviṃśottaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
samāptā iyam bṛhat nāradīyapurāṇasya pūrva bhāgaḥ
śrī rādhā madana mohanaḥ jayati tarām
